/tutorial/learnmeleeattack.name: To do a melee attack, press <MENU_CANCEL>. When you get close to an enemy, you can do a finishing move by pressing this action key.

/tutorial/completedlearnmeleeattack.name: Good. Remember to use this move when you are close to an enemy.

/tutorial/learnaiming.name: Now try to aim at the flying holy water pedestal.

/tutorial/completedlearnaiming.name: You got it. Always aim before shooting.

/tutorial/learntodestroy.name: Some things are destroyable, try to destroy both statues.

/tutorial/completedlearntodestroy.name: Didn't that make you feel good?

/tutorial/moveforward.name: Pushing the Left Thumb stick will move your character.

/tutorial/lookaround.name: Pushing the Right Thumb stick will move your camera around.

/tutorial/shootpadlock.name: Press and Hold L1 to Aim, Press R2 to fire your current weapon. Practice by shooting the pad lock off the door.

/tutorial/energytrap.name: The Glaive weapon is also an 'Energy Trap'. It can absorb energy from elements in the environment.

/tutorial/thetorch.name: Try creating a source of fire. Using your Glaive, transfer electricity to the gas leak nearby.

/tutorial/tudodgebody.name: MOVE <MOVE_Z> AND TAP <ACTION> TO DODGE IN ANY DIRECTION

/tutorial/opendoor.name: Approach the door and press <MENU_CANCEL> to use the door.

/weapons/revolverdesc.name: An old six shooter. I've seen it cut through several men in one shot.

/weapons/socomdesc.name: Nice semi-auto. Very reliable piece of hardware.

/weapons/microdesc.name: Full auto pistol. A bit hard to control but it's well worth the money.

/weapons/shotgundesc.name: Sawed of shotgun. Who needs more than two shots, anyway?

/weapons/pumpdesc.name: This shotgun makes a perfect close-quarters companion.

/weapons/entrydesc.name: This thing is a cannon. Let them close in a bit, first.

/weapons/huntingdesc.name: High powered rifle, good for those who like personal space.

/weapons/assaultdesc.name: Excellent assault rifle. The range is a bit lacking but made up for in power.

/weapons/c4explosivedesc.name: A common variety of military plastic explosive. Used for detonating sealed metal doors.

/weapons/c4explosivedesccaps.name: A COMMON VARIETY OF MILITARY PLASTIC EXPLOSIVE. USED FOR DETONATING SEALED METAL DOORS.

/weapons/upgradebody.name: Cold War weapon technology pioneered at the Vozro research facility. Upgrades can be applied in the underground marketplace.

/weapons/upgradebodypre.name: Cold War weapon technology pioneered at the Vozro research facility. You'll need to find someone who can apply these upgrades.

/weapons/wu_puncture_text.name: Shots travel through flesh targets to strike targets beyond.

/weapons/wu_accuracy_text.name: Decreases recoil and spread of fire.

/weapons/wu_clip_extend_text.name: Expands magazine capacity for more shots between reloads.

/weapons/wu_doubler_text.name: Fires secondary bullet on each shot.

/weapons/wu_enferon_text.name: Each shot is laced with Enferon.

/weapons/wu_stopping_power_text.name: Bullets have increased chance to knockdown enemies.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint2.name: Use the left Demon Arm <ACTION> to grab objects with purple glow.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint3.name: To grab an enemy, shoot or knock them down. Then use your left Demon Arm <ACTION>.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint4.name: Hold <AIM_POWER> while moving <LOOK_Y:TILT_UD> to direct slashes.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint5.name: Pressing <SUMMON_SLOT_2> dual wields your smaller guns.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint6.name: Talents can be reset at Talent Shrines, but some Essence is lost in the process.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint7.name: Executing enemies can provide useful gameplay benefits, but executed enemies don't leave hearts behind.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint8.name: Enemies in armor can’t be grabbed until their armor is destroyed.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint9.name: You can grab shields from enemies… but only after destroying the shield’s armor!

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint10.name: Use <ACTION> to grab weapons and ammo from a distance.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint11.name: Car doors make great shields... and even better weapons! Press <ACTION> to throw them.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint12.name: You'll get more Essence from violent kills. Unleash your inner demon!

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint13.name: Stay in the dark. Jackie can't regenerate health when in the light!

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint14.name: Execute grabbed enemies by pressing <FINISHER_SELECT_1>. Talents can unlock executions that give special benefits.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint15.name: There are 4 styles of executions, each with a variety of types. Execute them all!

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint16.name: Demonic Executions <FINISHER_SELECT_4> give Jackie a Darkness shield.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint17.name: Hitman Executions <FINISHER_SELECT_2> give Jackie additional ammo.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint18.name: Health Executions <FINISHER_SELECT_1> heal an extra bar of Jackie's health.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint19.name: Power Executions <FINISHER_SELECT_3> speed up the recharge of Swarm and Gun Channeling.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint20.name: The Active Pump talent lets you speed pump shotguns by pushing <AIM_WEAPON> between shots. Pump away!

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint21.name: Visit Johnny Powell in the library to see your collection of Relics and learn about their history.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint22.name: You can view a complete list of collected Relics from the pause menu.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint23.name: Hunting for Relics? Check the pause menu to see how many are in the current level.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint24.name: Swarmed enemies are vulnerable to grabbing with the left Demon Arm <ACTION>.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint25.name: The Air Darkling talent lets Jackie grab his Darkling to throw at enemies.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint26.name: Got skills with a gun? Prove it to Dolfo on the Terrace of Jackie's mansion!

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint27.name: Earn Dark Essence from kills, eating hearts, and collecting relics. Spend Essence at Talent Shrines to unlock new Talents.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint28.name: Press <RUN:PUSH> while moving forward to sprint.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint29.name: Press <CROUCH:PUSH> to crouch. Press it again to stand up.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint30.name: Gun Channeling <CONTEXT_POWER> can be upgraded to allow you to see and shoot through walls.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint31.name: Too easy? Too hard? Change the difficulty at any time from the Pause Menu.

/dust/language/menu/loadinghint32.name: You can turn off messages like Essence rewards in the Options Menu.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint1.name: When called back <AIM_WEAPON>, Jimmy Wilson’s Axe can chop through multiple enemies. Line them up!

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint2.name: Jimmy Wilson can summon multiple Darklings <CONTEXT_POWER>. They seek out enemies and detonate when in range!

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint3.name: JP Dumond's Midnight Stick can be used <AIM_WEAPON> on enemies hiding behind cover. Cast them out!

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint4.name: The Midnight Stick's melee attack <AIM_POWER> will knock down any enemy it connects with.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint5.name: Inugami can thrust <AIM_WEAPON> or slash <AIM_POWER> his Kusanagi blade. Thrusts are slower, but do twice the damage.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint6.name: Shoshanna’s Arm of the Night has a greatly reduced recharge time when used with Gun Channeling <CONTEXT_POWER>.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint7.name: A charged shot from Shoshanna's Arm of the Night can do serious damage, even at a distance!

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint8.name: Destroy enemy hearts <ACTION> to keep your health full.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint9.name: Some missions in the Hit List can only be accessed by 2 or more players. Bring help!

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint10.name: While Essence and Talents are specific to each character in Vendettas, these earnings persist across both Campaign and Hit List.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint11.name: There are 6 unique Relics throughout the Vendettas missions. Can you find them all?

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint12.name: Each character in Vendettas has a unique Talent Tree.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint13.name: In Multiplayer, sharing is caring. If your health is full, leave some hearts for your friends to destroy <ACTION>.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint14.name: In Vendettas, friends who have died in battle will rejoin once a checkpoint is reached.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint15.name: Mission too difficult? Friends can join your game any time in either the Vendettas Campaign or Hit List.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint16.name: When playing multiplayer try ambushing enemies who are focusing attention on your friends!

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint17.name: You can perform Executions in Vendettas by approaching vulnerable enemies and pressing <ACTION>.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint18.name: Press <CROUCH> to crouch. Press it again to stand up.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint19.name: Press <RUN:PUSH> while moving forward to sprint.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint20.name: Earn Dark Essence for kills, destroying hearts, and collecting relics. Use your Essence to purchase new Talents at Talent Shrines.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint21.name: The Active Pump talent lets you speed pump shotguns by pushing <AIM_WEAPON> between shots. Pump away!

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint22.name: While using the Kusanagi blade as Inugami, hold <AIM_POWER> while moving <LOOK_Y:TILT_UD> to direct slashes.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint23.name: Talents can be reset at Talent Shrines, but some Essence is lost in the process.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint24.name: You'll get more Essence from violent kills. Unleash your inner demon!

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint25.name: Stay in the dark. Health doesn't regenerate in the light!

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint26.name: In Vendettas, pressing <SUMMON_SLOT_2> dual wields your character's unique weapon along with any other small gun.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint27.name: The Don difficulty in Vendettas infuses some enemies with Dark Essence. They’re stronger and do more damage, but give bonus Essence when defeated.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint28.name: Shoshanna's Gun Channeling <CONTEXT_POWER> can be upgraded to see and shoot through walls.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint29.name: When a friend goes down you have limited time to run up and revive them <POWER_HELD>. Hurry over to help before they bleed out!

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint30.name: Too easy? Too hard? The host can change difficulty at any time from the Pause Menu.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint31.name: You can turn off messages like Essence rewards in the Options Menu.

/dust/language/menu/mploadinghint32.name: You can turn off messages like Essence rewards in the Options Menu.

/lotus/language/archive/civilianraidedsu.name: The message you will deliver to Earth's colonies is one simple word: 'SUBMIT'

/lotus/language/archive/civilianraideddi.name: Come in, come in. Can anyone here me?... This is Lord Vetmar. The Royal Trade Convoy has been attacked. It's the Grineer. I don't know how this is possible but it's the damn Grineer. They're attacking us with our own ships. The Rodin is firing on us. If you hear this you must warn the Earth Colonies. They've boarded the flagship but the bridge is still secure, can't say for how long... is anybody getting this? Hello? What was that. They're breaching. Get on the ...

/lotus/language/archive/grineergeneral.name: The Grineer are the most dangerous threat in an Age, and the reason for your awakening.. Details are scarce on their origin, but they seemingly emerged from out of nowhere and started a campaign of domination. Ruled by a mysterious pair of Twin Queens who respond to any threat with absolute force, they have completely swallowed existing colonies and threaten many others.  Where did they come from? What is the source of their power? These are questions you need to answer Tenno.

/lotus/language/archive/aridfearescalati.name: We've decoded a segment - we are zeroing in on the Grineer Settlement. The Corpus are anxious to preserve their contract with the Grineer - they have dispatched new tools to the next segment of Capture targets...

/lotus/language/archive/fomoriandestroye.name: Our coordinated attacks have worked... this time. There may be other Fomorians coming. We need to destroy them or suffer resource shortages in the future.

/lotus/language/archive/vorsprizecomplet.name: You survived Vor's plan... but with the power of the Janus key... could Vor rise again?

/lotus/language/archive/solarrailtrainin.name: Solar Rails are colossal Orokin devices that distort the Void and allow players to reach otherwise inaccessible regions of space, known as Dark Sectors. Clans and Alliances can deploy Solar Rails to control these areas on the Solar Map, collecting tributes from players who access areas within their territory.

Once an Oracle has been built, Clans are able to construct Orokin Labs in their Dojos. Clan Warlords and Tacticians can research blueprints and construct Solar Rails from the terminals located inside the Orokin Lab. Small clans can unite to form Alliances, and are able to construct an Alliance Solar Rail. All clans within the Alliance may contribute toward the research and construction of the Solar Rail.

Once construction has been completed, clans and Alliances are able to deploy their Solar Rails on specified Dark Sectors of the Solar Map. The Clan or Alliance controlling the Solar Rail will be able to specify a tribute, collecting a percentage of any resources or credits collected by players using the Solar Rail.
The clan that controls the surviving Solar Rail takes control of that Dark Sector, and begin collecting tribute from other Tenno who access it.

/lotus/language/clan/roledescription_tac.name: Member can begin construction of Solar Rails in the Dojo, and deploy completed Rails in the Solar Map.

/lotus/language/clan/roledescription_cha.name: Member can kick or suspend people from Clan chat.

/lotus/language/clan/editranks_profanity.name: Cannot have profanity in your new rank

/lotus/language/clantech/crpheavyriflena.name: SUPRA
/lotus/language/clantech/crpheavyriflena.desc: The SUPRA is a heavy laser gun with a short wind up time.

/lotus/language/clantech/crpheavyriflede.name: The SUPRA is a heavy laser gun with a short wind up time.

/lotus/language/clantech/crplaserriflena.desc: Laser Rifle with Corpus safe-guards removed.

/lotus/language/clantech/crplaserriflede.name: Laser Rifle with Corpus safe-guards removed.

/lotus/language/clantech/corpuslaserpist.name: SPECTRA
/lotus/language/clantech/corpuslaserpist.desc: While its intended design is for deep space construction, the concentrated laser beam of the Spectra is highly effective against organic and synthetic enemies.

/lotus/language/clantech/corpuslaserpist.name: While its intended design is for deep space construction, the concentrated laser beam of the Spectra is highly effective against organic and synthetic enemies.

/lotus/language/clantech/grenadelauncher.name: PENTA
/lotus/language/clantech/grenadelauncher.desc: The Penta Launcher fires up to five grenades that can be remotely triggered at just the right moment.

/lotus/language/clantech/grenadelauncher.name: The Penta Launcher fires up to five grenades that can be remotely triggered at just the right moment.

/lotus/language/clantech/acriddesc.name: The Acrid fires an acidic-infused needle.

/lotus/language/clantech/energyrifledesc.name: Energy Rifle with Corpus safe-guards removed.

/lotus/language/clantech/flamethrowerdes.name: Ignis produces a stream of intense heat.

/lotus/language/clantech/railgundesc.name: The Lanka fires a high velocity projectile through magnetic induction.

/lotus/language/clantech/proddesc.name: The Prova is a melee weapon that delivers a high-intensity shock to its target.

/lotus/language/clantech/energyfragmentd.name: This destroyed Fieldron could further research into super-heated containment fields.

/lotus/language/clantech/energycomponent.name: ClanTech weaponized containment field to contain super-heated substances.

/lotus/language/clantech/chemfragmentdes.name: Researching the Detonite traces within could advance our weapon technology.

/lotus/language/clantech/chemcomponentde.name: Detonite injectors are the basis for explosive and incendiary weapons.

/lotus/language/clantech/biofragmentdesc.name: These samples could advance our knowledge of biological research.

/lotus/language/clantech/biocomponentdes.name: This living mass can produce weaponized toxins for weaponry.

/lotus/language/crashhandler/string_outr.name: Please include the following bug number when contacting support:

/lotus/language/crashhandler/string_ente.name: Please comment on how you came by this problem. It would assist us greatly if you could take some time to figure out how to make this error happen reliably so that we can isolate it as quickly as possible.

/lotus/language/crashhandler/string_outr.name: Thank you for participating in the diagnostic process. The issue you have encountered has been fixed and will hopefully be made available to you in an upcomming update.

/lotus/language/crashhandler/string_conf.name: Are you sure you want to abort this diagnostic process?

/lotus/language/crashhandler/string_conn.name: The connection to the diagnostic service was lost.

/lotus/language/crashhandler/string_ente.name: Please comment on how you came by this problem. It would assist us greatly if you could take some time to figure out how to make this error happen reliably so that we can isolate it as quickly as possible.

/lotus/language/darksectors/railmobilede.name: Our strategy for this attack is Mobile Defense. Take the payload and deliver it to a control terminal.
|CLAN_NAME_ATTACKING|'s Solar Rail will fall. It is only a matter of time.
|NODE_NAME| belongs to |CLAN_NAME_SUPPORTING|. We are the only true stewards of this rail.
You have reached the terminal. Administer the payload and prepare for defense.
Destination reached, drop in the payload and get ready to defend.
The damage is almost complete. Keep fighting.
I am encountering resistance. Hold the line.

/lotus/language/darksectors/railmobileha.name: This one is down. Keep moving.

/lotus/language/darksectors/railmobileob.name: Payload succesfully delivered. |CLAN_NAME_SUPPORTING| appreciates what you have done for us today |PLAYER_NAME|. Now get to extraction.
It's done, their rail won't be able to take much more of this. |CLAN_NAME_SUPPORTING| will not forget your contribution here today, |PLAYER_NAME|.  Now seek extraction.

/lotus/language/darksectors/sabotagemiss.name: Welcome fellow Tenno. This is a sabotage mission. Damage |CLAN_NAME_ATTACKING|'s rail by destroying the nearby reactor.
Find and destroy the nearby reactor. Be on guard for Specters from clan |CLAN_NAME_ATTACKING|.
The reactor is our target. Destroy it and loosen clan |CLAN_NAME_ATTACKING|'s grip on this Dark Sector.

/lotus/language/darksectors/sabotagegoal.name: You are working for |CLAN_NAME_SUPPORTING|. Destroy the reactor and we will reward you for your efforts.
The Tenno of |CLAN_NAME_SUPPORTING| are grateful for your attacks on this rail.

/lotus/language/darksectors/sabotageobje.name: You found the reactor, now destroy it to send a message to |CLAN_NAME_ATTACKING|: |NODE_NAME| does not belong to them for long.
Mission accomplished. Thank you |PLAYER_NAME|. Now find extraction.

/lotus/language/darksectors/warlordtaunt.name: How dare you oppose |CLAN_NAME_ATTACKING|?! We will defend this Sector with everything we've got.
This betrayal will not go unanswered. This Dark Sector belongs to |CLAN_NAME_ATTACKING|!
You really think |CLAN_NAME_SUPPORTING| should own this Dark Sector?
Tenno or not, we will crush |CLAN_NAME_SUPPORTING| for opposing us here.
|CLAN_NAME_ATTACKING| will not forgot what your actions here today |PLAYER_NAME|.
You are wasting your time |PLAYER_NAME|. |NODE_NAME| belongs to |CLAN_NAME_ATTACKING|.
Know this. |CLAN_NAME_SUPPORTING| will never take |NODE_NAME| from |CLAN_NAME_ATTACKING|. This is our rail.

/lotus/language/darksectors/warlordsuppo.name: |CLAN_NAME_SUPPORTING| will remember this day. Thank you |PLAYER_NAME|.
Thank you for supporting |CLAN_NAME_SUPPORTING|. We must control this Dark Sector!
I see you're supporting us |PLAYER_NAME|. |CLAN_NAME_SUPPORTING| honors you.
We must defeat |CLAN_NAME_ATTACKING|. Thank you for siding with |CLAN_NAME_SUPPORTING|.

/lotus/language/darksectors/railmobilede.name: This is a mobile defense mission. Deliver the payload to |CLAN_NAME_ATTACKING|'s rail control terminal. We will destroy it from within.

/lotus/language/designcounciltips/dc_tip.name: Enemies called Eximus are high-priority targets! They have powers that can block attacks, drain energy and life, and knock you down.
Doomrock20
Your Kubrow can be revived any number of times! But remember, if the Bleedout Timer runs out it will no longer be able to assist you in the mission.
Doomrock20
You can revive other players' Kubrows!
Arunasoul
Sahasa Kubrows equipped with the Dig mod can help you find Energy, Health, and Ammo, making them great companions during difficult missions!
ConviX
The Raksa Kubrow's Protect mod will replenish both you and your Kubrow's shields when under attack.
ConviX
Djinn's Fatal Attraction mod will temporarily draw fire to Djinn instead of you. Watch out though, it might not be able to take the hits!
Luthim
Tired of being surrounded by enemies? Wyrm's Crowd Dispersion mod stuns nearby enemies for an easy escape!
Farris
Always running out of ammo? Ammo Mutation mods convert dropped ammo from enemies into the ammo you need.
inthephonebox
Your favorite bow taking too long to fire? Upgrade it with Speed Trigger and Fast Hands to increase its firerate and reload time!
Imaru12
Affinity is divided evenly between your Warframe, Primary, Secondary, and Melee weapon. Bringing a weapon alone to the fight will increase its rank faster!
ConviX
When using the Penta, aim high! Triggering the grenades as they drop can score you headshots!
Xylia
Don't start a new engagement without reloading. Reload after each kill, battle, or whenever you are on the move!
Xylia
Bows and Thrown weapons have an arc in their trajectory, making them ideal for enemies ducking behind crates!
Letter13
Take care when firing explosive weapons! The Blast Damage can harm you and in some cases knock you down.
DJ_Redwire
Use a roll or backflip maneuver to dodge Seeker bombs and Leech Osprey projectiles!
ChickenBar
Scanning an unalerted enemy with your Codex Scanner will yield 2 Codex Scans.
RawGritz
Void Traps favor Prime Warframes and will give Energy when approached!
Tazmanyak
You get 4 Revives a mission. If you run out of Revives they will be replenished when you return to your landing craft!
123Olympian
Argon Crystals decay after you acquire them, so plan what you want to build before they disappear!
a04tbaba
Completing a Codex Entry unlocks information about an enemy's strengths, weaknesses, and other valuable information. Get the edge over your opponents by scanning often!
Imaru12
Looking for rare resources? Killing the boss in a system that drops them is a good way to get them!
VoiD_Glitch
Need more mod space on your Warframe or Weapon? Upgrade it with an Orokin Reactor or Catalyst to double its mod capacity!
ConviX
Critical headshots do vastly more damage than critical bodyshots!
ConviX
Remember that enemies can still hear the sound of your guns when you're invisible, and will shoot based on the sound's location!
ConviX
Upgrade your Melee weapon with the Parry mod to increase your chances of performing powerful Counterattacks!
AppliedThanatology
If you're under heavy fire, switch to your Melee weapon to block. This will drastically increase your survivability!
Llyssa
<DT_SLASH>Slash Damage causes bleeding over time. Making it ideal against any enemy!
Llyssa
<DT_PUNCTURE>Puncture Damage deals extra damage to armored enemies and reduces enemy damage over time!
Llyssa
<DT_IMPACT>Impact Damage knocks back enemies. Take advantage by attacking while they're staggering!
Llyssa
<DT_FIRE>Heat Damage sets enemies ablaze! Ignited enemies will panic giving you an opening to attack!
Llyssa
<DT_FREEZE>Cold Damage will slow enemies and their attacks for a brief period of time!
Llyssa
<DT_POISON>Toxin Damage bypasses shields and deals direct damage to the enemy's health!
Llyssa
<DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage can shock multiple targets, stunning them in their tracks!
Llyssa
<DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage combines <DT_FIRE>Heat and <DT_FREEZE>Cold Damage to knockdown enemies!
Llyssa
<DT_MAGNETIC>Magnetic Damage combines <DT_FREEZE>Cold and <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage to reduce enemy max shield capacity by 75% for a brief period of time!
Llyssa
<DT_VIRAL>Viral Damage combines <DT_POISON>Toxin and <DT_FREEZE>Cold Damage to reduce an enemy's maximum health by 50%!
Llyssa
<DT_RADIATION>Radiation Damage combines <DT_FIRE>Heat and <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage to confuse enemies into attacking each other!
Llyssa
<DT_GAS>Gas Damage combines <DT_FIRE>Heat and <DT_POISON>Toxin Damage to create toxic clouds that deal extra damage to Infested enemies!
Llyssa
<DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive Damage combines <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity and <DT_POISON>Toxin Damage to permanently reduce enemy armor by 25%!
DofD
Mark useful and rare Resources with your Waypoint command. Your teammates will thank you!
Imaru12
When the lights start flickering, tell your team. There is safety in numbers!
Kartumterek
Stay within 50 meters of your teammates and objectives for maximum Affinity sharing!
Sasoka
Can’t beat a mission solo? Find a squad in the Recruiting Chat Channel or switch your Matchmaking to Public for help!
Casardis
Team Ammo, Energy, and Health Restores are great tools that help sustain your squad during intense fights!
ConviX
Trade with your fellow Tenno at a Trading Post in a Clan Dojo or by visiting Maroo's Bazaar on Earth!
Xylia
Notice a teammate reviving someone? Help them out! Multiple Tenno can revive at the same time for a speedy recovery.
Hortonman
You can crawl to cover while bleeding out! Move to a spot where your team can revive you safely.
Gigatron-Prime
Aura mods stack! Coordinate mod Loadouts with your team for maximum results.
VoiD_Glitch
Got a Death Mark? Team up with others with the same type of mark to boost the chances of your assassin appearing!
Tendou_Souji
The Thief’s Wit and Loot Detector mods are incredibly useful for locating hidden loot crates and caches. Keep an eye on your map for new hidden locations!
Kenshin98
Upgrade your Warframe with the Loot Detector mod before Archwing missions to help locate scattered mods!
Marthrym
Struggling to keep your health up? Life Strike will become your best friend!
Saint_Tan
Your weapons have three loadout options (A, B, and C)! Use them to maximize and swap your strategies against the different enemy factions.
PantsAdvance
Have more energy than health? Drain energy to stop lethal damage with the Quick Thinking mod!
xethier
You can trade twice per day at Mastery Rank 2. One additional trade is acquired for every increase in Mastery Rank. Need more trades? Rank up your Mastery!
Beecher
Check for MOA spawn locations on Corpus maps. Hacking their Cabinets can deploy a friendly one!
Rajko
Slow moving projectiles can be very dangerous, try shooting them down or deflecting them!
direcyphre
Mastery Rank is gained by leveling Warframes and weapons. Try out as many new things as possible to increase your Rank!
Saint_Tan
Running low on credits? Be sure to crack open all the lockers and storage containers placed around the map. You might be surprised what else you find!
Imaru12
Encounter something that doesn’t seem to be working properly? Make a bug report on the Forums and provide as much detail as possible!
Hortonman
Check out the Training section of the Codex! You'll find important game mechanics and tips to improve combat.
xShadowsaur
Unlocking as many missions as possible increases your ability to participate in new Alerts!
SmokeyJesus
Running out of resources? Complete all planet nodes and deploy a Titan Extractor to gather them for you!
Aciaj613
Level the battlefield by hijacking Grineer Blunts, inflatable walls, and using it as cover against their onslaught!
SilverBones
Nekros' Desecrate ability gives you more chances to find loot and blueprint drops. Use Power Efficiency Mods to lower the energy cost so you can Desecrate more often!
R34LM
If you are playing as Trinity, use her Energy Vampire ability on Energy Leech Eximus to counteract their aura.
Instinction
Nyx's Absorb ability also absorbs allied fire! Punch in some rounds to increase the ability's damage output.
Jamescell
Have you ever tried using Volt's Speed ability in conjunction with Valkyr's Warcry? Melee and movement speed will skyrocket when both abilities are in effect.
Zerohunt
Vauban's Tesla ability places grenades on any surface. Experiment by throwing them on enemies, allies, and companions!
Pizzaguri
Use Nyx's Absorb ability to provide cover while teammates revive a downed player!
Blooddrizzt
Mirage can stop Wardens from activating the Execution timer in a Rescue Mission with her Sleight of Hand ability!
Cpl_Facehugger
Rhino's Iron Skin ability not only acts like extra health, it also protects you from knockdowns, Slash procs, and Toxin Damage!
PantsAdvance
Throw down and activate Castanas under Nyx's Absorb ability to add extra damage!
Easymac
Loki's Switch Teleport ability can also be used on allies! If you see a downed teammate, Switch Teleport them to the rest of the Squad for a swift revival!
Imaru12
Large capsules on Survival missions restore 30% Life Support. Be sure to communicate with your team before using them so that they don't go to waste!
Wynn
Nekros's Desecrate ability can make Life Support capsules appear in Survival missions!
StallordD
If an Excavator is close to death, give it an extra power core! Power cores will instantly restore its shields, allowing it to make that last push when under heavy fire!
DJ_Redwire
All Nightmare Alerts, separate from the regular Nightmare mode, are 'no shields' missions. Plan accordingly!
inthephonebox
Remember to bring gear with you on missions. Shield, Health, and Ammo Restores can be lifesavers when you find yourself in over your head.
Firetempest
1% of Power equals 1 second of Excavator operating time. Only use Power Cells when needed to avoid overcharging the drill in Excavation Missions!
Veryk
Want Fieldron, Mutagen, or Detonite Injectors? Wait for an Invasion reward to receive a fully crafted component!
Ghost333
Avoid shooting cracked windows on Corpus ships! If broken, they cause decompression and lock down the entire ship.
Hortonman
The Codex Scanner can see enemies through walls. Use it to get an edge in Stealth Missions!
duffelfish
Each time you gain control of all 4 points in Interception Missions you gain 500 Affinity. Consider letting the enemy capture a point to gain this boost more often!
Hortonman
Looking for Resource Caches in Orokin Sabotage Missions? Listen for their distinctive high-pitched chime!
Exodess

Grineer Prosecutors are powerful melee specialists that roam the planet Ceres. Although nearly invulnerable to Physical Damage, they are highly vulnerable to the primary Elemental Damage Types Fire, Ice, Electric, and Toxin!
Xylia
Grineer Heavy Gunners and Corpus Techs have weapons that must wind up. Stay on the move and weave around obstacles to keep their damage output low!
Ghost333
Wardens take extra damage from Stealth Attacks. Find isolated Wardens and assassinate them one by one!
Luthim
If an Ancient is preparing to grab you, block! You will only suffer a minor hold.
BrazillianJoe
The Grineer Drahk Master can disarm you! If you suddenly discover you have lost your weapon, look for it on the ground and recover it.
duffelfish
Oxium Ospreys have a 100% Oxium drop-rate when destroyed. But remember! If they self-destruct nothing will be dropped.
Certain targets should receive priority over others. Kill Heavy Gunners or Ancients before you kill Lancers or Chargers.
Kalenath

/lotus/language/g1quests/vortaunta.name: I am sworn protector of this system. Leave now or pay with your head!

/lotus/language/g1quests/vortauntb.name: I've sent word to the ruling Sisters. Reinforcements will be arriving soon.

/lotus/language/g1quests/vortauntc.name: Are you still alive? I suppose it is better this way. I have room for one more head in my collection!

/lotus/language/g1quests/projectsinister.name: Recover cloaking data from enemy vaults.
Hunt down and defeat the Acolytes.
Defend Alad V from Acolyte attack.
Hold out against endless waves of Acolyte forces.
Operation continues until all Acolytes defeated.
It seems you have filed a fraudulent report regarding the death of all Acolytes...

/lotus/language/g1quests/q2e2end.name: Well done. With no one to champion the proposed redesign, we have effectively secured our reserves. We will continue to keep a close eye on this.

/lotus/language/g1quests/q1e4end.name: We mourn the loss of our people. Thanks to you they did not die in vain. We now know that Technocyte has detrimental effects on Grineer physiology.

/lotus/language/g1quests/q3e2end.name: Unfortunately Hek is of no use to us. He is babbling incoherently about an “unfathomably horrible creature” that appeared and laid waste to his entire crew. It is clear he saw something very disturbing. Let us hope he recovers his senses.

/lotus/language/g1quests/q4e2end.name: Excellent work. Our researchers have determined the artifact to be a key-pass. Unfortunately, it’s only one piece to the puzzle. There are several more of these scattered throughout the Solar System. We have several of our best operatives working on this. Stay tuned, Tenno.

/lotus/language/g1quests/q5e1end.name: Lotus: “It looks like someone beat us to it, as the ship is littered with dead Ravor soldiers and no sign of the Technocyte. I hate to say this, but I’m almost certain this is the work of Warframes. Not much of a surprise, as we are aware of the existence of rogue cells of opportunistic Tenno. We’ve acquired coordinates to a Corpus ship we believe to have received the Technocyte.”

/lotus/language/g1quests/q5e3end.name: Good work. You have eliminated the threat of a potentially devastating biological weapon.

/lotus/language/g1quests/q6e1end.name: With Skelk gone, we can only hope that he did not pass along his knowledge of Orokin technology.

/lotus/language/g1quests/q7e2end.name: With Ayeri gone, we have put a dent in Grineer plans to control their very own destiny.

/lotus/language/g1quests/q7e1intro.name: There looks to be several locations on this facility containing cloning tech. Expect heavy resistance from the Grineer.

/lotus/language/g1quests/q8e1intro.name: Beld has had countless threats against his life. As a result, he now travels with a large security team comprised of robotic proxies. Tread carefully.

/lotus/language/g1quests/q8e1end.name: Great work. School’s out... for now.

/lotus/language/g1quests/q9e1end.name: Great work. With Izar gone, the program has dismantled. Our children will no longer suffer for the Grineer cause.

/lotus/language/g1quests/q10e1end.name: Good work. Our informant can now continue his research. We have adapted some of his work on Grineer technology for you to use.

/lotus/language/g1quests/q10e1intro.name: The canisters containing the DNA are scattered throughout the ship. Security is high... stay alert, and eliminate all those in your way.

/lotus/language/g1quests/q11e2.name: There is one last item to take care of. This Substrata ship houses the original prototype of ‘The Jackal’. Isolate the quad-robot’s position and take it down. In addition to sabotaging their work, this will be good test of your skill.

/lotus/language/g1quests/q11e2end.name: You have bought us much needed time. It will take them awhile to rebuild from this hit. Unfortunately, Substrata produced a number of units that are in active duty. This will not be the last time you encounter “The Jackal.

/lotus/language/g1quests/vortauntd.name: I look forward to meeting you.

/lotus/language/g1quests/vortaunte.name: Time to had another Tenno head to my collection.

/lotus/language/g1quests/vortauntf.name: You look weak. Nervous. I hope that expression comes out for my trophy case.

/lotus/language/g1quests/golemtaunta.name: (We were countless. Consume us. Be reborn.)

/lotus/language/g1quests/golemtauntb.name: (Why do you destroy us? We are your flesh.)

/lotus/language/g1quests/golemtauntc.name: (We embrace you. Why do you defile us?)

/lotus/language/g1quests/robotictauntc.name: Prototype engagement test: Ready. Tenno destruction analytics: Recording.

/lotus/language/g1quests/corpustaunta.name: Hmmm... An amazing specimen. The Warframe parts alone will double my quarterly results. Prepare the Autopsy-Bots!

/lotus/language/g1quests/corpustauntb.name: Why are you destroying profits in this way?! Its fiscally irresponsible to continue this assault!

/lotus/language/g1quests/corpustauntc.name: I understand your impulse for justice but this is very bad for profit.

/lotus/language/g1quests/lotuscorpusjack.name: Seeing The Jackal in action is grim – it’s clear the Corpus are capable of producing robotics beyond which we imagined.

/lotus/language/g1quests/lotuscorpussgtn.name: The death of Sergeant Nef Anyo should weaken the Corpus Research and Development operations for some time.

/lotus/language/g1quests/lotuscorpushyen.name: Robotics with a pack mentality – the Corpus are beginning to raise all defenses. The Hyena model is their deadliest yet.

/lotus/language/g1quests/lotuscorpusarne.name: The death of Arn Etina means the corpus mineral pipeline has been severed. Robotics production will be disrupted for weeks.

/lotus/language/g1quests/lotusgrineercap.name: The defeat of Grineer Captain Vor opens up other regions for the Tenno.

/lotus/language/g1quests/lotusgrineercou.name: The death of Counciler Vay Hek will bring all Grineer deployments to a halt.

/lotus/language/g1quests/lotusgrineergen.name: Eliminating a Grineer General will render the Saturn region helplessly unorganized.

/lotus/language/g1quests/lotusgrineertyl.name: Tyl Regor was no ordinary Grineer – he was the leader in Cloning. The self-proclaimed father of future Grineer.

/lotus/language/g1quests/lotusinfestedj3.name: That Golem was the most complex species of Infested we’ve encountered. Their ability to overtake multiple species is growing.

/lotus/language/g1quests/lotusgrineersni.name: Kela de Thaym's death will no doubt cause ripples of dissension amongst the inner circles of Grineer nobility.

/lotus/language/g1quests/lotuscorpusrapt.name: The Raptor is the most recent heavy weapon prototype developed by the Corpus. You must destroy it before they can begin full scale production.

/lotus/language/g1quests/goal1details.name: The Corpus have deployed millions of Orokin fused Moas in Europa. All Tenno must work together to eradicate this threat...

/lotus/language/g1quests/goal1detailsb.name: If we wipe out this entire force in time, their point of origin will be revealed. We suspect a valuable Relic may be of use to us.

/lotus/language/g1quests/goal2details.name: The Grineer have deployed millions of cloaking spy drones! We must destroy these quickly before they undermine our ability to strike undetected.

/lotus/language/g1quests/goal2detailsb.name: If we can irradicate enough of these drones it may reveal a hidden weapons cache. Did the Grineer hijack a Corpus weapons shipment?

/lotus/language/g1quests/lotusformoriane.name: Destroying a single reactor will not be enough to take down a Fomorian. We will need to poison the well... coordinated teams will corrupt it's fuel supply. This will require gear harvested from Infestation tissues. I will route you to an injector point...
These Fomorians are massive, keep searching. You will need to locate a fuel cell and inject the corrupting agent. I hope you have a corruptor with you.
Remember, if you are coordinating with other Tenno the Alpha/Beta mixtures are more potent, but a single Tenno cannot equip them at once.
There it is! You should be able to inject the corruptor you brought using the attached console.
Excellent, the corruption process has begun. You must defend this position to ensure the Grineer do not destroy this fuel cell before it spreads through the ship.
Corruption process is complete. Good work Tenno. Get to extraction where I will record your contribution to the operation!

/lotus/language/g1quests/fc_corpus_invas.name: We are getting closer. Accept this small token as appreciation for your efforts.
We have transferred |CREDIT_REWARD|<CREDITS> to your account.

/lotus/language/g1quests/fc_grineer_inva.name: I see you have fought for us. I see your skill. I see our futures intertwined. Enjoy this token of my appreciation.

/lotus/language/g1quests/lotus_invasionr.name: Tenno, the Corpus have successfully halted the Grineer invasion of Mars, and Alad V is rewarding his supporters with new Corpus weapon technology. This outcome means that our captured Tenno brethren remain at the mercy of Alad V, however, your loyalty to your comrades throughout this battle makes you worthy of reward. Tenno spies have returned intel allowing us to reverse-engineer the Detron weapon. I’m delivering these blueprints to you now.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/sargasruk_taunt.name: Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/lephantis_taunt.name: Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!
Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/sargasruk_taunt.name: Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!
Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/dethcubechirp1.name: Master |PLAYER_NAME|... my code is to kill. I hope this pleases you.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/dethcubechirp2.name: Master |PLAYER_NAME|, you gave me life. I am honored to repay you in death.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/dethcubechirp3.name: Master |PLAYER_NAME|, I am ready. Let us begin our destruction, together

/lotus/language/g1taunts/dethcubechirp4.name: I am enemy to all but you, Master |PLAYER_NAME|.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/dethcubechirp5.name: When I initialized my circuits this morning my first thought was - I wonder who |PLAYER_NAME| will have me to kill today?

/lotus/language/g1taunts/dethcubechirp6.name: Master |PLAYER_NAME| I am ready for the hunt. Lead me.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hyenadeath01.name: Hyenna destroyed, our circuits demand revenge.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hyenadeath03.name: Hyenna disabled, the pack grows weak.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/acolyteroguetau.name: Our fight is not with you Tenno.
I see you are still their servants.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/acolytecontrolt.name: This one has caused much suffering and yet you protect him... why?
You have lost your way Tenno, I will help you find it.
You are not the one we seek.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/acolyteareacast.name: The Orokin named Alad V is our target, but we’ll fight you if you wish.
He seeks only profit. He uses you.
This Orokin seeks to profit from our demise.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/acolytestrikert.name: It is not time for your trial yet.
Virtue gives us the strength of a thousand Tenno.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/acolyteduellist.name: |PLAYER_NAME|, your arrogance will be your demise.
|PLAYER_NAME|, your Lotus will watch you perish.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/acolyteheavytau.name: We will not tolerate this disturbance.
We will not abide this insurrection.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/lephantisingame.name: (We were countless. Consume us. Be reborn.)
(Why do you destroy us? We are your flesh.)
(We embrace you. Why do you defile us?)

/lotus/language/g1taunts/lephantiscombat.name: (Unburden yourself from this mortal coil, |PLAYER_NAME|. Join us.)
(We were countless. Consume us. Be reborn.)
(We embrace you. Why do you defile us?)

/lotus/language/g1taunts/boss_weaponinsu.name: You think your puny |PLAYER_WEAPON| scares me, |PLAYER_NAME|? Rank |PLAYER_WEAPON_RANK| is pathetic!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/boss_weaponmodi.name: A |PLAYER_WEAPON| with only |PLAYER_WEAPON_MODCOUNT|? I do not think |PLAYER_NAME| will last long!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/boss_claninsult.name: So happy I can add more |CLAN_NAME| notches to my belt!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/boss_twoplayeri.name: |PLAYER_NAME| are you sure |PLAYER_NAMEB| will be there for you when you fall?

/lotus/language/g1taunts/boss_warframein.name: I will crush you and your |PLAYER_WARFRAME| Warframe!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/boss_introducti.name: Should we do introductions? I am |ENEMY_NAME|. My |ENEMY_WEAPON| is looking forward to meeting you.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/boss_multiplecl.name: What is this? |CLAN_NAME|? |CLAN_NAMEB|? I should have known the The Tenno clans were uniting!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/vor_taunt1.name: You hide behind that |PLAYER_WARFRAME| Warframe. Face me like a true warrior!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/vor_taunt2.name: You just signed your death warrant, |PLAYER_NAME|.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/vor_taunt3.name: You call yourself a Warrior? Show some honor.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/vor_taunt5.name: Your |PLAYER_WEAPON| isn't nearly powerful enough to defeat me!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/vor_taunt6.name: You call that skill? Clan |CLAN_NAME| should be ashamed.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/vor_taunt7.name: Your |PLAYER_WEAPON| will make a nice trophy

/lotus/language/g1taunts/vor_taunt8.name: Your |PLAYER_WARFRAME| Warframe is no match for my advanced Orokin weaponry!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/vor_taunt9.name: That |PLAYER_WARFRAME| will look great hanging on my wall.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/vor_taunt10.name: I am waiting... You are no match for me!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/vor_taunt12.name: Your |PLAYER_WARFRAME| Warframe makes you slow and clumsy.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/vor_taunt13.name: I am waiting... You are no match for me!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/vor_taunt17.name: This is your final warning |PLAYER_NAME|. Leave this system at once.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/ruk_taunt3.name: You are in the presence of Grineer perfection!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/ruk_taunt5.name: Grineer immortality begins with the shedding of flesh.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/ruk_taunt6.name: |PLAYER_WARFRAME|? Your pretentious suits are no match for my power!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kril_taunt1.name: Beneath those suits exists flesh. Flesh bleeds. |PLAYER_NAME| bleeds.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kril_taunt2.name: I forgot my nails... I guess |PLAYER_NAME| will have to do!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kril_taunt3.name: Does that second-skin peel away just as easy as the first?

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kril_taunt4.name: Grineer immortality begins with the strike of my hammer!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kril_taunt5.name: I have seen and conquered many clans. |CLAN_NAME| will be next!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kril_taunt6.name: I am Lech Kril. My hammer awaits your skull.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kril_taunt7.name: The sound of hammer shattering ice is pure auditory perfection!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kril_taunt8.name: And I will strike down upon |PLAYER_NAME| with great vengeance and furious anger!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kril_taunt9.name: Hold still and I’ll make this quick.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kril_taunt10.name: Trust me when I say you won’t feel a thing.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kril_taunt11.name: You ever get hammered in that suit?

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hek_taunt1.name: All those who oppose Grineer policy and expansion shall fall!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hek_taunt2.name: This system is far too small both you and I, |PLAYER_NAME|. One of us has to go, and it isn't me.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hek_taunt3.name: Grineer foreign policy begins and ends at the tip of my |ENEMY_WEAPON|!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hek_taunt4.name: oh look! It says here you are next on my hit-list, |PLAYER_NAME|!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hek_taunt5.name: You think I'm ugly? Well, wait 'til I'm through with you, |PLAYER_NAME|!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hek_taunt6.name: What I lack in diplomacy, I make up for in limb severing ferocity!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hek_taunt7.name: Can't we all just get along? Come give your old Uncle Hek a hug, |PLAYER_NAME|!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hek_taunt8.name: I see you have come pre-equipped with you very own body bag, |PLAYER_NAME|!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/regor_taunt1.name: You shall suffer as we have, |PLAYER_NAME|.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/regor_taunt2.name: Your little dress-up party ends here, |CLAN_NAME|

/lotus/language/g1taunts/regor_taunt3.name: We should accessorize your suit with some holes... bullet holes.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/regor_taunt4.name: You realize we haven't celebrated Halloween in about a millenia, right?

/lotus/language/g1taunts/regor_taunt5.name: You have violated the dress code of this vessel. Failure to comply is punishable by death.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/regor_taunt6.name: Take the 'Warfra' out of Warframe and what are you left with? You got it, 'me'!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/anyo_taunt1.name: Is this a gathering of the freaks?

/lotus/language/g1taunts/anyo_taunt2.name: Orokin secrets cannot remain secret forever... start talking!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/anyo_taunt3.name: From pods you have come, in caskets you will go!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/anyo_taunt4.name: Fashion victims about to become murder victims!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/anyo_taunt5.name: This is your final warning |PLAYER_NAME|. Leave this system at once.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/anyo_taunt6.name: I grow tired of waiting |PLAYER_NAME|. Will you face me?

/lotus/language/g1taunts/anyo_taunt7.name: That |PLAYER_WARFRAME| will look great hanging on my wall.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/anyo_taunt9.name: You call that skill? Clan |CLAN_NAME| should be ashamed.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/jackal_taunt2.name: Enemy Analysis: Organic. Threat Level: Impotent.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/jackal_taunt4.name: Prototype engagement test: Ready. Tenno destruction analytics: Recording.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/razorback_taunt.name: |PLAYER_NAME| Detected: May the Void take mercy upon you

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hyena_taunt2.name: Enemy acumen: Inane. Threat Level: Reduced.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hyena_taunt5.name: Enemy Proximity: Immediate. Defensive Systems Employed: Dismemberment.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hyenanew_taunt1.name: The Pack calls for your death.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hyena_appoachta.name: The Pack grows excited, we have been waiting for this.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hyenanew_taunt2.name: The Pack says: 'kill the weakest first'.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hyenanew_taunt3.name: The Pack says: 'pick them off one by one'

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hyenanew_taunt4.name: The Pack is designed to enjoy this, it is in its circuits.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hyenanew_taunt5.name: The Pack sings when you die.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/hyenanew_taunt6.name: Our circuits are happiest when inflicting pain

/lotus/language/g1taunts/ambulas_taunt3.name: Incursion probability: Negligent. Tenno Mortality Probability: Inevitable.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/ambulas_taunt4.name: Enemy Amplitude: Paltry. Threat Level: Null.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/ambulas_taunt5.name: Enemy Proximity: Immediate. Defensive Systems Employed: Calcitration.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/raptor_systemta.name: Analyzing Threat Vitality: Target death imminent

/lotus/language/g1taunts/golem_taunt1.name: (We were countless. Consume us. Be reborn.)

/lotus/language/g1taunts/golem_taunt2.name: (Why do you destroy us? We are your flesh.)

/lotus/language/g1taunts/golem_taunt3.name: (We embrace you. Why do you defile us?)

/lotus/language/g1taunts/golem_taunt4.name: (Unburden yourself from this mortal coil, |PLAYER_NAME|. Join us.)

/lotus/language/g1taunts/phorid_taunt1.name: (Revoke the frailities of flesh. Let us in.)

/lotus/language/g1taunts/phorid_taunt2.name: (We are the vessel through which immortality is achieved. Assimilate, |PLAYER_NAME|.)

/lotus/language/g1taunts/phorid_taunt3.name: (Through the coalescence of flesh and universal will, we will exist as one.)

/lotus/language/g1taunts/phorid_taunt4.name: (Tenuous is your human spirit, |PLAYER_NAME|. Let us be your salvation.)

/lotus/language/g1taunts/stalker_tauntin.name: |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME|, you can't run from your past.
|LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| there is no place to hide.
The murder of |BOSS_TAG| will not go unpunished.
The blood of |BOSS_TAG| is on your hands. Did you really think there would be no repercussions?
There is no salvation for your crime against |BOSS_TAG|.
You shall not leave this place!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/stalker_tauntes.name: You may have survived for now, |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME|, but your time WILL come!
You are stronger than I realized, |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME|. No matter, this is only a temporary setback.
|LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| you are a more worthy opponent than I expected. You punishment will have to wait.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/stalker_tauntde.name: I... have failed... this one will remain... unpunished...

/lotus/language/g1taunts/stalker_tauntta.name: It is done. |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| is no more.
Justice is served. |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| has been executed.

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kela_taunt1.name: Tenno, in my domain... No matter... They shan't survive long...

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kela_taunt2.name: The Tenno lives... This interests me... I must learn more...

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kela_taunt3.name: This Tenno... It continues to mock me with its insolence...

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kela_taunt4.name: Be warned... I will not abide your intrusion, Tenno...

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kela_taunt5.name: I know your name, |PLAYER_NAME|... There is little you can hide from me... Run... While you can...

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kela_taunt6.name: You have forced my hand |PLAYER_NAME|... Know that it was Kela de Thaym who ended your existence...

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kela_taunt8.name: First... I will kill you, |PLAYER_NAME|... Then... I will eradicate every last member of |CLAN_NAME|!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/kela_taunt9.name: The Sisters... They will reward me well... When I present your head to them...

/lotus/language/g1taunts/vor_tauntineffe.name: Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!

/lotus/language/g1taunts/lephantis_taunt.name: Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!

/lotus/language/game/tennoway_naramondes.name: This discipline focused on Knowing The Enemy, and the tacticians of Naramon believed that to truly understand a foe would confer the greatest advantage upon a warrior.

/lotus/language/game/tennoway_zenurikdes.name: They believed the clearest path to victory was to Dominate the Enemy. They sought to choke an opponent of all resources; that sheer strength could erase any resistance.

/lotus/language/game/tennoway_vazarindes.name: They trained to Counter The Enemy, and move with an opponent’s attacks in order to nullify them. They maintained constant awareness in order to defend against all aggression.

/lotus/language/game/tennoway_unairudesc.name: They pushed themselves to Outlast The Enemy, to withstand all aggression without retreat. They believed that if the enemy could not match their endurance, then a battle could be won without having even commenced.

/lotus/language/game/tennoway_maduraides.name: They followed the path of Engage The Enemy. Their swift, uncompromising onslaught, holding nothing back and recklessly attacking their foes, could vanquish an opponent before he had the chance to steel himself. Speed and savagery characterized this school.

/lotus/language/game/mercurydesc.name: The only remaining Orokin Towers are hidden here. The Grineer patrol this area to prevent Tenno incursion.

/lotus/language/game/dojodesc.name: Your clan is building a hidden fortress on the periphery of the Origin System.

/lotus/language/game/voiddesc.name: Ancient Orokin places are hidden here.

/lotus/language/game/phobosdesc.name: The Grineer have occupied the abandoned settlements here.

/lotus/language/game/ceresdesc.name: The Grineer have expanded their empire into this region.

/lotus/language/game/europadesc.name: This deep space outpost is traditionally home to The Corpus.

/lotus/language/game/erisdesc.name: Rapid Corpus expansion has led them to build outposts in this far flung sector of the system.

/lotus/language/game/sednadesc.name: The Grineer have expanded their empire into this region.

/lotus/language/game/venusdesc.name: The Corpus have focused their manufacturing facilities in this area.

/lotus/language/game/earthdesc.name: A desolate, ruined world. Home of the oppressive Grineer Empire.

/lotus/language/game/marsdesc.name: Corpus salvage ships pick through the fragments of Orokin derelicts here.

/lotus/language/game/jupiterdesc.name: Once overrun by the Infestation, The Corpus are now exploiting Jupiter for its vast deposits of rare gases.

/lotus/language/game/saturndesc.name: A Grineer stronghold with well-protected shipping lanes and training orbiters for their Elite troops.

/lotus/language/game/uranusdesc.name: Remote Grineer bases focus on research and development of bio-modification and gene repair.

/lotus/language/game/neptunedesc.name: Home of the Corpus and site of their indoctrination temples. Warframe and Robotics R&D hidden here.

/lotus/language/game/plutodesc.name: The shattered Outer Terminus of the Solar Rail Network is located here. The Corpus work to rebuild it.

/lotus/language/game/tutorialfoundryintr.name: This is the Foundry. Here you will build powerful new items to expand your arsenal.

/lotus/language/game/tutorialfoundryreqs.name: To build an item requires a Blueprint and its Components. While there are Blueprints in the Market, most are hidden throughout the system.

/lotus/language/game/tutorialfoundrycomp.name: Search ships and defeat enemies to obtain Components. The components found are influenced by the Region of space you are in.

/lotus/language/game/tutorialfoundryend.name: The Foundry is key to owning the most powerful weapons and artifacts that exist!

/lotus/language/game/tutorialboostersint.name: These are the Artifacts of the Orokin War. Each provides unique boosts to you and your teammates during missions.

/lotus/language/game/tutorialboosterspla.name: Each player may chose an Artifact from their collection before the mission begins.

/lotus/language/game/tutorialboostersend.name: Collect all of the Artifacts to give your squad the edge in combat.

/lotus/language/game/pvedeathmatchenemyt.desc: Welcome Tenno. This is the 'Origin' system and you... are its ward.

/lotus/language/game/tutorialstarcharton.name: You control how I connect you with other Tenno agents. You may freely join other agents, restrict it to your contacts, or go in alone.

/lotus/language/game/tutorialstarchartal.name: Completing a region activates its real-time alerts. This is key to attacking high-value targets.

/lotus/language/game/tutorialstarcharten.name: You begin at Mercury's Terminus, your only way in to the system. It is time for the Tenno to return.

/lotus/language/game/petkubrowlongdesc.name: Kubrow are hatched from eggs grown in the Incubator. Kubrow Eggs can be found in Kubrow Dens on Earth or purchased in the Market.

/lotus/language/game/kubrowlongdesc.name: After the fall of the Orokin, these former pets were left to fend for themselves. Only the most vicious survived, evolving into deadly pack hunters that now pervade every inch of Earth's dense forest. Intensely territorial, the Kubrow will attack any creature unlucky enough to cross their path.

/lotus/language/game/kubrowdenlongdesc.name: Fiercely guarded by their owners, the Kubrow den is capable of housing an entire pack of the feral creatures. Once disturbed, these animals will whip themselves into a frenzy attacking anything they deem a threat.

/lotus/language/game/infestedhiveadesc.name: Generates a coldness that reduces shields

/lotus/language/game/infestedhiveedesc.name: Creates a field that lowers gravity

/lotus/language/game/survivalchallenge.name: Survive until the timer runs out

/lotus/language/game/missionmasteryrequi.name: Your Mastery Rank must be |RANK| or higher to access this location.

/lotus/language/game/missionquestrequire.name: You must complete |ITEM| in order to access this location.

/lotus/language/game/conclavesyndicatere.name: You must be initiated with the Conclave Syndicate to access this location.

/lotus/language/game/conclaveloadoutrequ.name: A Conclave loadout is required to access this location. Please use the Arsenal to set one up.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/sabotagedesc.name: Infiltrate the enemy hold, and cripple their operation by striking at vulnerable points. The mini map will lead you to the target. Once it has been destroyed, get to extraction as fast as possible.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/assassinationd.name: Assassination contracts mark high priority targets around the system. Hunt down and eliminate these enemies, then head to extraction.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/deceptiondesc.name: Enter the enemy ship, and hack their navigation console to redirect their path. At the start of deception missions, a data mass will spawn next to the Tenno. It can be picked up with the <USE> key, but will prevent the carrier from using their primary weapon. Take the datamass through the mission and place it in the enemy navigation console.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/defensedesc.name: Defend an important target against waves of enemy units. If the defense target is destroyed, the mission automatically fails. Every 5 waves choose to stay and fight or extract from the mission.

/lotus/language/gamemodes/exterminatedes.name: Enter the level and kill every enemy you encounter. Leave no one standing.

/lotus/language/gametips/mods_transmuter.name: The rarity of mods being transmuted will increase the odds of producing a rare mod.

/lotus/language/gametips/mods_fusionener.name: Rare mods require more energy to rank up. They also provide more energy when fused.

/lotus/language/gametips/mods_fusionammo.name: Get the most fusion energy out of your mods by fusing duplicates.
Mods of the same polarity provide twice the fusion energy than Mods of different polarities.

/lotus/language/gametips/mods_transmutes.name: The polarity of mods being transmuted will influence the polarity of the mod you receive.
The item compatability of mods being transmuted will influence the item compatibility of the mod you receive.

/lotus/language/gametips/slidedesc.name: Press <CROUCH> while sprinting to perform a slide manuever.

/lotus/language/gametips/slidedesc_alt.name: Hold <HOLD_CROUCH> while sprinting to perform a slide manuever.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_elemen.name: Combine primary elemental damage types to create secondary ones.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_differ.name: Enemies are resistant and vulnerable to various elements. Use the Codex scanner to learn about them.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_fireda.name: HEAT <DT_FIRE> damage will burn and scorch foes.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_electr.name: ELECTRICITY <DT_ELECTRICITY> damage is capable of stunning and damaging enemies.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_coldda.name: COLD <DT_FREEZE> damage can slow down enemies and deal damage.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_oxinda.name: TOXIN <DT_POISON> damage is effective at damaging an enemy's health.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_matchp.name: If the polarity of the mod and the slot you install it on match, the capacity cost of the mod will be halved.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_ordero.name: Install Companion precepts in the order you want them to be followed, starting from upper-left.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_aurasa.name: Aura mods add to your total mod capacity.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_stance.name: Stance mods add to your total mod capacity.
Stance mods unlock the ability to perform advanced combos.

/lotus/language/gametips/upgrades_modtut.name: Press <MENU_RTRIGGER1> to view the mod tutorial.

/lotus/language/irc/r_motd.name: Recruit for a Squad or Clan here!

/lotus/language/irc/channellocked.name: You are not currently qualified to use this channel.

/lotus/language/sorties/assassinationdes.name: Reconnaissance efforts at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| have revealed that |BOSS_NAME| is directly overseeing an operation at |LOCATION|. Strike now while the opportunity exists.

/lotus/language/sorties/exterminationdes.name: An advanced group of |BOSS_NAME|'s units has been found at |LOCATION|. Eliminate the threat before backup can arrive.
|BOSS_NAME| has deployed elite units. Eradicate them before they can establish a stronghold on |LOCATION|.

/lotus/language/sorties/rescuedesc1.name: A Tenno operative possessing critical security information has been captured by |BOSS_NAME|'s units. Rescue him from the prison base located at |LOCATION| before he is tortured and executed.

/lotus/language/sorties/rescuedesc2.name: A Tenno Informer has been captured near |LOCATION|. Liberate this hostage before |BOSS_NAME| obtains sensitive intelligence data.

/lotus/language/sorties/sabotagedesc1.name: A hidden base controlled by |BOSS_NAME|'s units has been discovered at |LOCATION|. Destroy all essential machinery while the opportunity presents itself.

/lotus/language/sorties/sabotagedesc2.name: |BOSS_NAME| is establishing a military augment facility on |LOCATION|. Put it out of operation.

/lotus/language/sorties/counterinteldesc.name: A security breach has provided the opportunity to reroute the communication systems of a base operated by |BOSS_NAME|'s units. Reprogram the console at |LOCATION| before the window closes.
