/lotus/language/sorties/rescuetointeldes.name: The hostage recovered from |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| has alerted us to a concealed data network at |LOCATION|. Extract information without raising |BOSS_NAME|'s attention.

/lotus/language/sorties/rescuetodefensed.name: Outraged by the escape of their hostage at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION|, |BOSS_NAME|'s units have launched an attack on a stranded Tenno informant at |LOCATION|. Suppress the enemy before he can be captured.

/lotus/language/sorties/rescuetomobilede.name: Intel carried by the hostage recovered from |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| has allowed us to breach |BOSS_NAME|'s data network at |LOCATION|. Our datamasses have been deployed to the site; locate them and override the terminals.

/lotus/language/sorties/rescuetoterritor.name: Cryptographic info obtained by the hostage from |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| has allowed us to decipher transmissions sent to a |BOSS_NAME| data relay at |LOCATION|. Intercept these signals while they are still in flight.

/lotus/language/sorties/rescuetoretrieva.name: Schematics produced by the hostage from |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| indicate a large-scale power cell component is being held by |BOSS_NAME| at |LOCATION|. Retrieve it for our own purposes.

/lotus/language/sorties/rescuetohivedesc.name: Alerted enemy units from |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| have activated a breeding grounds for |BOSS_NAME| larvae at |LOCATION|. Destroy the hives before an outbreak occurs.

/lotus/language/sorties/rescuetoexcavate.name: Mobilization orders overheard by the hostage from |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| suggest a large Cryotic deposit has been located at |LOCATION|. Excavate the site before |BOSS_NAME|'s units overtake it.

/lotus/language/sorties/sabotagetoexterm.name: Evidence obtained from |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| indicates an advanced group of |BOSS_NAME|'s units is deployed at |LOCATION|. Eliminate them before they are alerted.

/lotus/language/sorties/sabotagetorescue.name: Intel extracted from |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| has uncovered a |BOSS_NAME| prison base at |LOCATION|. Go there and return captive operatives to safety.

/lotus/language/sorties/sabotagetosurviv.name: Data stores found among the wreckage at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| reveal an artifact guarded by |BOSS_NAME|'s units at |LOCATION|. Engage enemy units there while our operatives retrieve it.

/lotus/language/sorties/sabotagetosabota.name: A hidden base controlled by |BOSS_NAME|'s units has been discovered at |LOCATION|. Destroy all essential machinery while the opportunity presents itself.

/lotus/language/sorties/sabotagetointeld.name: Transmitters found at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| are in communication with a concealed data network at |LOCATION|. Extract information without raising |BOSS_NAME|'s attention.

/lotus/language/sorties/sabotagetodefens.name: In retaliation for their defeat at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION|, |BOSS_NAME|'s units have launched an attack on a stranded Tenno informant at |LOCATION|. Suppress the enemy before he can be captured.

/lotus/language/sorties/sabotagetomobile.name: The disruption of |BOSS_NAME|'s units at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| has allowed us to breach the data network at |LOCATION|. Our datamasses have been deployed to the site; locate them and override the terminals.

/lotus/language/sorties/sabotagetoterrit.name: Distressed units at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| have dispatched unencrypted transmissions to a |BOSS_NAME| data relay at |LOCATION|. Intercept these signals while they are still in flight.

/lotus/language/sorties/sabotagetoretrie.name: Schematics abandoned by enemy units at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| indicate a large-scale power cell component is being held by |BOSS_NAME| at |LOCATION|. Retrieve it for our own purposes.

/lotus/language/sorties/sabotagetohivede.name: Alerted enemy units from |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| have activated a breeding grounds for |BOSS_NAME| larvae at |LOCATION|. Destroy the hives before an outbreak occurs.

/lotus/language/sorties/sabotagetoexcava.name: Mobilization orders intercepted at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| suggest a large Cryotic deposit has been located at |LOCATION|. Excavate the site before |BOSS_NAME|'s units overtake it.

/lotus/language/sorties/inteltoextermina.name: Evidence obtained from |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| indicates an advanced group of |BOSS_NAME|'s units is deployed at |LOCATION|. Eliminate them before they are alerted.

/lotus/language/sorties/inteltorescuedes.name: Intel extracted from |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| has uncovered a |BOSS_NAME| prison base at |LOCATION|. Go there and return captive operatives to safety.

/lotus/language/sorties/inteltosurvivald.name: Data stores found among the wreckage at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| reveal an artifact guarded by |BOSS_NAME|'s units at |LOCATION|. Engage enemy units there while our operatives retrieve it.

/lotus/language/sorties/inteltosabotaged.name: Data stores found at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| have revealed a secret base controlled by |BOSS_NAME|'s units at |LOCATION|. Destroy all essential machinery while the enemy is taken off guard.

/lotus/language/sorties/inteltointeldesc.name: Storage vaults of |BOSS_NAME|'s data have been located at |LOCATION|. Retrieve sensitive information without being detected by the advanced security systems on site.

/lotus/language/sorties/inteltodefensede.name: In retaliation for their defeat at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION|, |BOSS_NAME|'s units have launched an attack on a stranded Tenno informant at |LOCATION|. Suppress the enemy before he can be captured.

/lotus/language/sorties/inteltomobiledef.name: The disruption of |BOSS_NAME|'s units at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| has allowed us to breach the data network at |LOCATION|. Our datamasses have been deployed to the site; locate them and override the terminals.

/lotus/language/sorties/inteltoterritory.name: Distressed units at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| have dispatched unencrypted transmissions to a |BOSS_NAME| data relay at |LOCATION|. Intercept these signals while they are still in flight.

/lotus/language/sorties/inteltoretrieval.name: Schematics abandoned by enemy units at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| indicate a large-scale power cell component is being held by |BOSS_NAME| at |LOCATION|. Retrieve it for our own purposes.

/lotus/language/sorties/inteltohivedesc1.name: Alerted enemy units from |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| have activated a breeding grounds for |BOSS_NAME| larvae at |LOCATION|. Destroy the hives before an outbreak occurs.

/lotus/language/sorties/inteltoexcavated.name: Mobilization orders intercepted at |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| suggest a large Cryotic deposit has been located at |LOCATION|. Excavate the site before |BOSS_NAME|'s units overtake it.

/lotus/language/sorties/defensetoextermi.name: Evidence obtained from |PREVIOUS_LOCATION| indicates an advanced group of |BOSS_NAME|'s units is deployed at |LOCATION|. Eliminate them before they are alerted.

/lotus/language/spaceguns/archrailgunnam.name: VELOCITUS
/lotus/language/spaceguns/archrailgunnam.desc: When fully charged, the magnetized barrel of the Velocitus accelerates a metal slug to tremendous speeds, piercing hulls and obliterating armor.

/lotus/language/spaceguns/archrailgundes.name: When fully charged, the magnetized barrel of the Velocitus accelerates a metal slug to tremendous speeds, piercing hulls and obliterating armor.

/lotus/language/spaceguns/archheavypisto.name: DUAL DECURION
/lotus/language/spaceguns/archheavypisto.desc: Delivering twin streams of highly accurate, rapid-fire ordnance, the Decurion are specifically designed for combat in the vacuum of space.

/lotus/language/spaceguns/archheavypisto.name: Delivering twin streams of highly accurate, rapid-fire ordnance, the Decurion are specifically designed for combat in the vacuum of space.

/lotus/language/spaceguns/archrocketcros.name: FLUCTUS
/lotus/language/spaceguns/archrocketcros.desc: An Archwing energy weapon that sends waves of deadly plasma crashing into enemies.

/lotus/language/spaceguns/archrocketcros.name: An Archwing energy weapon that sends waves of deadly plasma crashing into enemies.

/lotus/language/spaceguns/imperatorvanda.name: IMPERATOR VANDAL
/lotus/language/spaceguns/imperatorvanda.desc: The Imperator Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the barrel.

/lotus/language/spaceguns/imperatorvanda.name: The Imperator Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the barrel.

/lotus/language/spaceguns/archmachinegun.name: IMPERATOR
/lotus/language/spaceguns/archmachinegun.desc: A long range rifle capable of firing in space, the Imperator's versatility makes it an ideal weapon for space combat.

/lotus/language/spaceguns/archmachinegun.name: A long range rifle capable of firing in space, the Imperator's versatility makes it an ideal weapon for space combat.

/lotus/language/spaceguns/archcannonname.name: CORVAS
/lotus/language/spaceguns/archcannonname.desc: When fully charged, this flak-cannon delivers a devastating shot. Perfect for taking down fast-moving interceptors.

/lotus/language/spaceguns/archcannondesc.name: When fully charged, this flak-cannon delivers a devastating shot. Perfect for taking down fast-moving interceptors.

/lotus/language/spacemelee/archswordname.name: VERITUX
/lotus/language/spacemelee/archswordname.desc: Weightless space turns this impossibly massive sword into an agile instrument of destruction.

/lotus/language/spacemelee/archsworddesc.name: Weightless space turns this impossibly massive sword into an agile instrument of destruction.

/lotus/language/spacemelee/archaxename.name: ONORIX
/lotus/language/spacemelee/archaxename.desc: This laser bladed battle-axe easily hacks through a ship's defenses and the forces protecting it.

/lotus/language/spacemelee/archaxedesc.name: This laser bladed battle-axe easily hacks through a ship's defenses and the forces protecting it.

/lotus/language/spacemelee/archswordshie.name: Part sword, part shield, the Centaur excels at charging headlong into enemy fire.

/lotus/language/spacemelee/prismaarchswo.name: PRISMA VERITUX
/lotus/language/spacemelee/prismaarchswo.desc: A rare object of beauty, this Archwing sword has been sheathed in prisma crystal and baptized in the void’s energy.

/lotus/language/spacemelee/prismaarchswo.name: A rare object of beauty, this Archwing sword has been sheathed in prisma crystal and baptized in the void’s energy.

/lotus/language/spacesuits/stealtharchwi.name: ITZAL
/lotus/language/spacesuits/stealtharchwi.desc: Designed for quick clandestine attacks, the Itzal Archwing excels at striking from the darkness of space.

/lotus/language/spacesuits/stealtharchwi.name: Designed for quick clandestine attacks, the Itzal Archwing excels at striking from the darkness of space.

/lotus/language/spacesuits/standardarchw.name: ODONATA
/lotus/language/spacesuits/standardarchw.desc: The systems built into this Archwing balance offensive capabilities with defensive countermeasures.

/lotus/language/spacesuits/standardarchw.name: The systems built into this Archwing balance offensive capabilities with defensive countermeasures.

/lotus/language/spacesuits/demolitionarc.name: ELYTRON
/lotus/language/spacesuits/demolitionarc.desc: This heavy duty Archwing was designed for one purpose, destruction.

/lotus/language/spacesuits/demolitionarc.name: This heavy duty Archwing was designed for one purpose, destruction.

/lotus/language/spacesuits/odonataprimen.name: ODONATA PRIME
/lotus/language/spacesuits/odonataprimen.desc: This enhanced version of the first Archwing prototype takes the design to its theoretical limits.

/lotus/language/spacesuits/odonataprimed.name: This enhanced version of the first Archwing prototype takes the design to its theoretical limits.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustageone007.name: Mongrels, Blood-starved Morons - are you ready?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustageone010.name: Grineer, look. Today's Executioners are more brutal than you are ugly. They love their Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustageone012.name: Today's accused are coward deserters. They hate their Queens so much, they're using Tenno to defend them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustageone014.name: What more do you need to know?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustageone017.name: Maybe they're too smart for their own good. Not something you maggot-minds will need to worry about.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagethree0.name: It's round 3, the accused still live and the Tenno still fight. Color me disappointed.
Executioners, show these genetic rejects how to kill.
Oh, you should've all been strangled in your tubes.
Come on, Executioners, you're flopping 'round like dying skates out there. It's embarrassing.
Are you going to make me do this myself?
No, no, no. This is not what was supposed to happen. The Steel Meridian have not been pardoned. This is not over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagetwo021.name: Grineer, you sweet belligerent savages, are you hungry for justice?!

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagetwo023.name: Is that…? Looky here, the Tenno are back? My my, these snakes crave sunshine today.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagetwo024.name: Do you one-thought-wonders want to see the traitors cry?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagetwo026.name: Do you want to see them torn to pieces?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagetwo028.name: Oh, I knew it, Grineer, that's exactly what you genetic-rot-bags are gonna get!

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagetwo035.name: Do I have to do every damn thing myself?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustagetwo036.name: Some performance Executioners. Just think, what if we cloned all future Grineer from your stock, hmm, the system would go Corpus within the week.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drukelafight08.name: Tenno, you really want this? Fine, let's do this.
Should I show them what we do to cheaters?
I can tell you understand what an honor this will be, to have your tiny necks snapped by THE Kela De Thaym. That's why you're so eager. I can appreciate that and so does my audience.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drukelafight09.name: Snakes, you can be part of my story, but I don't think you'll like the ending.
Come now, Tenno, can't hit harder than that?
I'll be back, right after these missiles.
Let's pickup where we left off.
This is MY show, my audience. I call the shots. Who do you think you are?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drukelafight10.name: I'm losing my patience, Tenno. No more playing.
Ah, Stop, Tenno... I can make you famous.
Tenno, listen. I can help you. Become an Executioner. You can kill all the Grineer you want!
You maggot-minded-mongrels, they're the enemy! Not me!
Silence! Who said you could boo me?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drukelafight11.name: Cut the feed. Cut the feed.
You can't kill me, I'm Kela De Thaym, dammit.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druadvertismen.name: Listen up, scum! Idiots! Rotting freaks of our great war machine!
Captured deserters have cried for Rathuum. Do you know what that means? Trial by combat!

/lotus/language/subtitles/druroundstart0.name: Eyes wide, you fish-brained, meat-shields, it's time for more Rathuum!

/lotus/language/subtitles/drathuum0661ke.name: What a performance. I can feel your hunger, like you want to rip that Contenders throat with your teeth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupoverinvali.name: Invalid request. There are no security protocols active.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bossbipedambul.name: The newest entry into the Corpus AI security arsenal is a deadly biped dubbed Ambulas. We have tracked the prototype to this ship. Locate and eliminate it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bosskeladethay.name: Kela de Thaym holds a position of influence in the Grineer Court. Eliminating Kela should create a power vacuum  inside the Grineer leadership and weaken Grineer influence in this system.
Kela is a product of the Sisters. She is built for combat. Much of her body has been replaced with combat augmentations. Approach her with caution.
I'm detecting a bio-mechanical signature nearby. Be ready for anything.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrelayend520.name: Clem is very glad you saved him from certain death.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrelayend540.name: ...oh yeah, and that you got his Grakatas back too.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrelayend560.name: And I'm happy to have this fancy Orokin relic. Here's a little something as a symbol of our appreciation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrelayend570.name: Thanks again Tenno, and don't be a stranger, okay?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrelaystart0.name: Ah Tenno, you got my message?
Listen, I have a little job for you. Interested?
So Tenno, you up for a little job on the side?
The Grineer have gone to far, they're about to execute one of my most trusted contractors.
They say he is a 'traitor' and that he was trying to 'steal' a 'priceless artifact'. Baseless accusations. That's not the kind of business I engage in!
So what do you say, will you help him out? And don't worry, you'll get paid too.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue010da.name: These clods are holding my contractor somewhere in this complex. Please find him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue020da.name: Every so often they mess up and make a Grineer who doesn't bow down to the Queens. My contractor is such a Grineer…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue030da.name: So be careful not to shoot him in the face when you see him. Okay?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue040da.name: The Grineer, they're waiting for you. Expect some big time resistance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue050da.name: Get to him quick before they do their worst.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue080da.name: NO! CLEM! How could you let this happen???

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue110da.name: Follow the Tenno Clem, they're friends.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue140da.name: No… no Clem… no they don't have your Grakatas. Just… just follow the Tenno. Okay?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrescue170da.name: Clem says thank you for busting him out. Good work.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcretrival180.name: You did it, you got Clem. He's a special guy, you know. Little weird but a hell of a fighter. And that's the thing, he still needs your help to retrieve his custom weapons.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcretrival190.name: You know how important gear can be, so, what do ya say, will you help the little guy out?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcretrival200.name: Clem needs to get back into fighting shape. Find his missing weapons.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcretrival210.name: Poor clem, he's utterly useless without his custom Grakatas…  but with them? Well you'll see.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcretrival250.name: Tenno, Clem wants you guys to go after the Grineer that stole his Grakatas.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcretrival260.name: I'm just going to assume you're up for that. Check your map.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcretrival270.name: Don't think he'll be messing with you again. Come on home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival271d.name: Clem has his Grakatas, now its time to get down to business and liberate that artifact. If you help Clem we can all share in the spoils.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival280d.name: This is it, the merchandise acquisition mission. You and Clem  cause a ruckus while my other operative steals the artifact. Let em know you're here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival290d.name: They cut off life support, you gonna to let them intimidate you like that?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival300d.name: Here comes life support. You know how to work these things, don't you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival400d.name: Hey look, these guys are dropping life support modules all over the place. That's convenient.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival410d.name: It's not the artifact, but look what we got.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival440d.name: You should think about finding a capsule.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival450d.name: It's getting stuffy down there Tenno, turn on some life support.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival460d.name: We got the artifact! The Potent Orokin Technical Augmentation and Tactical Offensive device.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival480d.name: We got what we need, so let's head home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival490d.name: You should extract, now. No, really, you'll die if you don't. Seriously, go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqalmostdead0.name: Ordis, you came to save me… free me.
Please end this. We are endless.
Ordis, you need to know… I lied about Precept 44. I am not the only one. They made me say that, to bait you..  There are so many more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossarch063.name: It is out now, I can't control it. I don't want to.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossarch065.name: Tenno, it senses you are of like flesh, it is confused  why do you defile us?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossarch066.name: It knows you are like that other Warframe  we will quiet them too!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbosscin0600.name: I regret to inform you  this is just the beginning.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbosscin0610.name: Hull failing! To hell with Precept 44, get out of there!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbosscin0620.name: Prepare for Archwing so you can  OBLITERATE THIS THING!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossdefeate.name: Operator, do you think Jordas wanted to die all along? I feel  relieved-conflicted.
What would I have done if I had lost you?
Hurry, I will pick you up at extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossenroute.name: The Pherliac Pods, is that it? I really thought you would have more.  Have you been using them?
What? No. A few, but you said-
That is not enough for him! You are just like all the others. You won't kill the Golem.  I don't want you to.
Jordas, calm yourself, Cephalon to Cephalon, we are here to help.
I see what your doing. You came for the parts. Just like the others. Greedy scavengers. You do not care about Jordas.
I am beginning to have  some doubts about this mission.
What have I got you into?
Feel that? The Golem, he's coming. Get into position.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbosshullfai.name: Operator, hull integrity is failing! This is all my fault!
Operator, I am detecting a much larger infested life form. Much larger...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossjugg047.name: The Golem is here. I am sorry Operator...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossjugg050.name: I told you not to come.  hmmm… pleased they did.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossjugg051.name: Jordas!?  What kind of cephalon are you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossjugg052.name: You have no idea what I am…   JOIN US AND YOU WILL.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossjuggtau.name: I am a Cephalon. I serve my…   You are our voice.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossobj0380.name: The Golem stirring, it knows you are here. I can feel it wake. Find it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbosstaunts0.name: I never wanted this. I want to be somewhere else.  TASTE SOMEONE ELSE.
Don't kill me.  No wait, please do.
NOBODY MAKES A FOOL OF ORDIS, oh dear, where did that come from.
I see it now, you are the same  They fear themselves
Succumb to us.  No keep fighting.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbosstips068.name: Its engines, shoot out the engines.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1001.name: Do I detect a Cephalon near by? Precept 44 compels you to help...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1002.name: ---- Stuff it Jordas --- we've heard it all before. These Operators are here to put you out of your misery.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1004.name: Tenno, this Infested Derelict is bigger than anything we've encountered and I fear the Infestation has some equally big surprises waiting inside.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1005.name: Infiltrate the ship and find a way to destroy it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1006.name: Something in the air is corroding your Warframe. Limit your exposure!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1007.name: My crew and I came here looking for a way to overcome the Infestation…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1009.name: This device appears to neutralize corrosive elements.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1010.name: Is this how the ship's crew hoped to overcome the infestation?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1011.name: You found something of note, I am analyzing. Look for more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1012.name: Is this more anti-infested tech? Keep searching.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1013.name: What's that? I wouldn't touch those if I were you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1014.name: Your path is blocked by Infested overgrowth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1015.name: If you can't clear that overgrowth, then you need to extract and regroup.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1016.name: I've marked your map with an exit point, head there when you are ready.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1017.name: Don't fight it. Just let it win. It's easier that way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1018.name: Blocked. Impassable. No destroying it, believe me, we tried.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1019.name: We need to break through that Infested barrier. Find a way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1020.name: My scans show that console can still activate the ship's system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1021.name: What are you doing. Don't touch that.  LEAVE
My systems are corrupt, destroyed. If I can't use them, you never will.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1023.name: Structural analysis indicates the best way to destroy this ship is by imploding its reactors. Go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1024.name: I've found records showing that Jordas has been luring in unsuspecting ships for a long time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1025.name: Jordas copies his imprint into each new victim ship, while the Golem infests it. This is how it spreads.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1026.name: How long have you been doing this Jordas?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1027.name: Would you keep count, if you were me?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission1028.name: You wouldn't happen to have some Pherliac, would you?
With an adversary like this, my guidance can only take you so far. Your only hope for success is to work with your fellow Tenno and develop new strategies and tactics for defeating this foe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2029.name: Target the central reactor. Go there now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2030.name: The Infestation has mutated every aspect of this vessel. Find a way to destroy the reactor.
You're a foreign body! The Infestation will reject you and spit you out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2031.name: That's a very peculiar looking  -flesh fl...-  Infested growth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2032.name: Operator, should I prepare the Orbiter for disinfection?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2033.name: It appears that purifier can take up to three doses of serum.
You've reached the reactor bay. Take it out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2034.name: That did it. You forced the reactor into a state of rapid deterioration.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2035.name: Get to extraction before it goes critical. Move fast.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2038.name: Reactor deterioration is increasing rapidly. You're not going to get out in time…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2039.name: Careful, this environment is corrosive to your armor and health.
Proximity to an active dispenser will prevent erosion.
Use your injector to prevent Warframe erosion.
That vaporizer can take up to three doses of antiserum.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3041.name: Operator it's time to -torch this- unfortunate creature.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3042.name: Ordis, don't you see, my fate could have been yours, have you no sympathy for…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3043.name: You're not supposed to be in here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3044.name: Operator? Are you really going to touch that thing?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3045.name: I don't recommend touching that Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3047.name: You've done it. The system is a safer place thanks to your efforts here today.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3048.name: Can you use this to your advantage?
This appears to be a vital part of the macro-organism.
Hurry, your armor shields are eroding.
Your archwing will stall and you will be ejected from this tunnel if your shields are depleted. Keep moving.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqafterintro0.name: Precept 44? Oh yes, Ordis remembers. An endangered Cephalon without a backup copy… Operator! If Jordas runs out of power, the Jordas Cephalon will become extinct. As a Cephalon I am obligated to assist! Operator, will you help me?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqafternextmi.name: Please don't come, but if you do, I have a reward.... Another Warframe was defeated here, some of its petrified parts may still remain.
Destroy the infestation, collect his parts and perhaps make him whole again?
Jordas, my Operator is kind and compassionate, not motivated by selfish rewards! By the 44th precept, we will come for you!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom014.name: Operator, I am very worried about Jordas, all stranded and alone out there.  when you're ready.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom018.name: Have you assembled the pods yet? Just wondering? Maybe don't.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqhasnopods00.name: Tenno, are you searching for Pherliac Pods? I do not deserve your help, I will calculate possible repayment.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqhaspods0100.name: Operator. What luck! You already have Pherliac pods.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqpodsconstru.name: The Pods are ready. Tell us your location.
Really? No, they will need calibration.
Any severe infestation should be enough.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqpodsstart02.name: Hold tight Jordas. My brave Operator is coming.
You should not come here. I look forward to... meeting your Operator!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqqueststart0.name: Hello? Is this real? Did someone get my message?  I hope not.
I am Ordis, a fellow Cephalon and this is my brave and honorable Operator. By the 44th Precept, we are ready to assist.
Yes! No.  No, please do not. Contacting you was a mistake.  This infestation is everywhere!
No trouble Jordas, my Operator is no stranger to  eradicating infestations.
The Golem is too strong…  no chance. Wait. Maybe thePherliac Pods? But where would you ever get those? This is hopeless, just go away…
My Precepts compel me to help this Cephalon. Whatever these Pherliac pods are, we need to get some  at your earliest convenience.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqradiatedpod.name: Yes. I cannot wait to meet this Operator! Bring them to Eris. Hurry.  Don't regret this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqafterinbox0.name: I would never abandon a fellow Cephalon but centuries adrift have not been kind. I suppose all Cephalons degrade, don't they?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqextermobj02.name: Use this mission to calibrate your Pherliac Pods, just don't use them all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqextermpodsu.name: I have sent you a blueprint. Irradiating the pods will make something worth bringing here.
Oh, well yes. I suppose this is something my Operator can arrange. /glitch isn't it Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqextermuse03.name: Now would be a good time to try out those pods Operator.
Dangerous but beautiful I can almost taste them, but the Golem needs something more potent.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqradiatedpod.name: Cephalon, we have irradiated the Pherliac pods. My Operator is ready to save you! Do you see how great the Operator is?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0001lot.name: Vay Hek's Fomorian assault on our Relays was devastating but he failed to break us. Now we take the fight back to him. Now we exact justice.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0010vay.name: Look Brothers! The insects have come looking for revenge. There is only one way to deal with insects. FUMIGATION!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0011lot.name: Tenno, that gas is interfering.... communications. You... have to... find a way....

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0020vay.name: Grineer! Crush those Tenno like I crushed their relays.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0030vay.name: Keep those pests away from my Tritium Batteries.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0040vay.name: Those Tritium Batteries are highly volatile. Don't let the Tenno near them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0041vay.name: They've rigged it to explode. Destroy that battery before it blows.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0042vay.name: That's a Tritium Battery. Try not to let radiation kill you, that would ruin all our fun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0050vay.name: Stop them, stop them, STOP THEM NOW!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0060vay.name: Take a deep breath Tenno, you don't have many left.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0070vay.name: Stop them. Destroy those Tritium batteries before they reach the injector.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0080vay.name: Brothers! Fear not the toxin will only bring you glory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0090vay.name: Live like insects, die like insects!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0100vay.name: Tick tock, tick tock, TICK TOCK TENNO.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0110vay.name: Grineer, behold the Tenno. Choking on their own arrogance!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0111vay.name: Nice try Tenno but you'll have to try harder than that to save your puny lives.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0114vay.name: No, my beautiful Toxin Injector, Grineer, how could you let them do this?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0120vay.name: Such a large struggle. Such a small victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0131vay.name: You imbeciles! If you let the Tenno destroy all the toxin injectors then what will destroy them???

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0132vay.name: Not again. Don't let the insects near the remaining injectors.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0135vay.name: Destroy the bomb before it destroys the injector!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0137vay.name: Save the remaining Injectors or die trying. That's an order.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0140vay.name: Imbeciles! Why can't you stop them?!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0150vay.name: This is far far from over!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0160lot.name: Can you read me? It looks like you were able to defeat the toxin. Excellent work. We've got him on the run. Chase him down and deliver Tenno justice.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0010l.name: Tenno, I've detected a strange atmospheric anomaly. It's of Grineer origin and may confer resistances on them. Proceed with caution.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0020l.name: Tenno I have bad news. There are reports of a Balor Fomorian in the system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0030v.name: Your precious relays destroyed. Now...You...JOIN THEM!!!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0040v.name: Stay together insects! So I can crush you all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0050v.name: Now you learn the lesson of failed revenge.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0060v.name: This...  This is the best that you can do? Pathetic!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0090l.name: Tenno, they're setting coordinates for another Fomorian strike!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0100l.name: Nothing can replace the relays we lost, but you have made a statement to the system. Tenno avenge their dead.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnthree0110l.name: You have restored balance to the system - the actions of Vay Hek against the Tenno have been reconciled thanks to your skill and dedication, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0100lot.name: The core will help greatly in defending against future Fomorian attacks, but we must return to our purpose. Hek has retreated to Phobos. Track him down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0010vay.name: Insects taking orders from their Lotus.  Let us see how hard their shells are.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0020lot.name: I have never encountered a security system like this. Tenno, you need to figure out a way to open that door.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0030vay.name: Your only ally is failure. FAILURE!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0040vay.name: Poor Tenno. No Lotus to think for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0050vay.name: This is the force you send to defeat me, Lotus?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0060lot.name: A Balor Fomorian Core! We can use this to draw out Vay Hek. Make sure it reaches extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0070lot.name: Protect this core, Tenno. There is much we can glean from how the Balor Fomorians are powered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0080vay.name: Tenno. So obedient. Doctor Tengus could learn so much from your insides... So I've brought his creations to extract them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsntwo0090lot.name: The Grustrag Three must be eliminated if we are to extract this core.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis200or.name: Just as I suspected, another theorem.  Limbo's formula for inverting the entropic mass of void quantums is downright naughty.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis210or.name: I want more. Operator,  please hurry, this story is getting quite good.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis220or.name: This Limbo was quite mischievous, zipping in and out of the rift. Sending whole armies into a purgatory of his own making, physics is wonderful.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis230or.name: More parts to the story. My word, he is a magician of logic. Just when I think his diffraction principle is full of dangling ratios, he expresses his dynamic constant in pure numbers. I never saw it coming.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis240or.name: The final part. I cannot wait. What harrowing leaps of cross-dimensional gymnastics will he attempt next?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis250or.name: Excellent, the final Theorem and its unfragmented. Processing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis260or.name: Oh, Wait, Limbo, no that's a mistake, you don't want to go there. It's too big a jump. You can't rift walk… ohh. Oh no.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqchasis270or.name: Operator, I think I know why we're finding Limbo parts scattered throughout the system. His final rift walk was a miscalc... disaster. Well, perhaps when you occupy this frame, you will use more… caution.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet010or.name: So, this 'Limbo Theorem' you picked up, it's supposed to lead to a new Warframe? Well, it's woefully incomplete? Half-written proofs, unfinished equations, what idiot wrote this mess??

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet020or.name: Okay. Okay. go to your nav console, I have an idea. There is one thing here, a constant, a tuning frequency but it's so minute, the Orbiter's antenna would never be able to… unless… go to your nav console, I have an idea.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet050or.name: These equations will continue to be a jumble of nothing until we recover all the missing proof fragments and reforge this Theorem.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet060or.name: If you want to have any chance of recovering Limbo, you have to find those proof fragments to complete the Theorem.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet070or.name: Good, now we get to find out what all this Limbo nonsense is about. I await the Theorem's completion.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet080or.name: Okay, good, you've… wait… the horizon mass cannot be not inverted to this is preposterous!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet090or.name: Operator, I'm sorry. You did all this work and this so called Theorem is still completely invalid. It's as if all these proofs point to nothingness it's just  utterly irrational!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet100or.name: There's only one valid coordinate in the entire proof, I've marked it on your navigation console but I'm sure it's a waste of time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet110or.name: A Limbo part blueprint! The Theorem wasn't complete malarkey after all. Perhaps there's more to these equations than I previously thought,  what am I missing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqinterclaims.name: They're on to us now but if you would like, we can attempt another scan.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqintermissio.name: If there are any proof fragments bouncing around this

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqinternewrou.name: We will attempt another scan of the frequency. I do hope you manage to pick something up.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqinterobjrei.name: Operator, do you think anyone will mind if we borrow these for a while?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqintersucces.name: The scan is complete. Did you find any Proof Fragments?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems120o.name: Operator, I found a new theorem hidden deep in that Warframe part. These are actually starting to make sense, I mean they're nonsense but there's logic in the nonsense. It's almost as if someone's trying to speak to me in my own language.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems130o.name: This new theorem is equally full of gaps, please, find more proof fragments.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems140o.name: What is he trying to say? My apologies, operator, I get a little worked up when it comes to physics.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems150o.name: Please do find the rest of those proofs. I must solve these equations, the suspense is killing me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems160o.name: Now it's becoming clear. Could it be that there's a plane between our normal plane and the void? A space between space, a rift? A rift that this Limbo could control?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems170o.name: Oh and I've marked your navigation console, I think you'll be quite pleased with what you find there.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems180o.name: Operator do you understand, this Limbo is telling us his story in pure math, and I must say, he's quite witty.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqsystems190o.name: You have to forge that blueprint as soon as possible. I must know what comes next.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00010ba.name: ...What they need, Margulis, is to be destroyed! They're devils from that hell, not human anymore.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00020ma.name: No, Ballas, no more destruction. We could heal them. Maybe they're meant to save us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00030ba.name: How can you defend these devils, Margulis, after what they've done to you?!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00040ma.name: Love looks not with the eyes but with the mind. They won't hurt anyone, I just need more time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00050ba.name: Hush, my wilted love. I cannot protect you. Tomorrow you must renounce before the seven…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00060ma.name: This will stop the voices from taking hold. You will have to dream, my angel…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00070ma.name: …so shame on you! You Orokin, so perfect on the outside but you're rotted... through and through!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00080ba.name: Seven hands raised! For your apostasy the judgement is… death. Margulis, why?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00090ba.name: …it's about the other rejects we consigned to Lua a few years ago. They're calling it… Transference.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00100ba.name: ...I know we are desperate, Executor, but these aren't Dax soldiers. These are golems possessed by devil minds.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dechoes00110ma.name: Dream… not of what you are, but of what you want to be...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dneurograms000.name: I have been transferred to the Lua facility, for a project they'll tell me nothing about. ;When I first heard I thought somehow the bureau had discovered our… relationship and this transfer was to keep it from getting out, ;but I arrived to find the survivors of Zariman that everyone is talking about. Extraordinary. ;This research will define my career.

The mystery of the Zariman colony ship has concluded, its derelict found near Eris. Curiously, only the second generation survivors have been found aboard... There is something wrong with them, but at least someone will pay for what happened to them. We've called the Overseer of the Zariman project to the dome. The vote will be unanimous. Seven hands raised. The death sentence.

The somatics we ran were useless. The subjects have no conscious or subconscious memories about the Void jump accident. ;I sense deep psychological trauma layered on top of the more... alarming abilities they have. ;From what I've seen them do, I'm worried that even the Orokin will develop a fear of these things. ;We need to know more if we are to cure this.

I miss him, but my work with the children is engrossing. ;These subjects are intensely volatile. Energy manifestations, kinetic phenomenon, very dangerous to measure. ;My assistant has transferred out after receiving severe burns working with one of the children. ;As the search for answers drags on their emotional state continues to destabilize. ;Only sedation seems to help slow it down. What if there is no cure? ;We need to explore ways the children themselves can control it.

Margulis' report worries me. I fear the devils, as we call them, have been planting sympathy in her typically clinical mind. Maybe this too, is a power they have? All the Seven agree, the 'Ten-Zeros' present a real threat. We will be implementing permanent measures to resolve this. It is my oath to uphold Orokin Continuity. 'Pig' uprisings are one thing, but devils who can implode a lab with a single thought...

I came to the lab to find the children had neural sentries implanted. I am livid! ;It was done without my knowledge or consent. Well they are in for a surprise. ;No wipe, no signal compliance. The sentries don't work! ;Already, the children have adapted them for communication between their containment cells at night! ;I need a breakthrough before the Orokin escalate this further. ;My research doesn't matter anymore, their lives are at stake.

Since her accident, Margulis has become increasingly irrational in her defense of the devils. ;I worry her lack of stability may reveal our… our past indiscretions and bring shame to my position. ;I will not allow my feelings for her, her captivating imperfections, to cloud my judgement and destroy my status. ;If she continues to defy the Seven, she will be called to the dome.

The project is over. As a last act of defiance I have placed the children into stasis-coma. ;Maybe that will buy them some time? I can hear their voices even now as I travel to the dome of the Seven. ;Last night, when Ballas held me, he had tears in his golden eyes. It was beautiful and terrifying all at once. ;He told me exactly what to say, to renounce my findings and recommend the children be destroyed. ;I promised that I would, that I would never dare confront the Orokin in a public forum. ;He believed me.

We who judge often say: 'Continuity affords no compromise'. ;The vote was six for and one against. This is what I want to believe. ;But… as I watched her vanish forever in that pure jade light, I saw out of the corner of my eye… my own hand was raised. ;Why? The devils did this to her, to us. Even now they shake free of the trap. ;The others still see some application, some utility. ;So for now they will remain frozen under Lua… hidden away like samples of some long forgotten plague.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconclusion000.name: She was gone, but somehow you let her speak again. You made me face my past. Made me remember who I was. Take his relics and let him rise again. I couldn't think of selling them anyway, for me, these few grains of sand are all the treasure I need. Both of us know why Inaros couldn't have saved her. He wasn't able to listen then. But things are different now, am I right?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro00010bar.name: I have a rare opportunity for you. It seems there may be a tomb hidden on that forsaken rock you call Phobos. Tombs mean treasure, and yet sadly, my usual relic hunters are superstitious idiots who refuse to disturb this so-called sacred place. You, Tenno, however, are more pragmatic, especially when it comes to Ducats… am I right?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro00011bar.name: I have a rare opportunity for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel1challe.name: Look at it. It's exquisite. There's an inscription:
I could have never foreseen this, that Vessel, it contains primitive etchings that seem to be a sort of blueprint. Was a Warframe entombed there?
If you want to prove yourself, you're going to need to carry that Burial Vessel in your inventory.
Whatever that Vessel wants you to do, I'm certain it's somehow connected to that smudged glyph.
Tenno, look, the glyph. It's completely clear. And there's a new inscription:

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel1phobos.name: The Grineer took 'pity' on their miserable existence years ago, returning this so-called civilization to the sand. Yet, for some elusive reason, their relics have become quite fashionable and thus valuable. Rare antiquities, that's why we're here.
You can feel the filth and the grit in every breath. This desolate rock is the former colony of backward-thinking sky worshippers. Their stories are worth as much as the sand around you. Nothing.
Ignore these glyphs, nothing but nonsense about their so-called god-king. Inaros, is it? How quaint - the only thing heaven-sent from Inaros will be the price his relics fetch at auction.
A Burial Vessel! It will contain precious relics… There there - you're not defiling a tomb, you're creating wealth!
Hush my little dune. You don't need to be scared. There, there, that's right, shake out the sand, but remember, not all of it... and I'll tell you the story.
Tenno - what is this? How are you doing that?
Long ago, the lands of our colony were cursed, soaked in fear. The Golden Skymen would come and take our children away… Young and old alike, cowered before them, afraid to lose their most beloved.
But then he came. The Fear-eater. The skykiller. He was called… Inaros!
Return to your ship, we must examine this vessel further.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel2challe.name: I'm beginning to think this Inaros myth was drawn from… an actual Warframe?
Oh I see. Another glyph? Another challenge. See if you can figure out which enemy it represents.

This wretched place, why did I even come here? I keep telling myself it was the treasure but… Push it back, stupid Baro, there's no wealth in these memories. Tenno, we need to open that next chamber. Go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel2phobos.name: None of this… none of this could be true. Could it?
I'll be grateful when this is over, I cannot stand this barren place. Even the Orokin could not enlighten those sand skates.
Remember, we're here for relics, not stories, so I'd appreciate if you kept your Tenno soma-void-resonance… 'thing' to a minimum. I've had enough of this culture to last a lifetime.
Take the Vessel to the door. What happens?
Little one, after this you must sleep…
Inaros began not as our King, but as our enemy, a warrior of the Golden Skymen. But for each child the Skymen took away, Inaros grew ever more angry - until one fateful night.

Another child had been taken and the villagers had gathered in a mourning circle, weeping... until they heard a small voice. By the dunes! It was the child, returned! As he approached the people gasped in horror as they saw that he was drenched in blood.

His father rushed to the boy and embraced him - and saw that he had no wounds. Whose blood is this, he asked? The boy looked to the sky and said - this is the Blood of the Skymen. This is the work of Inaros.
By the sand and stars, the Skymen raged. They set upon Inaros with their armies but none could prevail... for he commanded the sand, he commanded death. Inaros ate their fear and became stronger.
And so they left us, and took with them our fear. On that day, Inaros became our King and, in a great whirlwind of sand, ascended to watch over us from his throne in the sky.
What if? It… It can't be.
Watch-out, you've just been shut in.
That voice, return to your ship. I… I must collect myself.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel3challe.name: The story isn't just a myth, is it?
Look at this sacred vessel, one of four, just as she described. And the challenges, you must prove you're Tenno.
The Grineer are returning in force! Tenno, I don't care about the money anymore, just stop those dogs from getting Inaros!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel3phobos.name: By the Void, the Grineer have picked up our scent. They'll take me … uh - it … Inaros! You have to stop these animals at once!
So where is she? That voice? I… I think I need to hear the rest. I think I've needed to hear this for a long time.
And so for years we lived in peace and our little dunes were our own to keep. But the sands of peace are ever-shifting. Years later a plague came to the desert. The Infested.

Desperate, our people called out to sky: Inaros! Inaros! But they could not wake him… and so they were consumed by the ravenous horde. With all lost, the few remaining villagers gathered in the mourning circle to prepare for the end... when suddenly, a storm rose about them… A colossal spiral storm of sand, piercing the sky! The villagers huddled, trapped within the storm's eye as the beasts charged them... In moments the beasts were torn apart and the Infested plague was swept away, never to be seen again. As the storm subsided the people ventured out into the desert, hoping to catch a glimpse of their saviour, their beloved Inaros...

They found his glorious metal body, broken and still, lying in the sand. Did they mourn? No. They knew his spirit had returned to the sky to watch over them, once again. They gathered his body to keep it safe from thieves and raiders. They placed the pieces within sacred vessels and entombed them in secret… knowing that one day Inaros would reclaim his body and rise again.
So now my sweet dune, you have no need of fear. Take these grains, and keep them under your pillow. Inaros will watch over you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel4phobos.name: Cut them down, make them fear this place. The Grineer should be swept away.
Quickly, my sweet dune, they're coming…
I tried so hard to forget.
Quickly, in here. Don't make a sound, Baro. Here. Hold these grains in your hand, tight. Inaros will protect you.
It wasn't me I was worried about.
What do you want? No. You have no right!  No - it's just me.
You've shown me why I came here, Tenno. Not for riches.
The doors are closing again. Prove that you are worthy of Inaros's strength. One last time.
My mother's call will be answered. Inaros will rise again. Come home, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawakenedintro.name: I'm confused… I thought I was…
My child… so beautiful to behold. How do you feel?
I'm confused… I thought I was…
I'm confused… I thought I was…
I'm confused… I thought I was…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiona0004.name: A jumble of words, numbers... I must have known everything about Tau. Our teacher loved when I corrected her.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiona0003.name: I know. Forgive me. This is who you really are. A Tenno. More than human… but once a child like any other. What do you remember?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionb0007.name: Memories. From your time aboard the Zariman Ten Zero, before the Void-Jump accident. It was years before the ship was recovered. It was drifting dead in space, all her crew gone… except the children.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionb0008.name: I didn't want to live anymore. I felt guilty that I was alive, but we could do things, extraordinary things. ;Maybe there was a reason we survived?
I didn't want to live anymore. I felt guilty that I was alive, but we could do things, extraordinary things. ;Maybe there was a reason we survived?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionc0011.name: You were so brave - but the Orokin were afraid of you. The Void had changed you and you couldn't control it, no one could. They were about to destroy the orphans of Ten-Zero but Margulis... she loved you, she found a way...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionc0012.name: She put us into the dream, brought us peace. ;I remember we could still hear her voice, raging at the leaders for their mistreatment of us. ;When they executed her… well… I could not let that go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionc0013.name: We couldn't help it, the outbursts. ;We hurt her, blinded her, but even then, she never abandoned us. ;In the dream we found peace, and she sang to us in that cold, dark...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionc0014.name: In dreams we could control it, focus it. So she made the pods, her favourite flower… she said sometimes… something beautiful can grow out of something ugly.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiond0016.name: The Orokin murdered Margulis - used her work to create 'Transference'. Your mind - projected into a surrogate, strong enough to withstand your power. It felt like waking up, but it was just a lucid - second dream

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiond0017.name: Maybe we felt it? Maybe it didn't matter. ;We had a life! We embraced it. ;I wanted to punish those who abused their power and now I had a way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiond0019.name: We sensed that otherness, but we embraced it. I was free as anything! ;Free to learn, to experience, to mean something.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiond0020.name: It was a shadow underneath what we did. ;That sensation of being a victim, of being helpless. ;I took up the sword to protect those in need.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestiond0021.name: There was a sense of it, but we set fear aside. ;I remembered what fear did. How it turned them against us. ;I vowed never to be controlled by it. I was going to live, or die, with honor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestione0022.name: And so you became Tenno. Serving the Orokin… but bound by honor. As the Tenno grew, they founded great schools. The Tenno Ways. Do you see yours?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestione0023.name: I see a tree, of many branches, the Naramon Way. Our discipline focused on Knowing The Enemy. ;We believed that to truly understand a foe would confer the greatest advantage upon a warrior.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestione0024.name: I see a crystal, refracting the moonlight, the Way of Zenurik. ;We believed the path to victory was to Dominate the Enemy. ;That strength of spirit could overcome any resistance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestione0025.name: I see a cresting wave, wide in the ocean, the Vazarin Way. ;We were trained to Counter The Enemy, and move with an opponent's attacks in order to nullify them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestione0026.name: I see a mountain, breaking the sky. The Way of Unairu. ;We pushed ourselves to Outlast The Enemy, to withstand all aggression without bending.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestione0027.name: I see a cloud, a gathering storm… the Madurai Way. ;Our path was to Engage The Enemy… to sweep across our foes before they had a chance to steel themselves.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionf0028.name: But we have so much more to do. Here in the Orbiter Transference will be even stronger. Command the Warframes… Make whole, this shattered world you've been given. Are you ready, Tenno?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dquestionf0030.name: I need to think through it again.
I need to think it through again.
I need to think through it again.
I need to think it through again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextmmidhlwn01.name: I'm still picking up signs of the Infested.  Keep hunting.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextmendhlwn01.name: The outpost is clean, proceed to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextmstrthlwn0.name: Sensors show this Outpost is crawling with Infested.  Exterminate the threat.

/lotus/language/subtitles/daftercolourch.name: Ordis did not think the Operator could be more attractive. Wrong again, Ordis!
An unexpected color combination, Operator. My sensors are bleeding-- pleased.
A fearsome appearance, Operator. You will strike terror in your enemies.
Strange. Ordis did not see the value of those photonic wavelengths until now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dafterloadout2.name: Excellent armaments, Operator. Please return covered in blood-- safe and sound.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dafterloadout3.name: If I may say, Operator, your choice Warframe suits you  haha!
Well put together Operator now get out there and cut down the-- and make the Lotus proud.
Operator, you have remembered well how the Tenno arm themselves.

/lotus/language/subtitles/daftermodbench.name: Did you fuse your Mods, Operator? Did they anger you in some way?
Your collection of Mods is impressive, Operator.. but I wonder if there are more to be had?
Is your mod collection in order? No, I am not equipped to feel envy.
All Mods accounted for, Operator. I have not taken any.
I understand if you have to sell Mods. Maybe Ordis will meet a similar fate someday.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry161ord.name: Operator, my Foundry system has completed a build!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry162ord.name: Ordis has completed a Foundry task. No, don't mention it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry163ord.name: Cephalon Ordis has completed a blueprint. Check the Foundry!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry164ord.name: Foundry items can be claimed, Operator. Are you pleased?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry165ord.name: Gun-gun-gun-- Hmmm… foundry has items for you, Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle420ordis.name: I understand if you have to sell Mods. Maybe Ordis will meet a similar fate someday.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle430ordis.name: Operator! Did you hear that? It said-- Cosmic background radiation is a riot!

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle440ordis.name: Hmmm… Ordis thought the Orbiter compartment was much larger than this…

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle450ordis.name: Operator, were you visualizing a bloody battle?  Me too.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle460ordis.name: Ordis has been thinking about the Old War. I remember there were lies, but I'm not sure what they were.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle470ordis.name: Operator, I hope you are comfortable? No… we do not seem have any seats.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle480ordis.name: Stand by while I analyze the intelligence profiles of the Grineer. Error! Not a number! Did the Operator enjoy this witticism?

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle490ordis.name: Operator, I will never betray you. I will keep the Orbiter hidden in the void. You can count on me!

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle500ordis.name: Operator, I've been thinking. My misplaced memories and damaged communication systems. What if.. Ordis did those things?

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle510ordis.name: Everything in Ordis, Operator? Is that a pun?! Hmm... I will attempt to bypass this fault.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle520ordis.name: Ordis has been counting stars, Operator. All accounted for.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didlesen520ord.name: Maintain the habitat. Maintain the Operator. Mobilize the Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didlesen530ord.name: You are the Tenno. You are the Operator. Ordis is the Cephalon. Ordis is the ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didlesen540ord.name: Do not lift the veil. Do not show the door. Do not split the dream.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinbox191ordis.name: Operator, messages have arrived in your Inbox.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinbox192ordis.name: Messages in your inbox, Operator. Uh… they are not as encrypted as they should be.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinbox193ordis.name: Unread inbox messages make me ill.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketingeven.name: Operator, Ich habe alle Ihre Warframes mit Lederhosen ausgerüstet. Ein frohes Oktoberfest!
A mí la muerte me pela loss dientes.  Y no tengo dientes. Feliz día de los muertos

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome051ord.name: Ordis awaits command.  Who dies-- what are your next moves, Operator?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome052ord.name: Hello Operator! Ordis has reorganized the ship…  It's exactly the same!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome053ord.name: Operator! It's really you! Are you getting revenge for-- preparing for your next mission?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome054ord.name: All systems are in peak condition, just like the Operator!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome055ord.name: Ship Cephalon awaiting orders. I am hearing voices-- in perfect working order!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsdatafound00.name: Ah, yes, exactly what I'm looking for.  Now, if I cross-reference the signal inversions from this stream with the…  wait, why am I telling you this?
You know, these Acolytes won't be easy marks. No one shot kills here. It's going to take an army of you to dispose of just one.
Yes. This is exactly what I wanted... Tenno, make your way to extraction but watch out for those pesky Acolytes.
That's what we're looking for.  Why do these Acolytes come for me? I've done nothing to them! But don't worry, I will.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsdataobj0020.name: Those Acolytes have been through here, I can just feel it. Find the security data.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsdataobj0030.name: Tenno, I'm glad you didn't 'forget' the favor I'm owed. Looks like your 'virtuous nature' has it's benefits… for me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsdataobj0040.name: I know you'll find me that data because it's in your best interest. If these Acolytes get me, you'll be next.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsdataobj0050.name: Don't just stand there, find me that security data.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsdefendalad0.name: Enough! You will regret your past crimes...
Friends, comrades, Tenno, I think we made them angry. I need help. Hurry!
Perhaps I got a little too confident. Help me out, why don't you? Then we'll call it even. Hmm… fineprint.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsfirstloc010.name: There. An Acolyte, do you see it?  Do what you can and I'll call in your shiny friends.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddigsitemissio.name: I know, I know, our past has been slightly… what… combative? But genocidal invaders from the other system make strange bedfellows, wouldn't you say?
The Sentient Hunhow, nightmare of the Orokin, boogey man to the Corpus. That thing must have your Lotus in quite a panic for her to be working with the likes of me.
So this Stalker, seems like he's made quite a powerful friend, hasn't he? I wonder what's under that scary, smoky exterior. A heart of gold, perhaps?
Listen Betray- Tenno, you're near the dig-site. Of course I could just tell you where it is... but what fun would that be?! Keep your eyes peeled… if you have eyes that is.
I give up! It's here. I swear, can you find anything that's not marked right on your map?
Are these the bones you're looking for, Lotus?
Yes. This is it, a fragment of... of my father, destroyed in The Old War. I can use it to see him...
I see the Stalker, stronger... Hunhow's voice within him. I see the Reservoir, but I feel confusion, he doesn't know… unless… Oh no-
Thank you, daughter. Fear has baited you to the snare.  What was secret is now known. Your Tenno, their touch, I now see the Womb of the sky. My Shadow now walks the path.
What have I done? Get out of there, Tenno..
Yes hurry Tenno but be careful, last time you got close with the Sentients you wiped out an entire civilization… but you don't remember that, do you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfollowstalkmi.name: See, I told you I would protect my investment.
When you connected to Hunhow's fragment, Hunhow saw a path to the Reservoir that led through here. He cannot reach it alone, he needs The Stalker to do it for him.

You must be asking, Alad, what's in this for you? It's simple really. I scratch your metal back and you scratch mine. All the credits in the system aren't worth half as much as a Tenno owing you a favor!
A Void gate? These things never made sense to me.
You're smart, Tenno, you'll figure out how to open it again, won't you?
This needle pierces the sky. Natah, will we find the Tenno heart within? These puppets will not stop me. I will attack in many forms...
In over your head? Allow me.
Impressive! These Sentient fighters adapt to damage. I'd love to crack one open and see what makes it tick!
Incredible. The Stalker has built Void keys! Use this one to reopen the portal before more Sentient fighters come, the Void is poison to them.
Go on Tenno, open that gate, I'm just dying to know what's on the other side.
Cross the threshold, go now, the Sentients cannot follow.
Oh... don't you just hate that feeling? Makes my stomach flip. Let's see where you've landed, find a nav console.

Sweet profit, The Moon exists? It was… it was in the Void all along? I knew the Lotus was powerful but this… she erased history! We thought it was destroyed all this time. My my, Lotus, you make a fine villain!
And the Reservoir with it, very clever Natah. Shadow, your path is clear.
Hunhow's found it. The Reservoir, hidden in the Void, a place Sentients can never reach. We must do everything to keep it there. It's the only way to keep the Tenno's power alive.
Found the Reservoir? As unpleasant as our past is, I have to ask, I've seen inside a Tenno and what I found didn't make sense. Does this Reservoir conceal some great deception?
Everything I have done, was done to protect them. The Void is forbidden to the Sentients, it's our only protection against them destroying the Tenno. Do not let Alad distract you from your mission!
Oh? They don't know the truth either, do they? How sweet. The betrayers get what they deserve... lies from their omnipotent mother!
I have detected a ship leaving the Tower. It's the Stalker, he's on his way to The Moon! You need to find a way to get off this tower and on to The Moon.
It seems to me that this Tower is dedicated to masking The Moon's location in the Void. Why not disable the mask, so that claptrap Ordis can pick them up? Or is that too complicated for you?
That's it Tenno, shut down this power grid so that your mouthpiece Ordis can lock onto your location in the Void.
Keep talking Orokin called Alad V, your silence soon comes.
Come now Tenno, even a child could figure this system out.
You did it, the Void mask is crumbling.
Operator? How did you get through to me? Don't worry, Ordis is on his way now! Preparing for extraction.
The sky will be as it was meant. The Shadow returns The Moon. The Reservoir swells with Tenno blood. The Old War... finally ends.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfollowstalkor.name: Tell me, Lotus what is this Reservoir?  Some hidden Tenno weakness?
Goodbye Alad. You've earned your favor, we'll take it from here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrinarchivemi.name: The Grineer expedition has uncovered pieces of Hunhow. Fragments of his body. For Hunhow, every part of him is connected to his singular mind. Is this how he's invading my mind?
This datavault has already been raided, the data is damaged but there could be a message here. I need another data sample to piece it together.
The Tenno hive has corrupted your precepts. With love, I will destroy them and make you right again..
You will never find them, Hunhow.
But I see your mind, I already have found them. You owe me their lives.
Hunhow is in my mind. I will need to limit my communication with you...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrinarchiveor.name: Tenno, you are in danger. Let me show you what I have seen...

The Sentient Hunhow has grown strong again and his thoughts have invaded my own. Worse still, he has enlisted the Stalker to find the Reservoir, a weak point of all Tenno, a place I hid long ago. I fear the Stalker is on the cusp of finding this place, do not let this happen.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorbiterreturn.name: I don't know how much time you have. Descend into the heart of your Orbiter, there you will find the Somatic Link.
Get past him, get to the Link.
Focus your energy, get past the Stalker.
Focus, Tenno, use your energy to breathe life into the Somatic Link.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinorokinnurs.name: Get to extraction, save yourself, Tenno!
Tenno… Operator, you're awake now, but you're more vulnerable than ever. Get back to your ship, now.
Tenno, focus, find the power within yourself.
<PRE_ATTACK> You need to focus your mind to unleash your true power.
Keep moving, the Orbiter is the only safe place for you now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsaveresmissio.name: We saved The Moon from a Void collapse but Hunhow can now attack the Reservoir directly. He must not reach this sacred place.
Shadow, bleed the Reservoir until it is desert dry.
Lotus, join with me, destroy your shame. Become the one I love, become Natah once more.

Well look at you Tenno, so good to see you haven't turned into a mindless husk of metal. I'm just here to remind you of your obligations to me. I don't need anything right now, but I will soon… very soon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsaveresorbite.name: The Moon is back in normal space but the Reservoir is in more danger than ever. Hunhow will send his fighters and the Stalker is still coming for you. Move now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsavemoonmissi.name: The Stalker is heading toward the Void Control room. Track the-
Collapse the Void, Shadow, so that my Fragments may attack. The Tenno hearts will beat their last.
Hiding The Moon in the Void, quite the magic trick Lotus. But Tenno, you must be asking yourself, where is this heart, if not in my chest?
It is done.
The Moon will soon be crushed by the weight of the Void. The sky will be as it should be.
Void Collapse? Oh no, it would be such a shame to lose The Moon so soon after finding it. Of course, you could just put it back in its rightful place, couldn't you Lotus?
Activate that console and I will begin my work.
There are three Void Compasses that steer The Moon within the Void. I will disconnect them from the central system to gain control. Supply them with power from your shields while I finish my task.
Tenno, I believe you've already met Zanuka.
Natah, you trust this Orokin blood who would chisel weapons from our bones?
You cannot stop the inevitable.
The Void Compasses are all disrupted but there is one more step. Get to the Pendula, hurry.
What was that?
Orokin, the noise you make will cease now, and forever.
These Pendula keep The Moon stable in the Void. Power them down.
Security Eye! Watch out.
You cannot shut down the Pendula with that thing attacking you.
Wait, the Security Eye just destroyed a Pendula. Try and trick it into taking out the rest.
That's it, they eye is taking out the Pendula. Keep it up.
Another Pendula down.
Last one.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsavemoonorbit.name: The Moon. Somehow Ordis actually remembers the last time I was here. Concern for the Operator is at critical levels.
The suspense is killing me! Lotus you have to tell us your secr- Hey, don't cut me off-

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0400.name: The Grineer have plunged these depths and awakened an old evil submerged here. Capture the Sergeant, he will know where this tomb is.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0410.name: Teshin! You don't have the authority. You are endangering the Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0420.name: So… the petals have opened once more. But why now? Afraid of what we'll find?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0430.name: I had to cover my tracks. But I see that Teshin has been leading you into an even greater danger.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0440.name: The beast soon stirs, Lotus, revealing much. It will awaken and become whole again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0460.name: You know this one, don't you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0470.name: He knows where the tomb is - apprehend him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0480.name: We have our target. Advance to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0490.name: Speak, Lotus. The pieces are set. It is your move.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapture0500.name: Tyl Regor must be stopped from entering the tomb. I have to risk exposure to stop him. Go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0790.name: A focused blast could release the magma flows beneath and rebury the tomb. Protect the bomb during its lengthy arming process.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0800.name: Destroy this tomb? Destroy our history? Vandals!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0810.name: Those who pilfer meat from lions are either foolish or starving, which are you Regor?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0820.name: Natah, why did you betray me? Why did you not finish the sequence you started? Why did you stop at the last?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0830.name: What is it talking about Lotus?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0840.name: We crossed the gap, wombs in ruin, to bring an end to this. We severed the worlds, let them destroy me, why is the sequence not complete?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0850.name: Most intriguing, Lotus, do you two have a history?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0860.name: My own daughter. The last of my womb. How can you do this?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0870.name: Lotus. What are you not telling us?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0890.name: Hold on Tenno, it's almost armed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0900.name: You betrayed us. As I awake, so will they. They will say you're riven and want to reclaim you. I will not be able to stop them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0910.name: Finish the sequence and I will forgive you. Fail at this and you will be reclaimed by your own Father.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0920.name: The bomb is armed. I'm pulling you out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0930.name: Natah? Lotus? You cannot hide this past any longer-

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0940.name: There are gaps. I had my mission and I have completed it. All but the last sequence.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0960.name: The war was over. So I hid them away in the second dream. I could not destroy them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0970.name: And yet you were born to. So tell me... What made you stop? To reject your nature?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0980.name: All missions to the Origin system required a sacrifice. Me and my kind become barren when crossing the gap. It is the one flaw that we never overcame.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense0990.name: Natah wanted children of her own.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqdefense1000.name: Natah was the daughter until I destroyed her. Now I am the Lotus. Now I am the mother.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqmobiledefen.name: I have found that which wanted to be hidden. Advance to extraction.
The ghost you saw is of a menace long thought dead. They study us, study our enemies. Let us sharpen our knowledge of them.
Are these ghosts mere echoes of the past? Or are they more sinister, harbingers, calling for the old beast to awake.
Here, this console will serve my purpose. Unlike your Lotus, I will not keep its secrets from you.
Exercise your training, defend the console.
I have what I seek. Move on.
My task is complete but the puzzle calls for one last piece. Advance to the final console.
This is it, the answers we seek lie within.
Use this combat to sharpen your blades, I predict you will need them in coming battles.
This Grineer is smarter than the others. More volatile. We need to be cautious.
Find his Sergeant, pupil. He will lead us to this 'tomb'.
