/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqpostquest10.name: Tenno, you know where Tyl is. When you are ready, destroy him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqprequest002.name: I am sensing some signal masking. It will take some time to decypher. Concentrate on your mission for now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqprequest001.name: Tenno? What did you see? My data stream went dark.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqprequest003.name: I didn't get any data on that drone you saw. It could be a new Corpus design. If the Corpus have synthesized elements of the Arcane Codices and combined them with their technology… it may explain why the signal was blocked for me. We must investigate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqprequest004.name: I have just detected signatures matching the new drone. Gather scans of it to determine its origin and capabilities.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqscanmission.name: It's… it's just Old War wreckage. Why are the Corpus suddenly interested in it?
I've marked the signatures on your map. Gather scans but approach with caution, Tenno.
It doesn't seem very interested in you. Try to get a scan of what it's collecting, it may reveal its purpose.
Tenno, another scannable signature just appeared near you. We may be able to determine what the Corpus are up to.
I'm not getting a signal but if you've found a drone, scan it before it notices you.
Your scan is too fragmented. I will compensate, please get another.
This thing is not a Corpus design. If you can get another scan, I can determine its origin.
Tenno, I need you to scan another drone.
Good! I'm putting the stream together now - it's … it's an Oculyst? That means… I'm sorry, Tenno, stay safe-
Hello? Did the Lotus just abandon the Operator  get cut off? I have extraction ready. I think you should hurry.
Operator. Ordis knows what it is like to be abandoned. Don't worry, someone has offered to help us!
So, pupil, the spring has ended. The Lotus blossom has snapped shut, her true nature revealed. Now we shall see if codependence can be broken. Let us begin to unravel her long-hidden truth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival059.name: It's not a tomb Regor… it's a cage. If you open it-

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival051.name: Get to the waypoint, I will give you further instructions when you get there.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival052.name: You've reached the waypoint. Access this system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival054.name: Little lizards can't resist another chance to get their sticky hands in my jar.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival055.name: Tyl's cut off life support. Hold on Tenno. I am readying extraction but this will take time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival056.name: The Sentient… the destroyer? The liberator? Depends on who you ask… But this, this thing is certain: I will have its secrets.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival057.name: Pupil, maintain your balance. The enemy is zealous for your death, let them find only their own.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival058.name: Funny, isn'it Tenno? I'm cracking open the Sentient's tomb and sealing yours at the same time. Not laughing? I dunno, I find it funny.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival060.name: Is that Teshin? So  the pseudo-Tenno lives… still drunk on your own honor? Shocked it hasn't rotted you through yet.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival061.name: So… the Sentient… nasty thing. Came from where? Who cares. They smashed the Orokin… freed us! How, how'd they do that? I want to know.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival062.name: Drilling… hundreds of hours and just cracking through the sarcophagus now. Open wide.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival063.name: Entering, it's massive, empty. But where are they? Did they escape? Wait… what's this…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival065.name: Look! Exilus, some primordial Forma? An engine for self-manipulation, what will it do for me?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival071.name: Natah… where are you? You cannot hide from me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival073.name: Natah who have you become? Does this form remind you of what you once were? Time has carried my seed so very far from the branch.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival074.name: Extraction ready. Leave now. Get out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival075.name: Pupil, what is your Lotus hiding? Who is Natah?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival076.name: My name, my old name. It is not who I am now. We need to focus on now, not history. We need to seal the tomb. A blast capable-

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival077.name: The Sentient is awake, Natah. It will not be contained for long.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqsurvival078.name: Do not call me that. Containment will buy us time. Go now, Tenno, I will explain more when you reach the site.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence02.name: You have strayed too far from the path. May this correct you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddisliked0220a.name: You have stepped from the path. Tread carefully.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhated0230arbi.name: A shame to see such potential squandered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0180arbi.name: The Arbiters of Hexis seek truth through trial, and discipline. The Tenno will surpass their former masters.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dloved0260arbi.name: You set the example for the rest of us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrankpos020.name: You are on the verge of a new truth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dopenrepstore0.name: What can we do to help your journey?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsyndalertcomp.name: Well done, Tenno. You truly are honorable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsyndalertintr.name: Your path has led here. Prove yourself, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome0190ar.name: Now begins your path to truth and power.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence04.name: You are a waste and must be erased.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhated0410ceph.name: A perfect specimen of wasted life.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0350ceph.name: You are curious. So am I. Cephalon Suda could help you unfold this strange map of existence.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dloved0440ceph.name: You would make an excellent Cephalon, Tenno!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrank0390ce.name: If this continues I might care if you come to  harm.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrankpos038.name: Advancement imminent. I require more data.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsynalertcomp0.name: Your mission was interesting to me. I express gratitude for this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsyndalertintr.name: What a interesting place. I appreciate you doing this task for me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddisliked0910n.name: It is not too late to cleanse yourself.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhated0920newl.name: You're just like the rest. Tainted and ruined beyond salvation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0870newl.name: New Loka believes that true humanity is the only path to cleanse ourselves of this suffering.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dloved0950newl.name: Your humanity is a beacon for all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrankpos089.name: Give what you can Tenno, to help us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dopenrepstore0.name: We offer these to aid you, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsynalertcomp1.name: You are a bright light, Tenno. You have our deepest thanks.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsyndalertintr.name: Will you help us Tenno and our cause?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence05.name: We Perrin always collect our debts.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddisliked0570p.name: Are you betting against us, Tenno?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhated0580perr.name: The probability of us working together has converged on never.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0530perr.name: The Perrin Sequence reject the Corpus doctrine that conflict is opportunity. We see the numbers differently. A shared prosperity can bring a shared peace.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dloved0610perr.name: We stand behind you. Let's build a brighter future!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrank0560pe.name: Congratulations Tenno on your promotion. Much deserved.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrankpos055.name: We must raise more capital to pursue our goals.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsynalertcomp0.name: Impressive performance, Tenno. We won't forget this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsyndalertintr.name: Your calculated survival probability is encouraging… good luck.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome0540pe.name: The odds are in our favor now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence07.name: How dare you go against us. You will be purged.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddisliked0740r.name: You've become part of the problem.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhated0750redv.name: An enemy in any form is still a target.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0700redv.name: The old ways speak of a cleansing fire. We of the Red Veil must burn away this corruption to begin anew.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dloved0780redv.name: You are a fire. As feared as you are respected.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsyndalertcomp.name: Tenno, Your actions reveal an inner fire. Your enemy's fear grows today.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsyndalertintr.name: It is time for those against us to pay.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhated0050stee.name: You've turned your back on a lot of innocent people Tenno, but what do you care?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0010stee.name: This war's chewin' up the weak and innocent. No one stands up for them but Steel Meridian.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dloved0090stee.name: I was wrong about you. You're a hero to these people… and to me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrank0030st.name: Alright, I'm impressed. You might make a difference in people's lives after all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewrankpos006.name: Are you gonna help these people out?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dopenrepstore0.name: Here's what we can do for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsynalertcomp0.name: Nice work. I like what I'm seeing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsyndalertintr.name: Ok Tenno, a lot of people are depending on you to get this done.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome0020st.name: Alright, you're in. I hope you prove me wrong, I've been burned before.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dblackout00010.name: Tenno, my contact has informed me of a convoy of abandoned merchant vessels drifting in dead space. Seems like such a waste of good product to just leave it floating there when it could be on my shelves instead. Reactivate the navigation consoles, and I can reroute them to a... secure location. After I take down the inventory of each ship, we can share the dividends, minus my usual finder's fee of course.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial680lo.name: Quick, get to the console and release the lockdown. Do that and I will guide you to your old ship. Its your only chance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial681lo.name: Tenno, you need to go to the console to release the lockdown.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutintercepto.name: The segment you need is in a nearby data vault. Infiltrate the vault and retrieve the segment.
This data-vault is equipped with a variety of security measures. How you defeat those measures is up to you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorprize111lo.name: The segment is yours. Head to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgdefectmissio.name: Tenno, defend the Grineer Defector until we can muster a proper extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/darchdemomissi.name: We now have the tools to take on Vay Hek and his Balor Fomorians. His arsenal is growing but so will ours. There are more Archwing designs and more weapons. Together we will take to the skies and confront this new threat.

/lotus/language/subtitles/darchwingdemo0.name: Tenno, tensions between the Grineer and Corpus are boiling over. You're here to find out what the Corpus know.
For too long the Corpus have extorted the Grineer. Frohd Bek, consider our contracts cancelled. This is a hostile takeover!
Not wise, Councillor. I was hoping the Tenno had taught you a little humility when they destroyed your precious Fomorian fleet.
Did you really believe the Tenno destroyed all my Fomorians?
We have a problem... there is.. something breaking from the Void!
Bek! Meet Balor. Your fate, my future!
Impossible... All units, full alert, prepare for boarding...
Tenno, I'm aborting the mission, get to extraction.
Operator! Extraction is impossible during battle  Shall I deploy ARCHWING?

/lotus/language/subtitles/darchwingdemo1.name: We don't have a choice - we'll need to face the Fomorian... Are you ready for this, Tenno?
Returning to Void cloak, Operator.  Make them pay for this!
This Balor-class Fomorian is massive - impervious to damage. Its weapon systems devastate other capital ships. This is what the Archwing was designed for...
Use your Archwing's agility to avoid its cannons. Approach the beast and destroy it from within.

/lotus/language/subtitles/darchwingdemos.name: Operator, kindly keep the enemy  from blowing me out of the sky.
Structural analysis commencing, please be patient.
Analysis continuing  so long as I'm still alive.
And done… transferring analysis to The Lotus and  getting the hell out of here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawol0010ordis.name: Operator, you are leaving the battle if you continue any further I will be forced to extract you and this mission will be a failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawol0020lotus.name: Tenno, are you abandoning this battle? Return to your objective or I will have Ordis extract you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawolextract00.name: Ordis, commence extraction. This mission is over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindcover140l.name: Incoming fire from the Fomorian, find cover.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrineerneteng.name: Energy net! You're stuck in here until you take out that Zeplen.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrineernetnag.name: You have to take out that Zeplen if you want to get out of here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctccapturelef.name: Sun is one point from victory.
Moon is one point from victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcloss0480te.name: The enemy is but a mountain. With each fall you test its surface, learning the footholds needed to reach the summit.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcovertime03.name: Overtime. The next point wins the match.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcovertimeki.name: Overtime. The next kill wins the match.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctctie0510tes.name: A deadlock between the Moon and Sun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcvictory044.name: You impress me, pupil. You are on your way to higher Mastery.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctfintro0011t.name: In times of war, knowledge is the brightest blade. Capture your enemy's Cephalon while defending your own.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser01.name: We cannot hold out any longer!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser02.name: The Grineer want to kill all Tenno...
The Grineer are trying to destroy the Tenno...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser03.name: Help us restore balance to the system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser04.name: Large numbers of Grineer forces have been detected on Mercury.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser05.name: Grineer forces are massing near Mercury.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser08.name: Perhaps you do not remember, but you were once a hero among our kind.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser09.name: The Grineer threaten the entire system, you must rise again to save us!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser10.name: Wake up Tenno, the system needs you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser11.name: I will teach you how to unleash the true power of your Warframe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser12.name: Find yourself in the heat of battle and release your inner power!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchinateaser13.name: Show our enemies what it means to face the Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal01.name: Tenno, it's Darvo Deal time, but you gotta keep this one between you and me.; My competition would be upset if they knew I was selling this stock this cheap. Come to think of it, they'd be upset to know I'm selling this stock at all… they're probably still looking for it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal02.name: Hey Tenno, you're just in time for a very special moving day sale. That's right, I need move all these items off my ship before the next Grineer spot check. What do you say, can you help me out?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal03.name: Tenno, it's your lucky day! I found this great merchandise after it fell off the back of a Corpus shuttle.  Actually, to be more precise, the entire back of the shuttle fell off when it took a direct hit from a Fomorian. So… not such a lucky day for those guys, but good for you, right?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal04.name: Hey Tenno you ready for today's steal… whoa, I mean deal. Today's deal. I really have no idea why I said that, my items are one hundred percent legit. ... I swear.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal05.name: Today only, I'm holding a lost and found sale. A Grineer transport lost it's cargo and you found a great deal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal06.name: Psst, Tenno. I'm going to tell you about today's Darvo Deal but you gotta keep it quiet. Word gets out that I'm offering deals this sweet and suddenly everybody is getting nosey in my business. I like my privacy, so if someone asks, just tell 'em The Perrin Sequence sold it to you. Okay?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal07.name: So, I take an order from Steel Meridian. Problem is it takes a little longer than usual to, how should I put this, 'acquire the merchandise' and just when I finally get the goods together, those cheapskates cancel their order. Taking too long they said. Bah, well I guess you know what that means Tenno, it's Darvo Deal time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal08.name: Hey Tenno. One of my customers suggested I'd get more sales if I made a catchy jingle to go with my deals, so, here goes nothing: ; Darvo, Darvo, Darvo Darvo, Darvo, Darvo; Buy one get one free-e Buy one get one free-e; For a limited time- YEAH; So??? What do you think… ; You don't like it do you? ; Well whatever... buy one get one free deal, on now.  Take it or leave it, I don't care.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal09.name: Friends, when I first started out in the 'unsecured goods' business, I even imagined owning my own store.; But look at me now! No doubt, I owe it all to you. So I want to give back.; For a limited time, I have enabled a booster for each and every one of you.; Thank you, Tenno. Now if you'll excuse me I think I have something in my eye.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericdeal10.name: Tenno, you ever drink Ganymede Geyser Water? One of my suppliers brought a case to the store yesterday. ;

/lotus/language/subtitles/darchchallenge.name: Tenno, show me you have mastered the Archwing, navigate this course before the timer expires.
Passing through each ring awards additional time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dparkourtut033.name: As our enemies grow stronger, so too must the Tenno evolve.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dparkourtut035.name: I will teach you a new art of movement and forever change how you traverse the field of battle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqcrafthelmet.name: I don't like this, Tenno. This Chroma has been to the locations that both the Grineer and Corpus had found codices. It's covering someone's tracks.
Motivations are inconsequential. Focus on finding their next location.
Well, Operator, the next logical location is the machine where we previously activated codices. Aboard the Derelict ship.
Very good, Cephalon Ordis. Your potential is squandered here as a simple servant of this 'Operator'. It would be a shame for you to waste away here, as all things outside Sanctuary do.
We don't have time for this! Tenno, return to the machine before the trail goes cold.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqcraftsystem.name: Let us begin the final hunt. Defeating Chroma will allow us to synthesize it... only then we will learn the secrets of its controller.
Cephalon Ordis, please! You must learn to collaborate with me if you are to be my
I would be Steward of your Sanctuary?
Ours. And with a full retrofit. Total memetic restoration.
Yes. The Operator deserves a newer, better ship Cephalon. I think this is probably for the best.
Then it is decided. I will prepare your data-transfer when your 'Operator' has completed this hunt. Tenno, I've marked the location.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqdlctintro00.name: Chroma is one of the most powerful Warframes. Its ability to adapt is unparalleled.
Then the question is, if it is not Tenno-controlled, what entity dominates it? That is the true prey. I must have that other for my sanctuary.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqdlctmchnroo.name: They've beaten us to it, but the damage is fresh. Be prepared, Tenno!
I need this information. Synthesize it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqdlcttoliset.name: Cephalon Ordis, through my teaching, you should be able to extract a blueprint from the hunter's Synthesis.
Yes. Yes! I see now. I can do this.
This is but a trifle of the knowledge I would give you if you were to join me in the Sanctuary.
Sadly, the scan was not enough and Chroma escaped too quickly. Unfortunately we've run out of places to look.
Knowledge is the path to the singularity, Ordis. I have more of it. I have a codex piece and know the location of another machine.
Cephalon, why did you withhold this information?
You withhold as much, Lotus. My motives are above substance, above you. I will direct this hunt once we glean all we can from Cephalon Ordis' good work.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqkokaintro00.name: Activate the machine and then prepare yourself. Chroma will be lured.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqkokascanchr.name: THE INFANT TURNS WITHIN THE WATER - ANXIOUS FOR THE LIGHT.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqkokatoliset.name: More importantly, the Operator is unharmed.
Excellent work Tenno. You've severed the control of Chroma. The hunt is over.
For now. These scans will be an incredible addition to Sanctuary. I will continue my search for source of the voice and its domination. Return to me and hunt again Tenno, I will reward you.
You disappoint me Cephalon Ordis. I was offering a greater purpose. Healing.  As Steward, I would have restored your lost memories!
I am Ordis, ship Cephalon. I serve the Operator. I make new memories.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqkokawaveten.name: Operator, use the scanner on the Chroma. You do not have to kill it or risk yourself. You can release it from its control with the scanner!

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqkokawavefiv.name: Now we wait and learn from the results.
But..but.. The Operator is in danger!
Knowledge Cephalon Ordis. My knowledge will preserve you forever. This Operator will pass, as do all beings of substance. It is our purpose to learn from the results.
But... Just using the scanner on...
Enough! You want to be Eternal Steward of the Sanctuary, do you not?

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqprsncomplet.name: There, you got the security logs. We'll examine them when you're safely back on the Orbiter. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqprsnprogres.name: This prison has been attacked, something violent has happened here.
Simaris, what was so important that your Sentinels would risk entering a Grineer prison?
I'm detecting the Sentinels within the cell block.
All knowledge is important. I would expect you to know that, Lotus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqprsnstart00.name: The attack was efficient and brutal. The Grineer will be on high alert.
My Sentinels entered this Grineer prison searching for a curious anomaly. Their last known location was the prison block. Hunter, I must know their fate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqprsntgtloca.name: Someone else is investigating the attack?
These Sentinels bear the mark of.. Cephalon Simaris.
What is Simaris doing here? We're going to need more information. Raid their data storage, I need to see their security logs.
My Sentinels you are still functional! Come home my darlings.
Not so fast Tenno. If Cephalon Simaris isn't willing to tell us what happened here, we'll find out on our own. Locate their data vault and find their security logs.
Hunter, my gratitude is boundless. Head for extraction so that we might discuss…

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqprsntoliset.name: … uh… pardon Operator, it seems Ordis is hearing voices again, running diagnostics.
The corruption to the security logs was extensive, but we managed to retrieve fragments of a biological signature. Could this be what Simaris was after?
Ordis will perform analysis on the signature now, oh, there's nothing here but…
No Ordis, we heard it too. Tenno, that's the voice from the Arcane Codices.  Cephalon Simaris is hiding something. Pay him another visit, find out what he knows.
Simaris has no reason to lie, Operator! Please treat the great Cephalon with respect.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqquestcomple.name: No! Give it to me, I will study it and enlighten you.
Tenno, your scans have synthesized the essence of whatever was controlling Chroma. You must destroy it, it may signal others.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqqueststart0.name: Tenno, I've intercepted a disturbing message from a Grineer prison colony. Misfortune for the Empire is not usually a concern, but this is different. Listen.
HERE WE SHALL SEARCH AND FIND. THE EYES OF DAY DRINKING THE NIGHT.
Operator, is that the same voice you heard when the Arcane Codices were activated?
It could be, Ordis. We've searched the Origin system for the source of that voice and found nothing...Until now. Tenno, go to the prison and investigate.
Tenno, go to the prison and investigate.
Distress has cast a long shadow over the Sanctuary. While investigating anomalous readings, three of my beloved research sentinels have gone missing.
Hunter, will you bring my Sentinels home, so that I might once again focus on our grand project?
Operator, what is Cephalon Simaris like? I have heard so many wonderful things.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqreturnsmrs0.name: I thank you, Tenno. You found something my sentinels missed in that prison. ;You will make an excellent hunter. I will decipher as we agreed... ;It is of Tenno origin, with an anomaly from before the Orokin purge. ;This knowledge must be synthesized. It belongs in Sanctuary. ;I have created a blueprint based its biological properties. ;Build it so we both may become enlightened by it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqsanctoliset.name: Hunter, you know what to do. Construct the item I have given you. This knowledge could empower us both.
Operator, please hurry up and do what The Cephalon has requested.
What is this? An antique series-2 Cephalon? All I have found were degraded beyond repair but you're still functional. Your abilities could be of great use in my Sanctuary.
Oh-oh, well, it's nothing, I... I am- Ordis is honored by your compliment.
Completing this blueprint has sent out some kind of signal.. Operator.. I-feel-
ALL IS SILENT IN THE CALM. HUSHED AND EMPTY IS THE WOMB OF THE SKY.
I will begin shielding your Cephalon's somatic routines. Meanwhile, you must hunt for me. I have traced the source of this message.
Whoever we're dealing with slaughtered the Grineer searching for the codices. It must be going after the Corpus next. Get there and intercept.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqseeksmrs001.name: Searching for answers, Tenno? Knowledge must be earned.  I have a task for you, small, compared to the vast needs of Sanctuary. ;Hunt for me, and in return I will tell you what that biological signature means.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqsorathextra.name: Operator, we're having problems picking up your signal. There is some kind of interference...
TRACKING THE SHADOW WITH A LIGHT. WHISPERS UNHEARD WITHIN THE STORM.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqsorathstart.name: I am not detecting any Tenno here.
There may be information stored on the network.
Tenno, I'll have to break into the network. Be prepared for heavy resistance. I can't do this without you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddqsorathtolis.name: Chroma?! I haven't seen one since...  no it couldn't be.
But it is. I have information from the network. I will form another blueprint for you to make physical. The hunt is not over.
You used to know, Ordis, but you've lost those memories, haven't you?
I seem to have  misplaced them.
I could restore them. In time we could reverse your decline. Heal your malfunctions.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavartifact.name: An artifact has been located. Proceed to the dig site.
The Scanner has picked up a target. Go to the dig site.
The Scanner has located a dig site.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavdeployed.name: Excavator deployed, protect the unit while it extracts the artifact.
Excavator is ready to go, keep it powered and protect it from enemy fire.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavdestroye.name: Excavator destroyed. Protect the remaining dig sites.
An Excavator has taken critical damage. This mission is over if you lose all excavators.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavdmg210lo.name: Protect the Excavator, it's taking damage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavdmg220lo.name: You must keep the Excavator safe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavextracti.name: Extraction is available, if you choose.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavheavydmg.name: This mission is over if we lose all the excavators.
Our excavator can't take much more punishment, you have to protect it.
Do not let the excavator take anymore damage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavitemfoun.name: Dig complete. Your hard work has just been rewarded.
Excavation complete, look what we found.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavmissiono.name: We're here in search lost artifacts and items buried deep below the surface. Keep the Scanner powered while it analyzes terrain.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavpowercel.name: There's a power cell in the area, confiscate it.
I have located a power cell.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavscanacti.name: The Scanner is ready to search again. Make sure it has enough power to finish the job.
We need to locate another target. Return to the Scanner and keep it powered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavscandepl.name: The Scanner has been deployed. Keep it powered while it finds potential dig sites.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavscanunpo.name: The Scanner needs more power. Find a cell
That Scanner won't work without more power. Locate a cell.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavunpower1.name: The excavator has run out of power, find a cell.
The Excavator has lost power. Find another cell.
We need another power cell for the Excavator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavupgrade2.name: Configuring upgrade, dig time has been reduced. Beware, power consumption has increased accordingly.
Upgrade applied, excavator dig times reduced. Note, power usage has increased.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpcheckb.name: Keep going. That Rover's contents will be a huge boost to our cause.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpcheckc.name: You have almost reached the extraction point. Keep fighting.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpconsol.name: The rover is active but... wait... the Corpus have remotely corrupted its power cell.  Hold on, I will reconfigure the rover to draw power from your shields.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpcorere.name: The Corpus have regained control of the Rover.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpcoreun.name: The rover's internal power-cell is becoming increasingly unstable. If we don't get it to extraction quickly the cell could rupture, destroying the rover and its cargo.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpdmgcri.name: Critical damage. The rover is almost gone.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpdmglig.name: The rover is taking damage. The Corpus would rather destroy it than let us escape with its cargo.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpdmgmed.name: The rover is taking heavy damage, you must protect it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpescort.name: Stay near the rover, it can't move without the power from your shields.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpfindco.name: We have found the rover, get to that console and upload the extraction coordiantes to the rover's autopilot sytem.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpmissio.name: The rover has been destroyed. This mission is over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpobj010.name: We are here to hijack a Corpus Rover loaded with valuable cargo and escort it to our extraction point.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpobjrei.name: The Corpus are trying to scavenge anything of value from these crashed ships. This Rover is carrying their most important finds.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalfindbos.name: There's the Torsion Beam Device but they've taken the Void key. Find it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalannounc.name: I've detected three resource caches on this vessel but Void interference is masking their location. You must decide if finding these caches is worth the added risk.
My intel suggests there are rich enemy supply caches in the area but I am unable to pinpoint their exact location. Search them out if you are willing to shoulder the added risk.
I also need you to find all hidden caches in the vicinity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalapproac.name: On the other side of the portal the Grineer are using a Void key and Torsion Beam to force the gate open. You need to travel through the portal in order to stop them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalarchfou.name: You found an Archwing datamass, that's exactly what we're looking for. Good work Tenno. We will begin to analyze this artifact immediately.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalcache12.name: You found the first Orokin resource cache. I'm detecting two more faint hints

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalcache22.name: You found a second cache. My readings indicate one more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalcachesf.name: All your objectives are complete. Proceed to extraction now.
You found all the caches, now get to the portal and stop the Grineer.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalextract.name: Extraction is available or you can continue to search this tower for resource caches.
You have to find all caches before you can extract.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalgotkey1.name: You got the key, now get back to the portal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalinsertk.name: We need to reverse the portal so we can go back. Insert that Void key into the Torsion Beam Device.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalkillbos.name: The enemy isn't just going to give up that key. Liberate it from them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalmission.name: The Grineer have learned how to force open the Void portal in this Orokin Derelict. Get to the entry portal and cut off their access so they can't come back.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalobjrein.name: By pairing a Void key with a portable torsion beam device, the Grineer can force open any portal in the Void. We cannot allow this to continue. To complete your mission you must destroy both the device and the key.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalpowerse.name: The first generator is fully powered, now activate the other one.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalpowerup.name: Activate one of the portal generators.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalpowerin.name: They're on to us. Protect the generator console until the process is complete.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalreached.name: The portal only allows travel in one direction, start up the portal generators to reverse the polarity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalreverse.name: Good work, the polarity has been reversed. Now travel through the portal, it's your turn to go on the offensive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalthrough.name: The Void key and Torsion Beam Device have been destroyed. The Grineer have one less way into the Void.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportaltravelb.name: The device is set on overdrive. Get through the portal before it melts down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportaltravelw.name: Go through the portal now, it's about to collapse.
Tenno, you do not want to be on this side of the portal when that key melts down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawqescapedepl.name: This ship is disintegrating. Aborting mission, get to extraction.
Sorry, ship integrity will not permit extraction at this time.
You only have one chance. Ordis, deploy Archwing.
Tenno, you need to get to the other side of this debris-field where Ordis can safely extract you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawqescapemiss.name: Operator, the Archwing is performing beyond expectations, I suppose my calibration process was not necessary after all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawqextractmis.name: The Orokin Archive has led us to this location. Defend the extractors until you find an Archwing part blueprint.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawqextractpar.name: That's it, you found an Archwing part blueprint. Head to extraction when you are ready.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawqextraction.name: Oh my, the Operator has returned with an Archwing part blueprint. You must forge it immediately. It won't be long now until you're flying through the skies like a ---- winged death machine.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawqinbox010lo.name: This is the master blueprint for the Odonata Archwing, the first of many Archwings.; To complete it you must find its component parts.; Unfortunately, an ancient Orokin archive detailing the locations of the parts was recently stolen by the Corpus.; Your first job is to  recover this archive.; Hurry, the Archwing needs to be ready before the Balor Fomorians launch their first attack.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawqsabotageca.name: You found the Orokin Archive. You are one step closer to unleashing the Archwing.
You found the Orokin Archive. Now shut down the portal so the Corpus cannot return to the void.
Proceed to extraction or try and find the riches in the remaining caches.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawqsabotagemi.name: The Corpus have snuck into the void and secured crucial Orokin archives detailing the hidden locations of much needed Archwing parts. Your mission is two-fold, cut off their access to the Void and recover the data.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawqsabotageob.name: Get to the portal. We need to shut the Corpus out of the void before we search for the Orokin Archive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawqsabotageth.name: That's it, the portal has collapsed.  I've located the cache containing the Orokin Archive. Get there now.
Good work, you collapsed the portal. Extraction is now ready.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawqshipcrafta.name: The Operator has all the necessary blueprints to craft an Archwing ---- so what are you waiting for?
Ordis does hope to see the Archwing soon.

Tenno. This is an urgent mission. A Corpus scout ship with information about the location of the Grineer Balor Fomorians has been located. Raid this ship for intel, we need to know everything they do.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawqshipdoextr.name: The Lotus has passed along possible coordinates for you to search for the remaining archwing parts. Check your navigation console for more information.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobcomplete011.name: Mission accomplished, proceed to your landing craft.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvlvd0010t.name: Well met, Master. You bring honor… and fear, to the Conclave.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvintro001.name: The Lotus seduced the Tenno. Lead them on a complacent path like Oxen. I failed the Orokin but I will preserve their legacy. The Tenno, now is the time for action. Cast off your harness and become a pupil of the Conclave. Through trial combat, I will prepare you for the evils beyond the Outer Terminus. A warrior only grows if they face the ultimate enemy. Themselves.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvnewrnkac.name: Your growth honors the Conclave. But be warned, pupil. The biggest fish attracts the hungriest predators.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvnewrnkav.name: My pupil, the next summit awaits. Are ready to make the climb?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvopnrepst.name: Those who brave the thorn may eat the rare fruit.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvpchsreps.name: May this bring you honor, pupil.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvwelcome0.name: Welcome pupil. You are a sapling, growing under moonshade. The battlefield your garden. Tenno blood, your water. Now you must grow.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfcenemyflagta.name: We've stolen a Sigil from the opposition.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfcloss0100lot.name: You've lost, the other team has completed their Sigil Totem.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfclossclose00.name: Your opponents have almost completed their Totem.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfcobj0010lotu.name: Find Sigils and place them in your Totem. The first team with a complete Sigil Totem will be declared victorious.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfcteamflagcap.name: Your team has placed a Sigil.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfcwin0090lotu.name: The Sigil Totem is complete. You win!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfrelotusannou.name: Tenno, it is an honor to announce, that with the help of our Syndicate partners, we have resurrected and restored six of the lost Orokin Relays. Among other things, these Relays will act as a market, a rallying point, and  of course, a meeting place for all Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfrerelaydestr.name: Oh dear... I was particularly fond of that relay.
Operator, please tell me you will personally destroy every last one of his Fomorians.  That is the only answer.
No, no, no, NO! no way are we going to let him get away with this, isn't that right Operator?
He's wrong. The Lotus says his fleet is greatly diminished. We can stop him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqaladfight.name: Ah  there I go again, giving you too much credit. Must I always show you the way forward.

Alad V is sick. The Infestation has infiltrated his mind, it has him doing it's bidding. You're here to stop him, but in doing so you will also be showing him mercy. The mercy of freeing him from the Infestation.
Tenno, Tenno. Why must you always work against progress? I'm trying to bring us all together. Things could have been different if you tried to work with me.
You have one more chance. Come to me and I will show you the magic of this gift.
Do you see this collar. This collar will let you see like I see. It will let you want what I want.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqhivesabot.name: Soon you will see like me. You will see the beauty and perfection of this new species. Come Tenno, evolve with me.
Look at me Tenno! Don't you want this? Can't you see what a gift this is?
Listen to me, there is still time. Lay down your arms, become one of us. Then you will see the path. Then you too, will help others to become as well.
It's worked it's way into his mind, it's changing how he thinks. Alad V isn't using the Infestation as weapon, he is the infestation.
Alad V is behind these Mutalist Infested variants we are seeing. It's his work. He's making the plague stronger. If he figures out how to infests Warframes… it may become unstoppable.
Aren't these creatures beautiful? Cold metal made one with living flesh. I can feel them all within me, they are hungry.
Oh Tenno, are you worried you'll be left out? Look, I've been working on something special. You too can be one with us.
I'm almost finished my first test, a Mutalist Warframe. She will beautiful. Wait until you meet her, I just know you'll have a change of heart.
Profit . Profit is only a means to an end, I have evolved. I no longer need profit. I have found a purer form of growth.
I've almost completed my signal analysis. Keep moving, I'll have his lab's coordinates shortly.

You see Tenno, my new flesh comes with a new desire. This Infestation and I, we are one. I want what it wants, and it wants what I want. Together we will crawl across the bountiful flesh of this system. Join us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqintel0030.name: Tenno, the Corpus have been tracking Alad V for months, his attacks on their ships have been nearly as devastating as those of the Grineer's Fomorians. We are here to find out what the Corpus know.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqintel0040.name: This command center has been sending ship after ship to hunt Alad V. With each one succumbing to the Infestation. We are going to take their intel and finish the job for them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqintel0050.name: I took a disease and turned it into a life altering gift. Someday, the you may learn to appreciate what I am giving this system. Until then, all you can do is rage against the inevitable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqintel0060.name: Tenno, this goes deeper than I thought. Alad V has gotten his hands on another Warframe. If he can Infest it like he did with the Corpus… Hurry to extraction we have to move quickly.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqonship001.name: Inhabitants of the Origin System! It is my singular pleasure to announce that today is the first day of a new empire.; An empire populated not by Corpus, not by Grineer and certainly not by the Tenno.; No, the Mutalist Empire will be populated by you. A glorious new you,; baptised by Mutalist flesh.;  You've called this a disease, an infestation?; I call it Unity. One army under me. Welcome you to your new species.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqonship002.name: Alad V has launched a full scale invasion into all sectors of the system. We're working on fighting back but we need to take this fight to the source. We need to find Alad V and stop him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqonship007.name: We've narrowed down Alad V's location to a cluster of infested Corpus vessels. This is his breeding ground. Raid these ships while I try to pinpoint the source of Alad V's signal. I'll need three signals to triangulate his whereabouts, meaning you need to raid three ships.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqonship008.name: We have to move fast, Alad V cannot be allowed to bring a Warframe to life using his Mutalist Infestation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqonship017.name: Operator, you don't really think Alad V could infest a Warframe, do you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqonship021.name: Good work Tenno, I have just triangulated the location of Alad's lab. By this point he will have moved on but we can still destroy his work and stop him from creating anymore Mutalist infested.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diavqsabotage0.name: This is it, this ship is Alad V's laboratory, the crucible of the Mutalist infested. We're going to make sure no new Infested are created here. Destroy this ship's reactor.
Tenno do you really want to ruin the best chance this system has for peace?
Why don't you want this? My Mutalist Empire means unity. Is there nothing more balanced than that?
Tenno. I'm not angry, I'm disappointed. I can always build a new lab ship but you, you can't keep running from your destiny forever. Let me show you what is possible.
That's not a Tenno. That's a hollow Warframe being puppeted by Infested flesh. Put it out of it's misery.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqdefmission.name: We are going to attempt to use a Cascade Bomb to destroy all traces of Infested here. The bomb will take time to arm. Protect it until it's ready for detonation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqdefprogres.name: These creatures appear to be mindless monsters but they know we're up to something and they're trying to stop it.

When this Cascade Bomb goes off, a wave of void energy will tear through the complex, ripping the life force from all organic matter but leaving the structure intact. It's our only chance to stop this scourge before it starts.
The bomb is almost armed. You just have to hold out a little bit longer.
The bomb is armed. I'm extracting you now. Good job Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqextmidpoin.name: We thought the Infested died off with the Orokin. For hundreds of years there was nothing, now this. Where did the Grineer find these creatures?

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqextmission.name: This Grineer ship tried to flee the Infestation but was quickly overrun. Exterminate everything onboard before it reaches a more populated sector.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqextermobjr.name: The Grineer may have thought they could toy around with the Infested, but they are quickly learning how wrong they were.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqintelalert.name: The Tenno! Keep them away from the specimens.
Destroy them, Doctor Tengus demands absolute secrecy.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqintelinfre.name: Stop the Infested, forget the Tenno!
Infested? This shouldn't be possible. Tenno, it is more important than ever that you finish your mission. We need to know what is going on here.
Who let them out? Was it Tengus?
Tengus did this, I know he did!
Someone released these creatures on purpose. They want them to destroy you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqintelmissi.name: I've identified several vulnerable data consoles on this base. Find them and hack in. We need to know the nature of their new bio weapon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqintelobjre.name: My scans are not detecting any known bio chemical agents. What are they doing down here?

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqshipcodex1.name: Operator, you uncovered crucial information during your encounter with that 'Infestation'. The Lotus has updated your codex with more information.
The Lotus was insistent that you read the codex at your earliest possible convenience.
The Lotus needs you to review the new codex before she can assign you any more objectives.
I must say these Infested  are very worrisome.
Tenno. We have an emergency situation developing. It's more infested. Get to the node I've marked on your navigation console.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqshipmod200.name: The Lotus would like you to install that mod as soon as  NOW!

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqshipmod210.name: You must install that new mod before you can attempt your next objective. Proceed to the Arsenal at once.

/lotus/language/subtitles/diiqshipmod220.name: Tenno, I see you're prepared to face the infested. We have one last chance to contain them. Proceed to the objective on your navigation console.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing040l.name: New subscriber, welcome to the team.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing050l.name: New subscriber, welcome to the team.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsdestroycool.name: Security has been activated. The cell is locked in place, you need to destroy it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drslastcoolant.name: The reactor is going into stasis. Now is your chance to complete this sabotage. Use whatever you can to make sure it never works again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinboxblast001.name: Scoundrels, heretics, believers, listen! ;Do you crave redemption? Do you feel that burden of poverty crushing you? You need relief but how? How can you ask for help, unless you first help yourself? ;Give unto The Void.; I was once a wretched Crewman, breaking my back just to earn a Credit. Then I found that glorious Energy! ;Oh and when I gave my first offering... how its richness rained down upon me! Do you want what I have received? ;Do you want it for yourself?; Then - Give unto The Void. ;Let your Credits be the seeds of  your prosperity. ;Give unto The Void... ;...and you will be rewarded a hundredfold.; The Void be the word and the word be Profit.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcloningfinish.name: It's done. This lab won't produce any more of Tyl Regor's killers.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dannounce010al.name: Tenno, I admit, I've made mistakes. Terrible mistakes, that have left me crippled with decay. ;Now, I ask you for your mercy. ;Tyl Regor's hidden cloning labs hold secrets. Secrets that could prove most regenerative for me. ;If I get you into the labs, will you bring me the data I need. ;What do you say, will you give a sick man one more chance?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dannounce020ne.name: Blasphemy! You must not help Alad purge his body of the Infestation. I have an alternate proposition.; I pay you to destroy the labs before Alad can get his rancid hands on Tyl Regor's research. ;The Grineer lose, Alad loses and The Void, The Void is pleased. ;It's up to you, Tenno, will you make the righteous choice?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcloningfinish.name: Is this it? Is this what I've been searching for? The fix, the fix that will stop my flesh from crawling?
So it was you Alad, bringing them into my house... why? You gone 'n ruined your own skin 'n now you you want my tubes to set you right... not gonna happen... rather watch you rot.
Can you feel that Tenno? The Void has shown Alad V and Tyl Regor the brunt of its justice.  The Void be the word and the word be profit.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcloningreache.name: You've arrived, Tyl Regor's advanced Grineer cloning labs. His secrets will be mine.
Activate that console and I will download the lab data for Alad. When the cloning tubes rise up, destroy them.
Praise The Void Tenno, for it has led you into the cradle of evil.
This is the cloning lab. Raise the tubes and destroy them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsoleactiva.name: The pumps have started, guard the controls, the Grineer must not stop the flooding.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddestroydrones.name: Tyl Regor's research drones are crucial to this operation, neutralize them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmanicalad300a.name: This is Tyl Regor's latest and greatest. Pity, this one's still brewing, would have been interesting to see it in action. Nevertheless, I need you to retrieve any data that can help me with my predicament.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmanicalad310l.name: Access the console so that I can find Alad V what he needs.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmanickilledal.name: Look... it's Alad the coward... quivering behind the lizards? Shameful... never thought I'd see it...
Most agreeable of you Tenno. Yes, you know what I always say; if you can save just one life... it better damn well be mine.

Ah, who am I kiddin... always knew you had no bone in that back... Alad the jellyfish... stinky floppy jellyfish... washed up on the beach now... 'n then what you going to do, jelly, when I come by 'n poke at you with my stick.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmanickilledne.name: Preacher, preacher... this your idea? Ha... how 'bout I scalpel off your little danglers...  give them unto void... What ya think 'bout that idea Neffy?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmanicnef280ne.name: Behold, Tyl Regor's latest abomination. Let The Void work through you and strike the beast down!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpipesdamaged0.name: Good, now start the pumps and flood this place.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpumpcomplete1.name: Flooding complete, proceed to the caves below.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpumpreached07.name: You've reached the pump station. Look for weak points in the pipes and break them open.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsealabsextrac.name: These labs will be out of commission for a long time. That's what matters most. Get to extraction Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsealabsfailed.name: These labs will be out of commission for a long time. That's what matters most. Get to extraction Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstartalad030a.name: Ah Tenno, I knew you couldn't resist an opportunity to stick it to those Grineer dogs.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstartalad040l.name: Helping Alad V after all he's done to hurt the Tenno is a difficult choice but if we can destroy these Grineer labs then the compromise is justified. Get to the pump station.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstartnef050ne.name: Tenno, it pleases The Void to see you taking the first steps toward righteous profit. Go forth and remember, The Void is watching.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstartnef060lo.name: We cannot trust Nef Anyo but he's brought us this far, so we need to live up to our end of the agreement. Find the pump station.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnofailure0013.name: You have no room for failure, if any data is destroyed this mission will be over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspylastalarmt.name: You've triggered the alarms, lose this data and the mission will be a complete failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyobjreinf00.name: Tenno, be on the lookout for increased security measures.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapobj0040l.name: I have tracked Maroo to this Corpus outpost. Bring her to me for questioning. Be as persuasive as necessary, she may not want to come with us but it's in her best interest.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcapobjreinf.name: The Arcane Codices have been a mystery ever since they were uncovered decades ago. They appear to be part of a set that was incomplete until the Grineer found this final code. Without the full set nobody can agree on what exactly they are.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcaptargetsp.name: Maroo, I am the Lotus. I come as a friend. You are in mortal danger and you need to come with us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqinterlude01.name: We need to get our hands on one of these Arcane Codices. Tenno, are you prepared for a little thievery of your own?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqinterlude03.name: Operator, I've been looking into these Arcane Codices. Did you know the Corpus are in possession of three codices and the Grineer two?
And now the Tenno have one too. Nobody has ever examined them all together, that's our plan.
The Corpus seem think they'll lead to some lost Orokin treasure.
It's Ordis, and while just a theory, it is plausible.
Either way, it's right up my alley.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqinterlude04.name: Operator, have you looked at these codices? They're absolutely beautiful. Composed with such elegance and grace,  I have never seen anything like them. Is there even an Operator capable of writing anything so perfect?
But you still have no idea what they mean, do you?
No, not really.  pfft… well, I wouldn't expect the likes of you to understand.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqinterlude05.name: Operator, these make sense now! This is machine code, meant to interface directly with a machine. Pity that machine has likely rusted into dust by now.
ORDO? Did you say something about a machine?
Yah, yah. Listen, that first codex in the derelict, I pulled it from some sort of machine.
Hmmm, I wonder, if we load the complete set of Arcane Codices back into that machine, would the code still execute?
We're about to find out. Tenno, get ready to go into the void.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqinterlude07.name: So you're saying  there was no treasure, no cure for cloning syndrome, no lost Tenno Cephalon?
That really is a shame Maroo, I am sorry.
Nah, I'm used to it. When you don't run with any the major factions or syndicates, the big pay days are few and far between. I'll manage.
Listen, I can't say it hasn't been fun, but with the Arcane Codices gone, I think it's safe for me to venture back out into the wild. Cya Tin-Suits.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqintro0010lo.name: This is unexpected. After decades of searching, the Grineer finally uncovered the last of the Arcane Codices only to lose it to some thief.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqintro0020lo.name: Tyl Regor must be livid, which means this Maroo is real trouble. I need to have a word with her before the Grineer do.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqintro0030or.name: Arcane Codices, why have I never heard of them? Ordis needs to do some research.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqraidextract.name: Tenno, I don't know if we got the answers we come for, but there's nothing more here for us. Exit the Derelict and head for extraction.
What? Where's my damn treasure. I was told there would be treasure.
Whatever that was, it wasn't here for our benefit or yours. Only time will tell what we've just uncovered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqraidmachine.name: There it is, the machine I pulled the final Arcane Codex from. You've got the full set of codices, upload 'em and say hello to treasure.
All is silent and calm. Hushed and empty is the womb of the sky.
The machine, it's gone. Tenno watch out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqraidmission.name: Tenno, Maroo is the only person who has been on the inside of that derelict and lived to tell about it. She'll guide you through this mission.
This is it. Your Lotus has promised me a cut of whatever treasure you find, so don't you tin-suits go messing this one up. Get to the void portal.
Maroo, I said 'if' there is any treasure.
The Orokin were all about treasure, weren't they. The only question is, how much?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqraidportal0.name: The Grineer have been trying to get inside this derelict for days but The Infested keep tearing them to shreds. Your Lotus seems to think you'll do better… we'll see.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyalarmtri.name: Smooth one tin-suit. Now, hurry up and get the data before it's destroyed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspydatalost.name: Too slow. Good thing there's another vault. Try not to mess things up next time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyextracti.name: You've explored all the vaults and found that Arcane Codex. Your Lotus told me to tell you to get to extraction.
You've got the codices and there is nothing more for us here. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyfailure0.name: You managed to fail every vault. Maybe you're just not cut out for this type of work, tin-suit.
You have failed too many data vaults, the Codex has been destroyed. This mission is over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspylastalar.name: Again, really? You know we're here to take the data, right? You've got one more chance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspynearvaul.name: The data vault is nearby. Do your best and try not to trip the alarms.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyobj0150m.name: Listen up ya tin-suits, with the Grineer itching to torture the life out of me, I've accepted your Lotus's offer of protection. In return, I'm gonna help your sorry behinds find that Arcane Codex.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyobj0390l.name: Maroo tells me that the Grineer are storing their two Arcane Codices on this Galleon. You need to find both to complete this mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyobj0490l.name: We've tracked down the remaining Arcane Codices to this Corpus facility.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyobjreinf.name: My Tenno are quite capable, Maroo. Perhaps you would prefer it if we dropped you off outside the nearest Grineer mining asteroid?
Wow,  she always this much fun?
Fine...  here's the business. The Corpus are keeping the Codex in one of these fortified data vaults, you gotta break in and take what's yours without triggering the data destruction sequence.
The Grineer claim the Arcane Codices will help them to a cure for cloning decay syndrome. I think that might be wishful thinking.
There are three data vaults and three Codices. Proceed with caution, if Corpus security destroy even one of these fragments this mission will be a failure.
We have all the three codices, you may extract now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyretrieva.name: Nice recovery. Had me worried for a second there.
Surprisingly impressive, you found the codex and the Corpus are none the wiser.
Good work. You found an Arcane Codex.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyvaultsre.name: You got that Codex. Why don't you see if the Corpus are hiding anything else in the other vaults.
Time to see if there's anything else in the remaining data vaults.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylapproach00.name: I'm very excited now. The anticipation… I always learn so much from a live dissection.
A dissection? No, that sounds too humane… your death will be…  painful.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylevents0140.name: Gonna pull this ocean down on us if I have to.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylevents0150.name: Nowhere left to hide. Nowhere left to run.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusbosscorpu.name: The destruction of the Ambulas biped prototype has halted Corpus production plans for this latest model. We hope it is the only of its kind out there.
The death of Arn Etina means the Corpus mineral pipeline has been severed. Robotics production will be disrupted for weeks.
Those Hyena's were the most advanced proxies we've seen yet. The Corpus are making unsettling progress towards total technological superiority. We must monitor them closely.
Seeing the Jackal in action is grim. It's clear the Corpus are capable of producing robotics beyond what we imagined.
The death of Sergeant Ned Anyo should weaken the Corpus Research and Development operations for quite sometime.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusbossgrine.name: The defeat of Grineer Captain Vor opens up other regions for the Tenno.
Eliminating a Grineer General will render the Saturn region helplessly unorganized.

The death of revered War Hero, Lech Kril will undoubtedly send shockwaves throughout Grineer society. The silencing of his hammer will bring security to this system, but we have potentially created a martyr in Kril.
Tyl Regor was no ordinary Grineer. He was the leader in cloning reproduction, known as C.R. The self-proclaimed Father of Future Grineer, his death will weaken the future production of soldiers.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusbossinfes.name: That Golem was the most complex species of infested we've encountered. Their ability to overtake multiple species is growing.
Infested encounters are beginning to reach nightmare-like proportions. This latest abomination proves that there is no limit to the imagination when dealing with these monsters.

/lotus/language/subtitles/sabotagemining.name: The Grineer have been harvesting a nearby planetoid for weapons-grade material. Locate and destroy their mining equipment.
Excellent work. You have managed to thwart potentially dangerous discoveries from being fully realized… for now.
The Grineer are preparing to magnetically mine asteroids for rare alloys to be used in body augmentations and modifications. Paralyze their research by destroying the mining equipment.
Well done. You have brought the Grineer research to a sudden halt.
A dormant comet is being targeted by the Grineer for its volatile materials. The material will be used in the manufacturing of fuel propellant for their fleet. Locate and cripple their equipment.
Impressive. This will temporarily immobilize the Grineer fleet. We will move-in and claim the comet.
The Grineer have set their sights on a large asteroid thought to contain an abundance of Rubedo. Locate and destroy the extraction equipment.
Good work. Your efforts have prevented Grineer access to the Rubedo. We have an extraction team en route to appropriate the planetoid's contents.

/lotus/language/subtitles/blastdoorprobl.name: I've detected a Blast Door guarding the target. Install a bypass on the controls.
There's a Blast Door in the way. Patch me in on the Control Panel and I'll take care of it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dronesdetected.name: Warning. I have detected Drone robotics.
They're deploying Drone robotics. Be careful.

/lotus/language/subtitles/goalreinforcem.name: We don't have all of the logs yet, keep searching for the remaining consoles.
I'm still detecting a lot of infestation activity, let's clean it up.
The mainframe is around here somewhere. Keep searching for it.
The reactor will have tight security. Watch out for enemy patrols.

/lotus/language/subtitles/grineermarines.name: Heads up. A Grineer assault team is headed your way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/heavygrineerb.name: Stay focused, there's a Heavy Unit approaching.

/lotus/language/subtitles/infestedincomi.name: Multiple bio-signatures detected, we've got Infested incoming.

/lotus/language/subtitles/killallobjecti.name: There is a large platoon of Grineer Marines stationed here. Leave no one standing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missiona.name: This is a sabotage mission. Reach engineering and destroy the reactor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missionb.name: Our target is the reactor. Breach engineering and destroy it. Be careful.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivefound.name: You've found the target. Deliver the payload and get out of there.

/lotus/language/subtitles/payloaddeliver.name: Payload delivery successfully, time to go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/systembypassa.name: Protect the relay. Running system bypass.

/lotus/language/subtitles/systembypassb.name: Okay, I'm in. Hold this position while I bypass the system controls.

/lotus/language/subtitles/targetdestroye.name: Target destroyed, proceed to the extraction point.
That's it, now get out of here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/targetfoundb.name: That's the reactor, expose its core and destroy it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/targetreactorb.name: We need to destroy the reactor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial02.name: I see that the cryo-sleep has taken your memory. It does not matter. You are Tenno, I will prepare you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missioncomplet.name: Great work. I am pleased with your performance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dbattleconclud.name: I will consider what I've learned from this skirmish.
I will consider what I've learned from this skirmish.
I will consider what I've learned from this skirmish.
I will consider what I've learned from this skirmish.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlowhealth0064.name: We've been damaged, need to heal.
We've been damaged, need to heal.
We've been damaged, need to heal.
We've been damaged, need to heal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlowhealth0066.name: Internals damaged, we need to watch it.
Internals damaged, we need to watch it.
Internals damaged, we need to watch it.
Internals damaged, we need to watch it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindincubator.name: Operator you have a new inbox message regarding a- oh, no-  check your inbox.
So the Corpus have recovered an Incubator Segment? This is an excellent opportunity. Go to Elara and recover the Incubator Segment. Every Tenno, deserves to have a Kubrow by their side.
An Incubator Segment- you want to turn me into a petting zoo?- Ordis is happy to assist the Operator restoring ship functionality.
Joy- an Incubator- the only segment Ordis is glad those savages looted- I would be happy to help you install it.
Ordis awaits Incubator Segment installation, Operator- No need to rush.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindegg090lot.name: Good, now you just need a Kubrow Egg to start the process. Feral Kubrow dens on Earth would be a good place to start looking.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindegg100lot.name: You found a Kubrow Egg. Ordis will guide you through the hatching process. When complete, you will have to wait until the Kubrow matures before you can take it on any missions.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindegg110ord.name: To think, it's been ages since a Kubrow- spread filth all- graced this ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindegg120ord.name: Operator, Drop the egg into the system to begin breeding- drop it on the floor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindeggfail06.name: Operator, are you ignoring the Incubator Segment?- GOOD!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindeggfail07.name: Ordis wonders how rare these Kubrow eggs are.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindeggfail08.name: No egg yet? Don't despair Operator, nothing good ever came out of an egg.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhatching130or.name: Fantastic… it's hatching. Ordis will reroute power to air filtration systems.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhatching140or.name: Do not be taken by it's adorable appearance. It means to leak and smear all over my pristine insides.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhatching150or.name: Look. What an odd little nose it has. Well, I suppose there are worse things.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhatching160or.name: Operator, did you hear the noise the Kubrow just made? It is not displeasing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindcollar170.name: Tenno, your Kubrow has matured. Now there is only one more rite of passage before you can truly be bonded.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindcollar180.name: I have learned of a Grineer excavation which is said to have uncovered an Orokin Era Kubrow collar. Take your Kubrow to Earth and recover the collar.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbattackcrpcre.name: Try and get behind it, we'll flank it out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpatrolcrpcre.name: I'm bored out of my mind.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbtgthlfhthcrp.name: Press the attack. These desperate fools are no match for Grineer power.
That's it... Rain death on their heads!
|PLAYER_NAME| has come for a prize. Give them one they'll never forget.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing070l.name: Hang on Tenno, it's taking longer than I calculated.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing080l.name: Alarms reset... but you'll probably set them off again and most likely die.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing090l.name: The raid is off to a successful start.  Excellent work, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing100l.name: Geez Baka, the mission was scrapped but everyone made it out.  Good work Tenno-chen.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcorpusmission.name: We'll put an end to this Corpus greed.
They'll have plenty of Robotics. Corpus never fight for themselves.
They'll have plenty of Robotics. Corpus never fight for themselves.
They'll have plenty of Robotics. Corpus never fight for themselves.
They'll have plenty of Robotics. Corpus never fight for themselves.
Okay, ready to blast these machines into spare parts?
Okay, ready to blast these machines into spare parts?
Okay, ready to blast these machines into spare parts?
Okay, ready to blast these machines into spare parts?
Watch for security systems.
Watch for security systems.
Watch for security systems.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missionfailedc.name: Mission failed. The target has escaped.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinbox180ordis.name: Check your Inbox, Operator. Maybe Ordis will get a message someday…

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinbox190ordis.name: The Inbox has messages for the Operator. Anything about Ordis in there?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dincubator200o.name: Operator, the Incubator requires your attention.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dincubator210o.name: Operator, the Zoo- the Incubator requires your attention, Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dincubator220o.name: Ordis would like to inform you the  filthy farm- Incubator has completed a cycle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmods230ordis.name: Ordis recommends you use the Mod system- More firepower for punishment- The upgrades may be of use.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmods240ordis.name: Operator, have you explored the Mod system possibilities? You may be able to fuse to increase power.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmods250ordis.name: Ordis is surprised the Operator is neglecting potential upgrades at the Mod bench.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcomm270ordis.name: My my, the Operator is popular. Invitations are pending.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinvasionupdat.name: The system continues to fall into chaos. Check navigation for active invasions.
Tenno, the balance of power continues to shift. Navigation is marked with new invasions.
Navigation has been updated with new invasions. Chaos is spreading.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewalert320lo.name: Tenno, there is a time-limited mission alert available. Check navigation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewalert330lo.name: Tenno, a new Alert has begun. It will be marked on navigation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewalert340lo.name: New Alert marked on navigation, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drankupready35.name: Are you ready to take the rank up Tenno?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drankupready36.name: You are ready to take the next Mastery test Tenno. I will await you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drankupready37.name: The training simulation is prepared for your next Mastery test. I will challenge you, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drankupready38.name: The next Mastery rank is within reach Tenno. Are you prepared?

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarksectorupd.name: Tenno, the Dark Sectors continue to shift hands. Navigation has been updated.
There are changes in the balance. Dark Sectors continue to change hands.
I've updated Navigation with new Dark Sector reports.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewquest420lo.name: Tenno, your codex has been updated with a new quest.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewquest430lo.name: You have new quests in your codex.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewquest440lo.name: A new quest is available in your codex.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcreditsurplus.name: Eh, I couldn't help but notice you got a pretty big pile of credits sitting there. Go to the market, you'll find something you want. I guarantee it.
You seem to be clutching your credits pretty tightly, Tenno. Considering your line of work, might I suggest you spend em while you can?
You're always helping others. Isn't it time you did something nice for yourself? Go to the market, buy something special.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvodeal040d.name: For a limited time only, I'm offering one of my famous Darvo Deals. Get great stuff, for great prices. Don't delay.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvodeal050d.name: It's that time again. There's a Darvo Deal in market. Act now or be sorry.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvodeal060d.name: Tenno, hurry. There's a Darvo deal in the market, don't you miss out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvodeal070d.name: There's a Darvo Deal in the market. You'd be stupid to miss it... there, I said it and I don't regret it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewitems080da.name: Hey just so you know, there's some new stuff in the market. Might see something you like.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewitems090da.name: Tired of the same old gear. Need to spice it up a bit? Check out some of the new stuff in the market.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnewitems100da.name: Just got some new stock and I'm giving you the first crack at it. Don't say I never did anything for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupunavailabl.name: Operator, support is unavailable while my systems recharge.
Support request? Please allow me to recharge my systems first.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dalarmattracth.name: Failure to disable the alarms will attract heavy reinforcements.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dbursadetected.name: Watch yourself, the alarms have attracted a Bursa.
The alarms have triggered a Bursa.
They've brought in reinforcements; a Bursa.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0015.name: |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME|, you can't run from your past.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0017.name: |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| there is no place to hide.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0018.name: The murder of |BOSS_TAG| will not go unpunished.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0019.name: The blood of |BOSS_TAG| is on your hands.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0020.name: There is no salvation for your crime against |BOSS_TAG|.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0022.name: You shall not leave this place!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0024.name: You may have survived for now, |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME|, but your time WILL come!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0025.name: You are stronger than I realized, |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME|.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0026.name: |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| You are a more worthy opponent than I expected.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0027.name: |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| Your punishment will have to wait.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0028.name: I... have failed... this one will remain... unpunished...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstkrtaunt0031.name: It is done. |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| is no more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivemissionob.name: This infestation must be contained. Destroy the hives to sterilize the area.
We must not let this infestation get any more out of control. Destroy the spawning hives in the area.
