/lotus/language/subtitles/dhiveobjreinfo.name: There is no telling what effect destroying these hives will have. Stay alert.
These spawning hives are new, bioengineered by Alad V. They must be destroyed before they can gain a foothold in this system.
The infested become stronger with each attack but we have no choice. To defeat this scourge we must destroy the hives faster than they can reproduce.
I am detecting fewer and fewer infected ships. Your tireless onslaught is working. Keep fighting.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhiveapproach0.name: You are near a hive. Destroy the tumor nodes to make the hive vulnerable.
A hive is nearby. Be on alert, there's no way to know how the infestation will react to this hive's destruction.
There is a hive in the area. You must destroy all the tumor nodes before you can damage the hive.
You are approaching a hive. Every hive is protected by a series of tumor nodes, destroy those and you can destroy the hive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivevulnerabl.name: All nodes destroyed, the hive is vulnerable.
That's it, now take out the hive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroyge.name: The Hive is down. Move on to the next.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroysp.name: That made them angry. I'm sensing increased enemy activity in your vicinity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroyga.name: Watch out! Destroying that hive realeased clouds of toxins.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroyfr.name: Taking out that hive has disrupted the environmental system. Expect sub zero temperatures and weakened shields.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroyma.name: Hive destroyed, but be careful, I am now detecting fields of intense magnetic disturbance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroytu.name: That last hive was interfering with the defense systems. Beware, turrets are now online.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroygr.name: Destroying that hive damaged the stabilization module, expect reduced gravity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhivedestroyla.name: Killing that hive seems to have triggered nearby laser traps. Proceed with caution.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhiveobjcomple.name: All hives destroyed. Head to Extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhiveeventvint.name: Tenno, there you are, I thought you'd never show up. Come, test out my new fighters and let me know what you think.
My new army is self-replicating, unending. You are witness to the dawn of a new era Tenno. Lucky you.
Tenno, you're so pathetic are you getting tired? You can't quit now. Though, I wouldn't blame you if you did, with your help my fighters have become quite nasty.
Do you think you're winning? You can't cut my hives down faster than they grow. That's not possible!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhiveeventvout.name: Impressive, isn't it? I just can't wait to see the looks on the faces of the Corpus Board when I give them a demonstration.
Yes! Keep fighting Tenno. With each generation you cut down, the next comes out even more virulent. Beautiful, isn't it?
Haven't you figured this out yet? You can't erradicate my infestation by stomping on it, you're just making them tougher.
You haven't turned the tide! I can grow more, you haven't stopped me. Not this time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsacolytefoun.name: Feel that? One of them is here. They won't stay hidden for long.
Acolyte! We know you're here. Show yourself.
It's here. Find it and hurt it.
I know that an Acolyte is here somewhere, keep poking around until it tries to kill you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsacolytedef0.name: Was that all? Do me a favor, find it again and give it another drubbing.
Sneaky betrayer, won't stay around until the bitter end. You'll find it again, I know you will.
It's going to make us do this the hard way, isn't it? And by us, Tenno, I mean you.
Haha, that's what happens when you mess with Alad V! Hah yes!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsdefendalad0.name: Tenno, may I encourage you to think of all the times I've helped you and not all the times I tried to have you killed.
We've had our differences in the past, but right now I can really see the benefit in being nice to you.
Fighting alongside the Tenno… I won't lie, this feels weird.
Fighting off a horde of shadow warriors was most certainly not on my agenda for today.
All these shadows. Those Acolytes don't have the guts to come fight me themselves!
I may have spoken too soon, yes...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsaladbarks02.name: Stay back! Get away from me!
Don't you know who I am?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsaladbarks03.name: Tenno, you're having too much fun.
My death was not in the contract, Tenno.
I knew I should have got the insurance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpsaclytebarks.name: The Shadow commands us. Betrayers will die. Orokin blood will dry.
Those who oppose will be consumed. Emotion drives us. Blood divides us.
These children will not stop us from punishing you. The Shadow commands it.
We asked… what is thy will, Shadow? Punishment was his call.
We serve the Shadow, the Stalker, the truth.
The Shadow is pure, undreaming, untainted.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionstart0.name: Every time you hack Nef Anyo's account we put him one step closer to bankruptcy.
Nef Anyo may appear to be nothing more than a swindler, but his growing Bursa army presents a serious threat to the entire system. We must bankrupt him before he grows any stronger.
Nef Anyo's Bursas are too smart to trust an Offering from a Tenno. You'll have to force the issue.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpreachgeneric.name: I don't need your credits, I am a rich man but The Void, The Void needs to know you have faith.
When you trust in The Void, The Void will grant you all you desire.
The Void has chosen me as its prophet, a prophet of profit. Isn't that wonderful.
Lovers of profit, devout followers of the Void, have you given your offering today?
And I say, let the void bathe you in its beautiful energy, only prosperity can follow.
Before you can be rich, you must be poor. Give unto the Void.
Until the seed is sown, the harvest will not begin. Give unto the Void.
Credits. Credits come and go, but The Void's richness is forever.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dofferingdetec.name: I sense an offering, is there a believer out there who wishes prosperity?
Is that an offering? The Void pulses with anticipation.
I feel another believer about to put their faith into The Void. Step forth so that my Bursa shall know you.
Nef Anyo has taken the bait. When you see his Bursa, stun it and start the hack.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dbursaspotted0.name: Bursa in sight, remember you must stun it in order to start the hack.
There's the Bursa. Remember, you have to stun it and then hack it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dofferingtaken.name: Another believer. Please hold for redemption, while we process your offering.
Ah. Another gift for The Void, contemplate its richness while we process your offering.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtransferfunds.name: The transfer is in progress. The Bursa must remain functional until the transfer is finished.
Keep that Bursa alive until the transfer finishes.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dverifyfunds00.name: Hurry. Destroy the Bursa before the verification is finished.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dofferingrecei.name: Transaction complete. In the name of profit, I commit this offering to The Void.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpremature0010.name: The Bursa was destroyed too soon. Next time, wait until after you hack to kill it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpremature0020.name: Wait until after the Bursa is hacked to destroy it. You will have to try again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpremature0030.name: No Tenno, hack the Bursa first, then kill it. You will have to draw out another one before you can attempt this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhackfail0010l.name: You failed to kill the Bursa in time. Nef Anyo took your credits.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhacksuccess00.name: Uh... Believer? There seems to have been some problem processing your offering. Perhaps you could commit another?
We had an error processing your offering. Please, try again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhacksuccesslo.name: Success, you made our hack look like a banking error. Nef Anyo has no idea what's hit him.
Good work. We've taken Nef's credits without him even noticing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/deventending00.name: Tenno. Did you think you could out-swindle me? You must know, this is a only a momentary setback. This system is rich with desperate souls. There will be more offerings and more credits. And when my Bursas once again march off the assembly line, it is you who will be praying for salvation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstartgen071lo.name: You're here to sabotage Tyl Regor's cloning labs.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstartgen072lo.name: This lab is the birthplace of some of the most dangerous Grineer to date. Knock it out of commission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtyldiscovers1.name: Jealous... that's why you've come... my tubemen are too healthy... too resilient... too strong... too vicious! No wait... that's not jealous... that's frightened.
Tenno Lizards scampering 'bout my house. Messing with my work... contaminating my science. Who let them in. Which twit did this thing?

Old Grineer... life too short... mind too small. My tubemen overcome... leave old mistakes behind...  'n all of a sudden, along slithers the Tenno, sick, sick things... here to ruin this flesh made right.
You hate my science. Hate my tubes 'n my tubemen! But I have the numbers, add those numbers... mix those waters. Grow the tubemen so they kill forever!
Needs to be secret. Needs to be clean... this house. Not some dirty Galleon... hatch open... for trespassers to spread their filth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcloningreache.name: Find a way to sabotage this lab.
Make sure this lab never clones again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddestroytubes2.name: Try to stop my science? My progress... the inevitable... that's impossible. Too many numbers now... 'n when the research is finished... so many more.
Sick thing you're doing Tenno. Suppose I can't blame you though... these'll be full grown soon... 'n we both know what'll happen when they grab hold of a tender little thing like you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcloningfinish.name: Attack me? My science? Maybe you thought you were dealing with that legless parrot... NO! I'm no Hek. You give me a Fomorian fleet 'n you get a different outcome... hellish outcome.
Neffy Neffy. Should have known. Should have put two and two in combination... no surprise... no surprise at all... to find a bottom feeder at the bottom of the sea.
This lab is out of commision.
Good work. The lab is useless now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmanicintrogen.name: You are nearing one of Tyl Regor's newest creations. Make sure it never sees the surface.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmanickilledge.name: Good work. That beast won't be able to threaten any Tenno in the field.
The beast is dead. Your work is done.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis010ordis.name: Operator, you have returned! I am Ordis, ship Cephalon. A shadow of my former self. I cannot serve the Operator in such condition. Order me to self-destruct. I will understand.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis020ordis.name: Look at this mess. Those savages! Components have been removed. The lower Orbiter compartments have no life-support. Why did the Operator abandon me?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis030ordis.name: Arsenal management could be restored, if the Operator wishes it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis040ordis.name: You honor Ordis! Now I can supply the Operator with better modded firepower... Oh the violation!  Those have been looted as well.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis050ordis.name: Ordis hopes the Operator will punish the Grineer for dismantling it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis060ordis.name: Orbiter void cloak engaging… Welcome back, Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis070ordis.name: The Operator has recovered a segment! Install it now- Ordis patiently awaits it's installation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis071lotus.name: Get communications online. I must analyze what Vor's Ascaris is doing to your Warframe. This technology is beyond the Grineer, it must be Corpus in origin.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis080ordis.name: Systems engaging. I suppose this will do- Ordis is grateful.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis090ordis.name: The Operator is now connected with other Tenno in the system. The Operator may now contact black market scumbags- contact arms-dealers.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis091lotus.name: Excellent idea Ordis. Tenno, we need to make contact with a Corpus defector sympathetic to the Tenno cause. They will of course, require compensation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis100ordis.name: You see what Ordis is referring to, Operator?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dordis110lotus.name: In this case compensation will not be credits… it will be freedom. I've updated Navigation. You will need to break him out of a Grineer Gulag.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin010lo.name: For generations you've slept, no purpose, no call to wake you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin020lo.name: But now, something has risen from the ruins of the Old War.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin030lo.name: The Grineer. Swallowing colonies whole, their clones flood the system from a hidden, toxic womb.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin040lo.name: The Twin Queens, the sisters, have sent their most beloved commander, Vor, on an urgent mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin050lo.name: To protect the twisted crusade they have begun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin060lo.name: To transform the scattered colonies into an empire.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin070lo.name: To see that the Tenno, hidden and asleep, will never awaken.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial020lo.name: The time has come, choose your Warframe Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial030vo.name: I see the Lotus has tried to wake you… pity she's too late!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial060vo.name: We are taking this one with us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial070vo.name: Take this one back to my ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial080lo.name: What has he done to you? I can't lose another Tenno. I am surging your Warframe's power systems.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial090lo.name: Quick. Use your power. Defend yourself.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial100lo.name: Your Warframe is burning with power, use it while it lasts.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial130lo.name: I am the Lotus. Your friend and guide. I see that the cryosleep has taken your memories, so for now we will focus on survival.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial170lo.name: Vor's done something to you... but now

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial190lo.name: ...now you have to run. Get to the dropship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial201vo.name: Salvage team, why have you not reported in?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial211vo.name: Where is my Tenno prize? I cannot keep my Queen's waiting!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial210lo.name: An extraction ship is on its way but the Grineer will be hunting you. Your Warframe's power has faded, arm yourself. Find a weapon without Grineer interlock.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial231lo.name: A Tenno's melee weapon honors their warrior tradition. When technology was turned against them, they adapted.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial240lo.name: A Tenno master respects their enemy but offers no mercy. You have much to relearn but I will be with you as I am with all Tenno that still live.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial270lo.name: Your Warframe is out of power. Use another weapon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial281lo.name: This planet was once a wasteland, abandoned. But now that the air has returned, so have the Grineer.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial290lo.name: There's a cache of weapons ahead. Grab what you can.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial300lo.name: With discipline and aim a Tenno's side-arm can strike like a torrent across the battlefield. Choose your weapon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial310lo.name: Tenno. Pick up a weapon. You are running out of time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial330lo.name: Good. The extraction point is up ahead. Hurry before Vor finds out you've escaped.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial341lo.name: Take what you can. You will require resources to build yourself into a diverse and effective warrior.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial430lo.name: Hold tight... there has to be another way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial440lo.name: Okay, I found something. Get to the waypoint.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial450lo.name: It's a relic, an Orokin ship. It has not been...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial460vo.name: That's her plan? Your Lotus thinks she can perform miracles.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial461lo.name: You made it. There's the extraction ship!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial462vo.name: I've searched the dismal deserts of these worlds for too long to let you go!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial463lo.name: You're not ready to face Vor now. Use your melee weapon to block the beam and get inside. I'm not giving up on you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial464vo.name: My decrepit heart is pounding! This one is stronger than the rest. Lock the area down! This Tenno is mine!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial465lo.name: There's an energy signal in the ruins nearby, it may be our only chance but we need to release the lockdown. Search the wreckage - you should find a cipher.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial466lo.name: You need to avoid Vor's beam, or divert it with your melee weapon, Tenno!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial467lo.name: Good. I'm marking the console - use the cipher there to release the lockdown.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial468lo.name: Watch your navigation map, I will be able to map areas you enter as well as mark objectives on it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial469lo.name: Get out of there Tenno, you will have to face Vor another time… when you're fully restored.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial471vo.name: Grineer, my sons, prepare the reinforcements. We need that Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial472vo.name: The Queens want to destroy you, but I need to know more

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial682lo.name: I've marked the console on your map. You need to access it to release the lockdown.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial360vo.name: Fight me. Prove to me you are worthy of this effort.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial370vo.name: I am going to enjoy breaking you Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial380vo.name: So much spirit in you. I have work to do.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial390vo.name: Yes, this proves it. You will make a fine prize.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial400vo.name: You will come to our side. I am certain of it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial470vo.name: Tenno, the system has changed. The Lotus is weak. Come to the Grineer to find true strength.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial480vo.name: Fight me if you want to learn futility.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial490vo.name: Keep running. There is nowhere to go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial410vo.name: I've seen enough. My soldiers will wear you down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwallrun472lot.name: A Tenno flows like fire over the battle terrain, do you remember how to dash across walls?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial520lo.name: A Tenno will face overwhelming odds. Through mastery of all weapon forms the coin of combat lands on its edge.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial530lo.name: Tenno, you cannot survive without arming yourself. Choose a weapon before we continue.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial531lo.name: I'm not sure what Vor has done to your Warframe but we cannot remove it now. Just keep going, the energy sign is up ahead.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial550lo.name: There it is. It is a ship! An old Liset class - hurry, Vor's reinforcements must be on their way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial560lo.name: Disengage the suppression system so we can restart the ship - you'll have to bypass the security on that panel.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial570or.name: Stop touching me you - what? Are my sensors deceiving me? Operator, is that you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial580lo.name: Enemy reinforcements are here! Ship Cephalon, we require immediate extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial581or.name: The Operator is in danger? I will need a few moments to cycle the engines!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial630lo.name: Tenno, the ship is ready, its time to leave

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial640vo.name: Tenno, are you afraid? You cannot hide from these old eyes. I've marked you. You will return to me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial650lo.name: The ship is taking too much damage. Stop them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrotoship02.name: The Grineer are ravenous for this old technology, it is superior to theirs. Perhaps there are systems left in the Orbiter compartment?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrotoship03.name: Captain Vor has attached some sort of bolt to your Warframe. I'm uncertain of it's full effects but it's clear he's using it to track and monitor you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrotoship04.name: This ship's void cloak will keep Vor's prying eyes at bay but you can't stay on the ship forever, you are Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrotoship05.name: You are sworn to protect the balance and Captain Vor threatens that balance. You must act.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfixarsenal060.name: I am detecting that the Liset's Arsenal module has been dislodged. Fix it now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfixarsenal070.name: Good work. The Arsenal is essential to your fight.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcommmodmissio.name: Your next problem is communications. There are other Tenno who can help you but your ship is missing it's Comm Module

We need to figure out what Captain Vor has done to you and stop him. But we'll need help - I've found a communication segment we might salvage for your ship. When you are ready - activate your Navigation system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionreadyn.name: When you are ready, proceed to the navigation console.
Operator, there is much to be done, please consult the navigation console.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinstallcommmo.name: Congratulations, you have the communications module. Now install it at the comm station.
When I am finished, you will be able to contact other Tenno, organize into squads and access the market.
Calibration complete. When you are ready to fight again, come to the navigation console.
Tenno, it's paramount that you install the communcations module.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvomissiond.name: Tenno, until you remove that bolt, Vor will be on you at every turn.
There is a man, an arms dealer friendly to our cause, I beleive he can help you.
But first, you must break him out of Grineer prison. Ready?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutintercepto.name: A nearby communication tower coordinates Grineer attacks on the colonies. It will have the segment we need.
As every moment passes, the Ascaris burrows deeper. Revealing you.
That's what Vor's device is for. He is using his Ascaris to interfere with our connection. I will try to adapt the link.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutinterceptv.name: The Ascaris is working… breaking through. I see the shadows of your mind.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutinterceptu.name: I am making steady progress, the Communications Segment will soon be yours.
What was that? Tenno. Hold out just a bit longer, I am nearly finished.
Activate the console so I can decouple the Communication Segment we need.
You must protect the tower from Grineer until the decoupling finishes.
Do not let the Grineer regain control of the tower.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutinterceptc.name: They've locked me out. Tenno, you'll need to eliminate the Grineer before we can continue.
Eliminate the Grineer to regain control of the tower.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutinterceptg.name: You came here for that communications segment. You cannot leave without it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorprize100lo.name: We have what we came for, now get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorprize110lo.name: Send a message to Vor. Eliminate the remaining attackers.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorprize120lo.name: The communication segment will connect the ship with our Tenno operatives. You are not alone in this fight, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescueobj0.name: The arms dealer is named Darvo. He's being held in the prison block on the other side of this factory complex.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescueobjr.name: Darvo is out for himself, but he is sympathetic toward the Tenno. The Grineer must have found out.
How many Grineer slaves died to build this place?
We've been wrong all this time. Tenno do not control the Warframe's divine energy. The Tenno are that energy. Each Warframe you control is merely a glass shaping your furious light.
Don't let Vor distract you. Focus on the mission, it's our only hope of figuring out this link with him.
Extraction is ready. Remember your success here depends on getting Darvo out of there… alive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescueappr.name: Bypass the security so we can enter.
This is the prison block. If you can avoid detection by the Warden it may be easier to get Darvo out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescuespot.name: You've been spotted. Get ready for a fight.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescuenear.name: Search these cells for Darvo. He has to be here somewhere.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutreschostag.name: Who sent you? Look, tell Alad I will get his credits - Oh... a Tenno, rescuing me? My lucks about to change! Let's go!
A Tenno! Darvo may live a few more hours!
The Lotus must be desperate to send you fetching greedy fools from the Corpus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescshield.name: Now the Ascaris has burrowed deep enough to give me influence. Shall we see how your shields work?
The Ascaris is letting Vor control your shield! We must figure out how to remove it. Avoid taking damage while I try and block him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescueweap.name: Lend me your side-arm Tenno, I'll cover you… which end does the hurting come out? I kid, I kid.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescuehost.name: Tenno, help me! I'm feeling actual, physical pain. Do something!
It wasn't supposed to end this way. Tenno, please, do something.
You can't leave Darvo behind, Tenno. Using your Warframe's revive system should get him moving again.
Tenno! This really hurts, I ain't kidding around. Do your thing!
Oh, thank you. I thought I was a goner. Let's keep moving.
Hey, is somebody out there? Listen, whatever you think I did, I swear, it wasn't me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutrescueextr.name: I owe you for this Tenno. I will get my entourage to meet us in orbit once we're clear of this mess.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlisetpostresc.name: I see the Operator can enable the Mod Segment now! Ordis will be delighted to show you how to upgrade your arsenal. May I recommend fire?
Operator, I've linked the Mod system to your arsenal now. No need to thank me- Upgrade your Warframe now- go to the Arsenal to see the weapon upgrade options you have.
Ordis patiently awaits compliance in using the new Arsenal features… it is for the Operators own good.
An excellent find, Operator. There are hundreds of these Mods to find. If my calculations are correct there are exactly -- a lot of possibilities.
Install the Mod before we can continue.
Thanks for helping me out back there. I'm in your debt… and I often pay my debts. I do recognize that restraint device… we Corpus use something similar to keep our Robotics in line.
I recognize that device on your Frame… it's a restraint. We Corpus use something similar to keep our Robotics in line.
So to settle my debt I'll give you a very expensive blueprint… for free! Because I like you… and well, a lot of my customers don't live long with these Grineer dogs chewing up the system.
Here. Use your Foundry to build the countermeasure device from this blueprint. Good luck!
Vor's Ascaris is burrowing into your Warframe, I'm worried it will affect your mind… I can't lose you Tenno. We must restore the ship's Foundry immediately.
A nearby ore extraction colony will have the Foundry technology you need. I am certain they will share it with you. It's location has been added to your navigation console.
Tenno, we may have a problem, the colony is unresponsive. Get to the surface so we can see what's going on.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutfoundryobj.name: I was afraid of this, the Grineer are here and I cannot find any signs of living colonists. You still have a job to do, find that Foundry Segment.
You located the Foundry Segment, now pick it up.
Tenno, you need to pick up the Foundry Segment before we can continue.
Now there is one more thing you need to do. Eliminate all Grineer and provide justice for the colonists.
This was once a prosperous independent colony and now…
Tenno are you there? The signal cannot be boosted any further. Hurry, you are running out of time.
Good, your ship is one step closer to completion.
Soon the worm will be in your spine and I will control this Warframe of yours… I will purge your doting mother and bring you home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmloss330tesh.name: Match lost. You need more time in The Conclave, pupil.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dannihilation3.name: Out there exists an enemy that can be struck down, incapacitated, dismantled and yet they rise to fight again.  Annihilate the opposing team's Oro to claim a true victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunleads35.name: Team Sun has absorbed the most Oro.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunleads37.name: The lead belongs to Team Sun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunleads39.name: The Annihilation belongs to Team Sun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmmoonleads4.name: Team Moon has seized the lead.
Team Moon has annihilated more Oro than Sun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missionfailedc.name: They've got away. We have failed.
You failed Tenno, your captive has escaped.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutresraidnea.name: You're nearing a supply cache. Take everything you need.
There's a supply cache in the area.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutresraidgot.name: Keep moving there is more here.
Good work but you're not done yet.
Find the next cache, you almost have what you need.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutresraidcor.name: This outpost belongs to The Corpus, a secretive but extremely powerful Merchant Cult known to be working with the Grineer. Darvo will fill you in.
Legions of robots, mindless automatons, freaking lasers! These guys are bad news, but they're also loaded, which is why you're here.
Technically this is stealing but don't let that bother you. The Corpus aren't exactly beacons of moral fortitude either. They sell anything to anyone.
Don't get me wrong, I like profit… a lot, but I don't sell my wares to the damned Grineer. That's unforgivable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutresraidvor.name: You have murdered my sons and disgraced me before my Queens. But soon the Ascaris will complete its task and bring you to me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutresraidobj.name: The Ascaris has reached your mind and rendered Lotus mute. You will return to me… over your own free will.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlisetpostresr.name: This part of your journey is over Tenno. I admire you for your struggle but now… I am part of you.
Lotus, do something! Help the Operator!
We Grineer are millions strong, but with a flaw. We are diseased, rotting, sterile, but now we have you.
Operator, do not abandon me again. Build the countermeasure!
I did this for my love, my Queens! They will forgive my insubordination when I deliver you to them.
Our love will be reborn as we feed on your divine blood and our children will flourish without disease. And I will die, at last, at peace. Father. Grandfather.
What do you think you are you doing?

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbtgthlfhthcrp.name: Take what is ours, then bleed them dry.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbwavalmdonecr.name: Regroup. We'll take the target back by force...For the glory of the Queens.
Need back up! Heavy losses at the target.
Tenno, do you think the Lotus expects you to come home alive?

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbmidwavcrpcre.name: Where the hell is First Platoon?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanctuaryexit.name: Return to me and hunt again Tenno.  I will reward you.
You are a worthy hunter Tenno.
It is time for you and your kind to hunt again.  Knowledge will be your reward.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancwelcome00.name: Ah, I see we are of like mind. The Sanctuary will be your project too.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancnewrankrd.name: What will you donate to the Sanctuary?
Show me your dedication to the Sanctuary.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancnewrankac.name: I can see you are hungry for the knowledge of the Sanctuary.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancloved0010.name: You are a true hunter. Where would the Sanctuary be without you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancloved0020.name: The multitude of creatures you have immortalized would cry out in thanks. If they could.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancrepstoreo.name: This is how I can help you, help the Sanctuary.
These can make you an even stronger hunter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancrepstoreb.name: What offerings will this item help you bring to the Sanctuary?
May this aid you in the Synthesis of many creatures.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancsyndalert.name: My Sanctuary is calling for a new creature. Will you help me by Synthesizing a sample population? I should not need many, perhaps a million.
I have a new target for Synthesis. Which fortunate specimens will be chosen for immortalization in the Sanctuary?
A full Synthesis has been completed. I thank you Tenno. You may explore the Sanctuary for new knowledge.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancglblgoals.name: I have selected a new specimen for Sanctuary. It is time for you and your kind to hunt again. Knowledge will be your reward.
The Sanctuary must grow. It must preserve. It must endure. Hunt this being for me and I will enlighten you.
Cast off your ignorant veil, Tenno. Collect your arms, your allies, and hunt this creature for me. I will reward you, should you perform Synthesis.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancglblgoalp.name: Behold the proof that the Tenno are excellent hunters. But I do need more specimens to construct the 'ideal' for Sanctuary.
Sanctuary awaits this being. Continue with the Synthesis so I may fashion the exemplar for this digital oasis.
Do not disappoint me, hunter! Do your part and I'll do mine. I require more Synthesis of this being. Sanctuary depends on your actions.
Our mission is to preserve these beings of substance, immortalize them. It is not a trivial task.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancglblgoalc.name: Patience, hunter. I must set my mind to condensing your collected specimens into the Exemplar. Only this single template of perfection will live forever within Sanctuary.
Hunter, please leave me to my work. I am filtering through the material you provided. I will honor our arrangement after I have formulated the archetype from these specimens.

Soon, Hunter. Soon I will impart the wisdom you've earned. For now you must not disturb me in the final stages. These samples must be mixed and compressed. Only the perfect aggregate will be immortalized in Sanctuary.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancpsnlgoala.name: Knowledge must be earned, Tenno. I will share what I know but you must prove yourself deserving. Hunt this creature for me, perform Synthesis and you will be enlightened.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancpsnlgoalc.name: You are a worthy hunter, Tenno. I will share what I know of this being should you visit me in the Sanctuary.
Well done, Hunter! See you in my Sanctuary and I will share some of my secrets with you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanccrtrnear0.name: Tenno, I am detecting a Synthesis target. Use the Synthesis scanner to track the creature.
The hunt is on, Tenno. The Synthesis scanner is detecting a potential target. Use it. Search for traces of the target.
There is a Sanctuary target here, hunter! I sense it. Track it with the Synthesis scanner, don't let it escape.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanccrtrfound.name: That's it! It will be a perfect specimen. Trap it so you can Synthesize it for me.
Alright hunter, I will reward you, should you perform synthesis.
There it is, ripe for Synthesis! Tame this creature so you may perform the Synthesis I require.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanccrtrkille.name: No-no-no NO! You've wasted this specimen. Was I wrong to entrust Synthesis to you?
Disappointing. A dead specimen is useless to Sanctuary. Are you not up to this task?
What have you done? Synthesis only works on the living! Can you control your murderous impulses for the good of Sanctuary?
Killing goes too far! Have I been unclear?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanccrtrweak0.name: Excellent, hunter! Quickly, perform the Synthesis!
You've done it! The specimen is ready for Synthesis!
Tenno, do not damage it further! Use the Synthesis device!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanccrtrscan0.name: I have it, thank you! Continue this hunt, Tenno, and enlightenment will follow.
You impress me hunter. This specimen will be studied for integration into Sanctuary. Thank you.
An excellent specimen, hunter. This will advance Sanctuary's goal of preservation.
Good! I have received the Synthesis. You are an efficient hunter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept001.name: Hunter, this target is my current obsession, I must know its every detail, will you oblige my passion?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept002.name: I have a thirst for knowledge that only synthesis can satisfy. This being is the current object of my curiosity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept003.name: This specimen is shrouded in mystery, will you enlighten us with its imprint?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept004.name: Synthesis will be the light that illuminates this creature, with your help of course.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept005.name: This fine specimen could be the next addition to the Sanctuary. Help me discover its secrets.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept006.name: I knew we had a shared passion hunter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0006.name: Vault artifact acquired. You'll need to extract before we can verify its function.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0007.name: The artifact you are carrying appears to be affecting your Warframe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0008.name: Until we get you to extraction, that artifact will continue to affect your Warframe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0009.name: Your Warframe is being impaired by the artifact.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0010.name: It appears that you've triggered security. The Corrupted are here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0011.name: Looks like some Corrupted stayed behind to guard the artifact, it must be valuable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0012.name: The Corrupted will stop at nothing to prevent  that artifact from escaping. This won't be easy.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvintroplan.name: Keep the enemy distracted while our operative conducts a supply raid. Trigger the alarms when you are ready to start.
You are supporting a lone Tenno operative today. Distract the enemy. Trigger the alarms.
On the other side of this facility a lone Tenno is conducting a supply raid. Keep the enemy distracted. Let them know you are here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotussabotages.name: This generator core on this outpost must be destroyed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotussabotagem.name: Keep moving. The power source is deep within the outpost.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotussabotagee.name: The power core has been destroyed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusintelstar.name: Find all the data units on this outpost. Valuable intel lies within.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusintelenda.name: All data units located. Let's get out of here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusextermina.name: Sensors show this outpost is crawling with Infested. Exterminate the threat.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarionetteten.name: I knew I could count on your support Tenno.
Finally, a use for these theives.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinintro030va.name: Ahhh!!! Curse you Tenno. You got me!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinintro010va.name: There is only one truth in politics: evolve or die. I have evolved. You must die.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinintro020va.name: Ahhh!!! Engines failing... ah. Curse you, curse you Tenno. You got me. You got me!

/lotus/language/subtitles/bossbipedambul.name: Obliterate the prototype. We need to be certain it does not make it to the manufacturing stage.
Destroying Ambulas will be a blow to Corpus robotics research. Stay the course.
Ambulas possess a devastating kick for those who get too close. Long range attacks are advisable.
Corpus robotics technology is reaching grave proportions. Destroying this archetype is imperative.
Ambulas likes to play with fire. Try not to get burned.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbalarmsresetl.name: Alarm succesfully hacked, the location is returning to normal security levels.

/lotus/language/subtitles/corpusbipeda.name: Corpus Walkers are heading to your location.

/lotus/language/subtitles/corpusbipede.name: Heavy robotics signature detected. Lock and load.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbcorpbipeddet.name: I'm detecting a large security force heading your way... it's the Gri...no wait, it's the Corpus. Definitely the Corpus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/corpusjackala.name: Here comes trouble. A Corpus Jackal is in your sector.

/lotus/language/subtitles/corpusjackalb.name: Brace yourselves. A Jackal has been detected in your area.

/lotus/language/subtitles/corpusquadrape.name: Here comes trouble. A Corpus Quadruped is in your sector.
Brace yourselves. A Corpus Quadruped has been detected in your area.

/lotus/language/subtitles/grineermarines.name: I'm detecting a large security force heading your way. It's the Grineer.
Watch yourself, foot soldiers are on the way.
You are surrounded by Grineer Marines.

/lotus/language/subtitles/infestedincomi.name: Multiple targets ahead. Leave no one standing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotussentienta.name: I am picking up strange energy fluctuations in the area, remain vigilant.
This is unexpected, our enemy... not operate on these fre...
I'm unable to... Tenno, change of...
Tenno... You are... DANGER.  Something else... Something... powerful.

/lotus/language/subtitles/enemiesunaware.name: Keep moving. None of the scanners have detected you.
You're still in the clear. No detection from enemy sensors.
Keep going. No body knows you're here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbundetectedda.name: Keep going. No body knows you're on this ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/enemiesawarea.name: You're on the sensors now. You've been detected.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbdetecteddarv.name: Wow, they are not happy about you being here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept007.name: Good, even while others are blinded by petty morality, you recognize the virtue of the Sanctuary.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorprefollowu.name: My brothers, did I not tell of this day? Did I not prophesize this moment?
Tenno use the keys, but they are mere trespassers. Only I, Vor know the true power of the Void.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorfightstart.name: Now, I will stop them. Now, I am changed. Reborn through the energy of this Janus Key. Forever bound to the Void.
It is time. I will teach these trespassers the redemptive power of my Janus Key. They will learn its simple truth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvormidfight07.name: We cannot blame these creatures, they are being led by a false prophet, an imposter who knows not the secrets of the Void.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvormidfight08.name: Let it be known. If the Tenno want true salvation, they will lay down their arms and wait for the baptism of my Janus Key.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvormidfight09.name: I was cut in half. Destroyed. But through its Janus Key, the Void called to me. It brought me here and here I was reborn.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvormidfight10.name: The Tenno are lost and they will resist but I, Vor, will cleanse this place of their impurity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorendfight11.name: Behold, they cut me down but still, I speak. I am energy and I cannot be destroyed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorendfight12.name: This death is temporary. My existence is forever. I cannot be destroyed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackboast01.name: The Fomorian cores are the lynch pin of total domination.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackboast02.name: When we are done the Fomorian ships will blacken the sun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackboast03.name: Corpus ingenuity is no match for Grineer audacity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackboast04.name: Fomorians will crush, crush, crush anything in our way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackboast05.name: Be proud. You are building the future.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijacklivestr.name: Tenno! Tenno! Tenno! You think you are winning? You have only been attacking the auxiliary cores!  Did you really believe it would be this easy?!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackcoresto.name: You have taken my bait but you will not take my cores. Grineer ATTACK!!!
You have already shown me your hand. Now it is time to see what I have up my sleeve.
Try it Tenno. Just try and walk out of here with the core.
You are running out of time. There will be nowhere to hide from my Fomorians. And when the last of you is gone I will personally throw your beloved Lotus INTO THE SUN.
What is happening? Where? Where is the core?
Something is wrong. Tenno?!? Stop them!
What is happening to the Tram? Investigate. Investigate now!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackstopthe.name: Come back with the core. Or don't come back at all!
Be warned. Failure to stop the Tenno will result in your failure to continue breathing.
Tenno, Tenno, Tenno are here. Stop them. Stop them at once!
Tenno have the core. They are not permitted to have the core.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijacktaunts1.name: Assassins, thieves, miscreants. Leave my cores alone.
You are only delaying the inevitable. My Fomorians will be built. My ships will rule the system.
We will build the cores faster than you can destroy them Tenno. Mark my words!
You can not stop progress. All will be Grineer dominion.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspymissionobj.name: Tenno, you are here to infiltrate data vaults and retrieve highly sensitive enemy information.
Your mission is to break into enemy data vaults and steal any intelligence files you find.
Tenno, I need you to get inside enemy data vaults and retrieve crucial intelligence data.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyobjreinf00.name: Due to our recent attacks the enemy has installed new security measures to keep us out.
Tenno, be on the lookout for increased security measures, the enemy would rather destroy their data than let it get into our hands.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyvoidrip010.name: The Moon's sudden exit from the Void has had unforeseen consequences, be on the lookout for localized continuity disturbances. You may be able to turn these to your advantage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyconsoledes.name: This console has been severely damaged, you can't get anything out of it in this state.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyapproachco.name: You're nearing the console, trigger the alarms now and they will start destroying the data.
The target console is nearby. If you trigger the alarms now, the enemy will start destroying data.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyretrieveno.name: Data extracted. They won't even know it's gone.
Excellent work, a clean extraction with no alarms.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyretrieveal.name: You got it. The data is still intact.
Data integrity verified, retrieval was succesful.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyalarmtrigg.name: Alarms have been triggered, you need to retrieve that data before the data destruction is complete.
Alarms! Data destruction is imminent. You need to hurry.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspydatalost01.name: It's too late, we've lost this data. You will need to be more careful with the next vault.
They destroyed the data, this must not happen with the next vault.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinfestedmissi.name: Ancients are the most powerful, age and feeding has made them strong.
Ancients are the most powerful, age and feeding has made them strong.
Ancients are the most powerful, age and feeding has made them strong.
Some explode when killed, will need to strike and move.
Some explode when killed, will need to strike and move.
Some explode when killed, will need to strike and move.
Some explode when killed, will need to strike and move.
Infestation. An Orokin weapon… that backfired.
Infestation. An Orokin weapon… that backfired.
Infestation. An Orokin weapon… that backfired.
Infestation. An Orokin weapon… that backfired.
Alright, biological attacks, be ready.
Alright, biological attacks, be ready.
Alright, biological attacks, be ready.
Alright, biological attacks, be ready.
We're immune to this Infestation, but they still try to kill us.
We're immune to this Infestation, but they still try to kill us.
We're immune to this Infestation, but they still try to kill us.
We're immune to this Infestation, but they still try to kill us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsubmersiblede.name: We'll need to watch for aquatic targets.
We'll need to watch for aquatic targets.
We'll need to watch for aquatic targets.
We'll need to watch for aquatic targets.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dannihilation5.name: Sun has eclipsed Moon to win the match.
Sun team's blazing energy annihilates Moon team.
The Moon has lit the path to victory.
The match belongs to Team Moon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmdraw610tes.name: Sun perfectly balances Moon's energy for a match draw.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmdraw620tes.name: A draw. Moon and Sun have fought with equal skill.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmdraw630tes.name: Match draw. Both Sun and Moon honor The Conclave with their performance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstalemate.name: I wouldn't want to see you get hurt!
Vull will enjoy watching you die!
You give me a disappointed face.
This is not boring at all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcvictorysun.name: Sun's light has burned Moon's shadow away.
The fires of the Sun have turned the Moon to ash.
Moon was torn apart by Sun's furious light.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcvictorymoo.name: Moon's surging tide washes away the Sun.
The near Moon eclipses the far Sun.
The oceans of Moon have extinguished the fire of Sun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcvictory040.name: Well done my pupils. You honor our The Conclave with your performance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcvictory041.name: Well earned, pupil. You fought with discipline and honor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcvictory042.name: With this victory your strength and reputation grows.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcvictory043.name: Your enemies will remember this day with humiliation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcloss0450te.name: This defeat is a lesson. Consider your mistakes. Study your enemy's movements. Grow from this moment on.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcloss0460te.name: Failure teaches us more than victory. Reflect on your movements and summon a greater resolve.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctcloss0470te.name: The path to mastery has many setbacks. It is the true masters who remain unfaltering in their journey.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctctie0490tes.name: The match ends in a draw.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctctie0500tes.name: A stalemate between Sun and Moon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen014.name: Intruders! Cephalon Sark has been stolen, eyes wide!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen015.name: Cephalon Sark hates you and your fish-face.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen016.name: Operators! The fish are swimming away with me!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephcarried00.name: Return me and my Operators will forgive you… with their guns!
Watch out for pits and gunfire. I wouldn't want to see you get hurt!
All I want is a piece of you... to tear off and keep forever!

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvomdefprog.name: There you are. Thought you could hunt me, well look who I brought. The Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvomdefterm.name: That's it. hmm... I didn't find what I needed. Go to the next terminal. It should be there. I think.
I'm really sorry about this Tenno but you need to go to the third terminal. I just can't seem find what I'm looking for here.
Here we are. The last one. I'm going to try one more thing to see if I can't lure... I mean find...the target.
You did it, you took care of my problem. That freak's been tailing me for months. That's a load off my back. I'm so relieved.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvomdefmiss.name: Well that didn't work out as planned. Looks like I'm gonna need to find some more Tenno.
That's not good for business. That's not good for anyone.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorintro010qu.name: We tire of failure. Who put their faith in you Admiral.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorintro020vo.name: You did. I have a life debt.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorintro030qu.name: To be paid in Tenno blood.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorintro050qu.name: Do not awaken the vipers. Do not study them. Crush these eggs before they hatch. This we command.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorintro080qu.name: Take the Rail to Pluto. Boril is taking command now… Captain Vor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddeathsquadspo.name: These readings, this should not be possible. Tenno, my sensors are...

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddeathsqaudwar.name: Tenno,  listen carefully you are being hunted by ... Abort the mission... Get to extraction ...

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddeathsquadrun.name: Do not try to stay and fight... They will kill you...
Get away now. You do not want...
The... has been designed.... fight and kill Tenno... Do not risk...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnotallmadeit0.name: We lost Tenno today but you made it out.
We left Tenno behind today but you are safe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dallmadeit090l.name: The mission was scapped but everyone made it out. That is what matters.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dallmadeit100l.name: Even though the mission was aborted, you are all safe. That means we won today.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddeathsqauddef.name: The Grustrag Three have been eliminated. Impressive but Tenno, next time follow my orders.
That was the last of the Grustrag Three, you took a risk but it paid off.
The Grustrag Three have been eliminated.
That was the last of the Grustrag Three.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dalltennocaptu.name: Tenno, do you read. Tenno come in. Tenno...

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddeathsqaudtau.name: I knew they would run. What a waste of time!
I'm going to play with this one.
|PLAYER_NAME| is the scrawniest of them all.
Shiny little pretty things you Tenno are.
Is one of them wearing a scarf?
Are we sure these are the targets? They seem so inconsequential.
Do not waste my time Tenno.
I want to play with these ones.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddeathsquadten.name: Wait to you see what comes next...
Did you know, this is my favourite part?
This one is all mine now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmemberkilled0.name: That one will be difficult to replace.
You are going to suffer for that Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dreconobj010lo.name: You are here to find anything that can be used to neutralize the toxin. Take out any Grineer you encounter along the way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dreconobj020lo.name: This is a recon mission. You are looking for key ingredients that can be used to build an antidote to the Grineer toxin. Destroy any resistance you encounter on your mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dreconobj030lo.name: My research indicates everything we need to neutralize the toxin is located in this forest. Find the key ingredients and wipe out any resistance you see along the way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dreconobjreinf.name: My scans indicate the chemical compounds we are looking for are in your vicinity. Use your scanner to locate them.
Your scanner should be able to reveal the chemical compounds we are looking for.
Keep searching. This forests holds the key ingredients we need to neutralize the Grineer toxin.
The vegatation in this forest grows too fast and too big for even the Grineer to cut down. Instead they have opted to poison the land. We must stop them.
Rather than trying to live within the forest, the Grineer have opted to destroy it. You must not let this happen.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dreconextermco.name: I'm detecting no more Grineer in the area. When you are done searching for ingredients, get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dreconingredie.name: Good. That is one of the chemicals we are looking for. Find as many as you can and then head to the foundry to craft an anti-toxin.
Excellent find. See if you can locate any more samples. When you are done the anti-toxin can be produced in the foundry.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dreconobjspott.name: See that? That's how the Grineer plan to inject the toxin into the biosphere. When we have the anti-toxin, that is where it goes.
Those Toxin injectors are how the Grineer plan on delivering their payload. That is what we are here to neutralize.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabotageobjec.name: You brought an anti-toxin. Find the Injector and neutralize the poison.
The Grineer are attempting to clear this forest by poisoning the soil. Find their toxin injectors and sabotage their efforts.
I see you have an anti-toxin with you, good, we can use it setback Grineer efforts even further. Find the injector and neutralize the poison.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabotageobjfo.name: You have reached the target. Administer the anti-toxin.
You found the poison. Place the anti-toxin in the injector.
You have found the poison, now sabotage the Grineer injector.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabotageobjre.name: Neutralizing the Grineer toxin is the only way to save these forests.
Our attack would be even more effective if we could figure out a way to neutralize the Grineer toxin.
That anti-toxin you brought is going to put a serious dent in Grineer deforestation efforts.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabotagedefen.name: I see you crafted a very potent anti-toxin. It will remain effective for much longer. Be prepared for a lengthy fight.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabdefend170l.name: It's in. Now defend the injector while the anti-toxin works to neutralize the poison.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabdefend180l.name: Ready? Keep the Grineer at bay while the anti-toxin does it's work.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabdefendnoto.name: The injector is now in an unstable overdrive. Keep the Grineer away while it melts down.
We are going to destroy the injector by operating it a dangerously high velocity. Keep the Grineer at bay until it melts down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabotageobjco.name: Good work, the Grineer toxin is losing strength. Get to extraction. This fight is far from over, craft more potent anti-toxins to have an even bigger impact.
Your payload has been delivered. It's time for extraction. Craft stronger anti-toxins to have an even bigger impact on the Grineer poison.
That was a strong anti-toxin, the Grineer will not last long at this rate. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupunavailabl.name: I cannot comply. My system must recharge first.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupmedstart00.name: Hold tight, a Med-Tower is enroute.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupmeddeliver.name: You may now seek medical attention.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupoverstart0.name: Hacking into enemy systems. Await Override.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupoverdelive.name: Override established. Security protocols momentarily disabled.
Override delivered. Security systems temporarily disrupted.
Who's in control now suckers?  er ah, security override engaged.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsupbarrage003.name: Heads up, here comes a barrage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrineerneteng.name: They're trying to trap you in an energy net, destroy that Zeplen to take out the net.
That Zeplen just engaged an energy net, you're stuck in here until it's destroyed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrineernetdes.name: The net is down. Get going.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrineernetnag.name: You're trapped in this net until you destroy that Zeplen.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dawqescapemiss.name: Tenno, you have to keep moving.
You're almost through the debris field. Just a little bit further.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctfintro0020t.name: Without intelligence a vast enemy can be scattered. Defend your team's Cephalon. Capture the enemy's.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dctfintro0030t.name: Awareness and calculation are the tools of warfare. Capture your opponent's Cephalon. Protect your own.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvintro002.name: We were led astray. We forgot The Conclave, so when that new evil came we were not prepared. This is how we failed the Orokin. You went into stasis but not me. I searched the long path for redemption, for the kind of balance only The Conclave can create.  Now I return, only to find the Tenno still herded like livestock.  Horrors from beyond the Outer Terminus are coming. You must prepare, you must accept The Conclave. Let it be your teacher and I its humble guide. For true balance can only be found in the face of the ultimate enemy, yourself.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvopnrepst.name: These offerings honor your suffering and practice.
You seek power, you pay in blood.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclvpchsreps.name: Use it well, as you walk the harder path.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drschostagefre.name: I don't take orders from anybody.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsentientscout.name: Oculysts! If they scan you, Sentient fighters won't be far behind.
Those Oculysts are scanning for targets
Sentient scouts! If they detect you fighters will soon attack.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsentientspawn.name: They know you're here. Prepare for Sentient fighters.
The Sentient has detected you. Fighters incoming.
The Sentient is on to you, look out for troopers.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsentientdamag.name: Sentient fighters can adapt to your attacks. Hit them with something else.
It has developed immunity to your attacks, try something different.
The Sentient has adapted to your damage, surprise them with something new.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsentientmobde.name: The Sentient mind has scrambled the systems. Eliminate all Sentients before I can continue.
The Sentients are causing too much interference, you have to deal with them before we can go on.
This isn't working, it's the Sentients, take them out.
Sentient forces eliminated we can continue.
That's it, they're all gone, we can resume our mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsentientallcl.name: I'm not detecting any more Sentient signatures in your area.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcapturemultio.name: All targets have escaped. This is most disappointing.
They all got away, this mission is a failure.
We lost that one. Do not let any more get away.
Target escaped. Do not let that happen again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missionobjecti.name: This is a rescue mission. We need to find and liberate the hostage before any harm comes to them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rescuemissions.name: Here are the holding cells. Search each one for the hostage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscmissionobj.name: An Operative from the Red Veil is being held hostage somewhere in this facility. Find the hostage and bring them home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missionobjecti.name: There is a prisoner here that is vital to our operations. Search for the holding location.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rescuemissions.name: The captive will be in one of these cells. Search them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missionobjecti.name: Our intel suggests that our person of interest is in the vicinity. Search for the hostage, and bring them home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rescuemissions.name: We've reached the prison. Find our prisoner in one of these cells.
This is the jail. Our hostage is in one of these cells.

/lotus/language/subtitles/goalreinforcem.name: Find the captive as soon as you can, we don't have much time.
We can't leave without rescuing the prisoner, keep searching.
There's no telling what the captors are doing to our rescue target, you need to find the holding cell immediately.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscrvgoalrein.name: The Red Veil is a newly formed resistance movement that has quickly gained traction across the system. We need to support them as much as we can.
Our enemies think they can force the Red Veil into submission by holding their members hostage. You're here to stop this from happening.
Popular resistance to Grineer and Corpus domination has been rare and fleeting. If we don't support their cause the Red Veil will surely fade into oblivion.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivefound.name: You've located the hostage. Escort the prisoner to the extraction point and I'll take care of the rest.
Subject found. You need to bring the captive to safety. Protect them at all costs.
Prisoner located. We need to get them back to command in one piece, find your way to the exits and don't leave the subject behind.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivecompl.name: Mission complete. The captive has been liberated, you will be rewarded for this Tenno.
Escort mission complete, the hostage is safe now. Let's get out of here.
The captive has been secured, you've done your part Tenno, we'll take it from here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drschostagefre.name: I thought I was going to die in there. Thank you.
Thank the stars. Not a minute too soon.
I knew you would come, thank you.
I am in your debt Tenno. Lets go home.
I will not forget this, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drschostagewea.name: I can fight too, if you give me a weapon.
Give me a weapon and I'll watch your back.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscweapreques.name: I don't suppose you have an extra gun?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drschostagewea.name: Got an extra weapon? They won't just let us walk out of here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscweapreques.name: Got a weapon for me? I've got some scores to settle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drschostageple.name: Hurry up, I'm running out of time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missionobjecti.name: We need to take full control here. Get to the rally point and defend it from enemy attackers.
We can't afford to lose this location. We must reach the rally point and resist all opposing forces.
The artifact we need is nearby, but it can't be extracted by regular means. We need to take full command here and defend the location against all attackers until an extraction crew can arrive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/goalreinforcem.name: You are almost at the rally point, keep moving.
We can't let the artifact fall into enemy hands, get to it and defend it at all costs.
I'm detecting a high amount of activity at the rally point, you need to get there pronto.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivefound.name: Okay, we're here. Take up defensive positions, we're expecting company.
This appears to be the primary zone of contention. Brace yourself for attack.
Looks like we beat them here, take up a defensive position and be ready for enemy assault teams.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivecompl.name: That's the last of them, objective is secure. Lets go home.
Very impressive Tenno, you held them all back. Time to get out of here.
We're done here. The extraction team will take over from here, time to evacuate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missionobjecti.name: The intelligence files we need are in the area. Find all four computer access terminals and recover the data units from each of them.
Intelligence files are stored on four separate data units in the vicinity.  We need all the units before we can begin decryption on the data. Get out there and find them.
We need all of the data units being stored in the vicinity. Search the area, find the access terminals, and retrieve each device.

/lotus/language/subtitles/locatenav.name: Your target is this location's computer system. Find and access the terminals.

/lotus/language/subtitles/goalreinforcem.name: There must be an access terminal around here, keep searching, we need those data units.
Its critical that we retrieve that intel. You need to find an access terminal first.
We're running out of time, you need to find all the remaining access terminal and get out of there.
Keep going, we need all of the data units before you can leave.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivefound.name: Here is one of the access consoles, you need to activate it to recover the data unit.
You found an access terminal, use it to release the data mass from its storage unit.
Activate the access terminal and it should release the data unit. Get the device, and get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivecompl.name: Excellent work Tenno, we've got all the data units now. Time to head for the exits.
That was the last data unit we needed. Lets get out of here.
With all four data units collected we can now compile the intelligence files. We're done here, get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/infestedaccess.name: This looks ominous. Infested or not, we need those data logs. See if you can find any consoles that are still operational.
We need all the data logs from any still-functioning consoles aboard this ship. Shouldn't be a problem for you unless the Infested slow you down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missionobjecti.name: The Assassination target is nearby.  Seek and destroy.
We need to find the VIP and take them down. Do not let the target escape.
The VIP that we're hunting is here, find them and take them out.
Assassination contracts are not to be taken lightly. Eliminating this target will have a significant impact on enemy forces. Search the area, leave no survivors.
We've contracted you with a mark. You are here to find your mark, and eliminate the assigned target.

/lotus/language/subtitles/goalreinforcem.name: Keep searching, the VIP is here somewhere.
We need to find and eliminate the target.
We can't let the target escape, you need to find them immediately.
This mission won't be easy, the target you are to assassinate has survived these attacks before. Be careful.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivefound.name: Target spotted. Stay sharp, this one is a handful.
There is the assassination target, you know what to do.
You've located the VIP, time to go to work.
Target acquired, take them down.
The assassination target is here. Wipe them out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivecompl.name: They won't be bothering us anymore, let's get out of here.
Nice work taking down the VIP, now get to extraction.
Target down, assassination contract complete. Great work Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/targetreactorc.name: Disabling the reactor core will cripple the enemy. Find it, and take it out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsbtgextermina.name: Target destroyed. Now eliminate all enemy personnel.
The sabotage is complete. Now exterminate the enemy's forces.

/lotus/language/subtitles/targetnavigati.name: Your target is the system mainframe. Deliver the payload.
Okay, you're looking for the mainframe. It's critical that you deliver the payload to that location.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyalllost017.name: The enemy has successfully destroyed all the data. This mission is a failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyalllost018.name: We allowed the enemy to destroy all their data. This mission is over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyextraction.name: We have everything we came for. Get to extraction.
The data we retrieved will have to suffice. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspyexterminat.name: We cannot let enemy command know we were here. Eliminate everyone.
We've set off too many alarms. Eliminate all remaining enemies so that news of our infiltration does not reach high command.
No further enemies detected. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsmissionobj0.name: The Grineer are attempting to clear this forest by poisoning the soil. You are here to sabotage their efforts. Start with the Toxin Mixer.
The Grineer want to poison the mighty forests of Earth to make more room for themselves. You are here to stop them, find the Toxin Mixer.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsantitoxineq.name: Good, you brought an anti-toxin capable of neutralizing any poison already released into the environment.
The antitoxin you have crafted is strong enough to reverse much of the damage caused by the Grineer poison.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsmixerreach0.name: The mixer activates the toxin by combining it with a biocatalyst. Remove the biocatalyst to render the toxin harmless.
Remove the biocatalyst from the mixer to halt the Grineer poisons creation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsmixerreacha.name: Remove the biocatalyst cartridge and insert your antitoxin.
Insert the anti-toxin into the mixer.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtscataremoved.name: Good work. Now get to the Injector.
Head to the Poison Injector now.
Take care when destroying the biocatalyst cartridge it is highly explosive.
Destroy this cartridge as you see fit.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsinjectreach.name: Set the Injector into overdrive to incinerate the toxin.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsinjectorsta.name: Protect the Injector until it overheats and destroys the poison.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsinjectstart.name: Defend the injector until it has finished pumping the antitoxin into the soil.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsinjectionco.name: You just destroyed a massive batch of Grineer toxin. Good work, get to extraction.
Your anti-toxin has been delivered deep into the forest floor and is already undoing the damage done by the Grineer. Get to Extraction.
That was a powerful anti-toxin. This forest will not only heal but will also be resistant to future Grineer attacks. Extraction is ready.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtscachesremai.name: Tenno, there are still undiscovered supply caches in the area. You may want to locate them before leaving.
An undiscovered supply cache remains. Do you want to find it or proceed to extraction?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtsmissionfail.name: The Grineer destroyed the Injector and saved their toxin. This mission is over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddeath010lotus.name: Thank you Tenno. It should be a long time before we hear Vay Hek's ugly voice again. Now get to extraction, you've earned it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcombattaunt05.name: This is too easy. Tell your Lotus to send more capable fighters next time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcombattaunt06.name: You are not ready for this fight.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcombattaunt07.name: Tenno. What makes you think you are ready to fight Vay Hek?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcombattaunt08.name: The first Grineer who brings me the head of a Tenno will be permitted to wear its skull as a helmet.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcombattaunt09.name: Kill. Kill. Kill. Kill the Tenno scum.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcombattaunt10.name: Your Lotus is leading you to destruction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcombattaunt11.name: You Tenno are such a waste of good violence.

/lotus/language/subtitles/denroute010lot.name: Councillor Vay Hek rose to power by 'eliminating' his enemies on the Grineer council. He now has near complete control which makes him one of the most influential Grineer.

/lotus/language/subtitles/denroute020lot.name: Vay Hek's plans for complete system domination make him too dangerous. You know what to do.

/lotus/language/subtitles/denroute030lot.name: Our operatives tell us Vay Hek has undergone an expensive regime of combat enhancement. Expect the worst.

/lotus/language/subtitles/denroute040vay.name: I knew this day would come. I've prepared, changed myself. I've made sacrifices.  Tenno, Are you ready for a sacrifice?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfightstart120.name: These criminals think they are commiting a justice.  Not in my court.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfightstart140.name: Why are these fools still breathing my air? This is unacceptable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfightstart180.name: Now we finish this business. Once and for all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfightescape13.name: Grineer Brothers. I've done my part, now clean up this mess.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1380st.name: There you are. Do you have the coordinates to the defector's ship?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1400re.name: Have you brought us the coordinates of the Grineer defectors ship?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1420ar.name: Well Tenno, have you decided to give the Arbiters the location of the accused?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1440ce.name: Have you decided to hand the Grineer specimens over to me for study?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1450ce.name: Splendid. I never doubted your curiosity, Tenno. Together we will learn much from the data this dematerialization provides.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1460pe.name: Do you wish to fulfill your end of the contract?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drurelay1480ne.name: Have you brought us the coordinates of the ones to be cleansed?

/lotus/language/subtitles/denteredrelay0.name: The wait is over Tenno. Baro Ki' Teer has arrived.
My latest safari in the Void has yielded spectacular finds. Unique items for the Tenno of distinction.
Tenno, may I extend an invitation to you, my latest collection of choice items from the void is now available for viewing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dleavingsoon00.name: Tenno, if you have not yet had the chance to peruse my wares you had better hurry. I am leaving on another expedition soon.
I have nearly sold out of these items. This is your last chance, I don't know when I will have these again.
This relay is about to get a lot less interesting. Come see me before I go.
Tenno, there is little time left to purchase the finest Orokin era items this side of jupiter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dleftrelay0090.name: Farewell Tenno, until we meet again?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dleftrelay0100.name: I'm afraid I must be off, the Void is calling my name.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dleftrelay0110.name: And now I am off, I hope you don't miss me too much while I'm gone.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetrich0120.name: I have much to show you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetrich0130.name: Oh my, now here is someone with great taste.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetrich0140.name: Ah, I can see you're no stranger to the finer things.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetrich0150.name: Baro Ki' Teer, at your service.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetrich0160.name: You are a Tenno of greater tastes, I can tell just by looking at you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetrich0170.name: I can tell you will appreciate what I have today?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetrich0180.name: Well hello golden warrior, just back from the Void I presume?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetpoor0200.name: Browsing is always free...  how fortunate for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetpoor0210.name: Do have a look, who knows, you may turn into a paying customer someday.
