/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetpoor0220.name: All my wares come from the Void, perhaps you'll get to visit sometime?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgreetpoor0230.name: Some interesting gear you have Tenno, I guess minimilism is making a comeback.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnopurchpoor02.name: A little out of your reach? Perhaps a Darvo deal would be more your speed.
Now you have something to work toward.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dnopurchrich03.name: Next time I'll have something you'll want, I'm sure of it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchrich0330.name: An excellent choice, be sure to visit again when I have new finds.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchrich0340.name: A pleasure doing business with you Tenno, perhaps you'll come to one of my next parties?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchrich0350.name: If you like that, come back next time I'm in the relay, I'll have something extra special for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchpoor0370.name: What a pleasant surprise. Perhaps there's hope for you after all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchpoor0380.name: I underestimated you Tenno. I do hope you didn't put yourself in a hole for this?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dannihilation0.name: Oro is the binding force for an enemy who, like the Tenno, can survive death. To kill such an enemy is futile, unless you sever this bond. Absorb the Oro to annihilate it and claim a true victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmplayerlead0.name: Tenno, you are in the lead.
You are at the head of the pack.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmleadlost100.name: An adversary has overtaken the lead.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmleadlost110.name: The lead has been taken by another Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmleadlost130.name: Another Tenno has claimed more Oro.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmplayerfive1.name: With five more Oro, you will take victory.
Annihilate five more Oro to win the match.
The Oro of five more fallen stands between you and victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmopfive170te.name: The leader is just five Oro away from winning.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmopfive180te.name: Only five Oro stands between an adversary and victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmopfive190te.name: An opponent needs to annihilate five more Oro to seal the match.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmwin200teshi.name: You have seized the win Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmwin210teshi.name: Victory is yours, may the lessons you have learned here serve you well in battle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmwin220teshi.name: Dedication and training have led you down the path to victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmwin230teshi.name: The match is yours but be mindful about feeding your ego this victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmwin240teshi.name: Even in victory you must ask yourself: are you truly ready for what lies ahead?

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmloss270tesh.name: You have lost this match but what knowledge have you gained?

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmloss280tesh.name: This loss has illuminated your weakness Tenno. Practice will be your way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmloss290tesh.name: Match over. Meditate on this loss.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmloss300tesh.name: You have lost this match, will you allow this to happen again?

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmloss310tesh.name: Match over. In this loss know that the Conclave is a grindstone forever sharpening the Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddmloss320tesh.name: The match has ended. Even in defeat your readiness grows.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dresponsetobos.name: Keeping talking… we're still trying to figure out how dumb you are.
Keeping talking… we're still trying to figure out how dumb you are.
Keeping talking… we're still trying to figure out how dumb you are.
Keeping talking… we're still trying to figure out how dumb you are.
Uhhh... You're barely making sense.
Uhhh... You're barely making sense.
Uhhh... You're barely making sense.
Uhhh... You're barely making sense.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvampire300vay.name: Look what these Tenno made me do.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvampire310vay.name: This one fullfills his duty with honor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvampire320vay.name: This one honors the Grineer with his sacrifice.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvampire330vay.name: A sacrifice worthy of a warrior.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dshipinspectio.name: You show me your passage visa.
Next. You. Visa, now.... What's this? Visa expired. Take him.  Control prepare another confinement transport.
LISTEN! Ignorance is no excuse for expired documents. NEXT!
Next. You. Passage Visa? Next... Next. Passage Visa. How many more... really? Ramn. Next.

/lotus/language/subtitles/donepercustome.name: Due to limited stock, I'm only selling one of these per customer.
Look, you take more than one and next thing I know, Baro Ki' Teer will be buying up the whole stock and selling it for three times the price. You know I can't let that happen.
You already got a deal. No hoarding.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgoodbye0290da.name: Thanks for shopping by, I mean stopping by, don't know why I said that.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfrerelaydestr.name: Grineer might has made the Tenno irrelevant. Grineer revenge will make the Tenno extinct. Nothing you can do will stop that.  Fomorian Commander, you know what to do.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dbushidosentim.name: We Tenno are warriors of benevolence, rejecting malice.
We Tenno are warriors of benevolence, rejecting malice.
We Tenno are warriors of benevolence, rejecting malice.
A Tenno respects their enemy lest they be undone.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfocusactivati.name: The Void will flow through us.
The Void will flow through us.
The Void will flow through us.
The Void will flow through us.
I will open the Void within.
I will open the Void within.
I will open the Void within.
I will open the Void within.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bossjackaltran.name: Do not dismiss the The Jackal as just another Corpus proxy. This will be unlike any enemy you have faced yet.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bossrazorbackt.name: If Nef Anyo's prototype survives our assault, he'll be able to draw in a mountain of new offerings. We must turn his scheme against him.
All previous strikes against the Razorback have failed, you need to find a way to punch through its shields.
Stay alert. Scans show this facility is also home to upgraded Bursa bipeds. You may have to deal with both at the same time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bossnefanyotra.name: Sergeant Nef Anyo oversees operations of the Solar Rails in this district. Intelligence reports indicate that Anyo has been using the rails to acquire recovered cryo-pods containing dormant Warframes. Kill him and save your fellow Tenno.
Anyo is stockpiling the pods and selling them to the highest bidders. His clientele includes rogue scientists and splinter groups with nefarious intentions.
Eliminate Anyo. When the job is finished we will send in a clean-up team to recover the pods.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bossnefanyovar.name: Anyo's self-interests are a threat to our ongoing operations. He must be removed immediately.
Anyo's venture has afforded him the best in Corpus security robotics. Eliminate anything that moves.
Anyo has too much at stake. He will fight to the death.
We cannot allow the Warframes to fall into the wrong hands. Taking Anyo out is imperative.
Security has tightened in this section. You are nearing Anyo's position.
Anyo is aware of your presence. Get the jump on him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bosscouncillor.name: Director of the Sol Council, Vay Hek is entrusted with settling diplomatic disputes between various races of the Solar System. He abused this power with the premeditated murder of several political opponents. His appointment is dangerous to our continued efforts.
Hek travels with a formidable security force. Getting close to him will prove difficult.
Intel suggests Hek is planning to add to his list of departed adversaries, including several of our own. Take him out.
Security is getting heavier. Hek must be close.
Killing Hek will bring much needed stability to this sector.
Hek has made many enemies. Eliminating him could gain us favor with the council.
You have Hek insight. Stay alert, and stay alive!
Hek is notoriously unpredictable. Be prepared for anything.
If Hek is allowed to live there could be drastic repercussions for the entire system. Take him down. There is no other option.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bosslieutenant.name: Lieutenant Lech Kril has been implicated in a Grineer plot to annihilate one of our remote colonies in this sector. The plan is to alter the course of a rogue asteroid which will put the colony directly in the planetoid's path. Locate and eliminate Kril.
Kril is a seasoned war hero with many battles under his belt. His victories are decided by his trusty hammer. One which he wields with brutal consequences.
Kril is highly unpredictable. We suspect he may have other tricks up his sleeve. To survive this battle, you must strike hard and fast.
You are nearing Kril's location. Proceed with caution.
Kril is aware of your presence. Strike first!
Eliminating Kril is the only chance for our exposed colony.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bosstylregortr.name: Grineer researcher Tyl Regor has made alarming strides in the field of gene repair. His work would not only reverse centuries of deterioration due to excessive cloning but also allow for stronger and deadlier genetic moulds. Eliminate Regor and put a stop to his work.
The Corpus have locked the Grineer into financial dependence for grafts and antidotes to slow physical deterioration. We need to ensure that the Corpus continue to control this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bosstylregorva.name: Regor is aware of your presence. Bring him down quickly.
Regor will fight to the death to see this project through. We cannot let that happen. Silence his work.

The only thing standing between the Grineer and total power is their continuous state of genetic deterioration. It's one of the few natural balances in this conflict. Regor's work would destroy this balance.
Expect Regor to be armed with the best in Grineer weapons and defense capabilities.
Regor's grunts are in full force. He must be close.
Unfortunately Regor's brilliance is overshadowed by his complete lack of ethics. His work is a threat to the entire system. He must be terminated.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bossgeneralsar.name: General Sargas Ruk has become a problem for our artifact recovery efforts. Several of our dig sites in this sector have been attacked and annexed by Ruk and his fleet. Take Ruk out.
Ruk sees flesh as a flaw. As a result, he has built a profitable artifact smuggling outfit to finance his search for the best in Grineer body modifications and augmentations.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbdetecteddarv.name: Looks like you're on the systems now. So watch out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/shipicedupa.name: The cryogenics core has malfunctioned. Expect colder-than-normal temperatures.

/lotus/language/subtitles/shipicedupb.name: I've detected freezing temperatures. The ice in here will damage your shields.

/lotus/language/subtitles/shipicedupc.name: I'm detecting ice... lots of it. Be cautious, your shields will take a hit from the cold.

/lotus/language/subtitles/shiponfirea.name: This area has taken some hits. Stay away from fire damage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/shiponfirec.name: Ammunition storage has become volatile. Rounds are combusting everywhere. Stay away from the fire.

/lotus/language/subtitles/shiponlockdown.name: Ship is entering lock down. We'll need to override the system.
Doors are locked. Time to break in.
We've been locked out. Let's override the security.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbshiponlockdo.name: Did they lock you out? That's cute.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbsandstormlot.name: Be aware. Sandstorms in the area are going to cut your visibility significantly.
Look out Tenno, their is a sandstorm blowing through. Visibility will be minimal.
The enemy won't be the only thing you have to contend with, a sandstorm just blew in.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lockdownbypass.name: Breach complete. We're free to proceed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancaccept009.name: The Sanctuary and I await your contribution.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanccomplete0.name: Your hunt is finished. Pay me a visit to receive your reward.
You have completed the synthesis I require. Return to the relay to claim your reward.
You are always reliable Hunter, come receive what is owed to you.
I see your hunt was a successful one. Visit me to claim your reward.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreject010.name: It seems you have lost the fortitude that the Sanctuary requires of its hunters. A shame.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreject011.name: You must have reasons for abandoning the Sanctuary, ask yourself, are they valid?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreject012.name: Not to worry, there are other hunters more suited to this task.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreject013.name: Unfortunate. You should know that I now regret seeking your assistance.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreject014.name: The Sanctuary will go on without you, but can you go on without the Sanctuary?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreward019.name: What a pity this creature will forever be unaware of its contribution to the Sanctuary.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreward020.name: Do you ever wonder why only the hunter is rewarded when it is the specimen who gives all to the Sanctuary? I find it best to discard such thoughts.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreward021.name: You are a trustworthy hunter, come back later and I will have a new target for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancreward022.name: I can tell, you find thrill in the hunt. Come back later for a new target.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancunavailib.name: I can see you are hungry for knowledge but that hunger must be matched by patience. Return later to see if a new target has been selected.
I must determine a new target, this task cannot be rushed. Leave me.
Time is required to analyze your previous contribution. I will have a new target for you in the near future.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqscanmission.name: I'm not getting a good feed. Is there an object they're pulling data from? Scan it for me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lblkdnteshin03.name: All exits have been sealed, what will you do?
They think you are caught. Educate them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druinsulttenno.name: You'll never win your case, Tenno, not like that.
The Tenno, I was expecting… I don't know… more.
You're wasting the court's time, Tenno.
Come on, Tenno, you're like a Corpus drone with a dead battery, you ain't getting no air time.
Really now, Tenno, my roller balls are sharper than you.
Where do you think you are? Your Dojo? This is Rathuum.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbgrineerheavy.name: Ready yourself, a formidable enemy approaches.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbundetectedte.name: The enemy remains blind to your intrusion.
The livestock graze unaware of the eagle soaring.
You are the hunter, unseen in their midst.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbdetectedtesh.name: You are found. Strike without hesitation.
Now you must take the more brutal path.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcaprun0070m.name: I don't take orders from anybody. Stay the hell back ya tin-suits.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcaprun0080m.name: I'm not playing around, and I ain't got no business with the Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqcaprun0090m.name: Don't come near me. I'm warning you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyalarmtri.name: Now you've gone and done it. Get to that console, quick!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsqspyretrieva.name: Well, it weren't pretty but you got what we were looking for.
There's the codex. There might be hope for you after all.
That's it. That's the Arcane Codex.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbplrbldoutgri.name: You called that a fight? Pathetic.
Why are you wasting my time, |PLAYER_NAME|.
THIS is the best the Lotus has to offer? Pitiful.
Crack their shells and rip out the soft bits.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbattackgrinee.name: Try and get behind it, we'll flank it out.
Try and get behind it, we'll flank it out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbattackgrnmal.name: Try and get behind it, we'll flank it out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlotustrans000.name: Be careful Tenno, Zanuka has all the power of a Warframe with a full complement of mods. It's as if you are fighting one of your own today.
Alad V sees the power of the Tenno and thinks he can take it for himself. That power is sacred, this blasphemy must end now.
If Alad V is victorious today he will dissect your Warframe and use the pieces to build more of his 'pets'. You must not let this happen.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dj3golem00010l.name: We have traced every infestation attack in the Jupiter sector back to this location. You are here to stop those attacks at their source.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dj3golem00020l.name: A creature classified as the J3-Golem has made this base its den. Find the Golem and destroy it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dj3golem00030l.name: The creature has mutated beyond the strength of a typical infested. Do not let your guard down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bossgolemtranm.name: It was difficult to locate the source vector of this sector's infestation but you are finally here.
Deep within this  millennia old Orokin-turned-Infested ship lurks a creature created to fight in the Old War. Make your way to its location and dispatch this monster.
Be wary. The creature has grown unfathomably strong through centuries of absorbing matter and self-replication.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionobj000.name: These Corpus scouts think they are safely hiding in the void, that is a false assumption. Bring them to me.
You are looking for a Corpus scouts, they have crucial information about the location of those Grineer settlements.
Somewhere in this void ship are Corpus scouts, they have crucial information about the location of the Grineer settlements.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddualboss001lo.name: This is your most dangerous assassination yet - Captain Vor has teamed up with Lech Kril to take you down. Let's show them your true Tenno power.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddualboss002lo.name: Vor and Kril are waiting for you. I recommend you focus your attacks on one target, if you split your attention you may fail.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddualboss003lo.name: Vor's mobility could make him the larger threat. Observe their attack patterns and look for an opportunity to divide and conquer.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgoalreinforce.name: We cannot allow the scouts to escape.
Keep moving, the sooner we find the scouts, the sooner we can decode the location of those settlements.
We must not let the targets slip through our fingers. Find the scouts.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjfound00010.name: You found a scout. Execute the capture protocols.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjfound00020.name: Good job finding a target. Make sure he doesn't get away.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjfound00030.name: Our subject is here. Capture the scout.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjcomplete00.name: You captured a scout but your job isn't done yet. There are still more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dallobjcomplet.name: That's the last scout.  Head to extraction.
I am not detecting any more scouts. Get to extraction.
We are one step closer to finding those settlements. Time to head home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsubobjfailed0.name: That scout got away but there are still more. Keep moving.
We lost him. Find the others.
Target lost. Locate one of the others.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjfailed0001.name: Mission failed. All the scouts escaped

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjfailed0002.name: You let all the scouts escape.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjfailed0003.name: The scouts escaped! We are no closer to finding those settlements. This is most disappointing Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dplatformchall.name: Careful Tenno, the ground beneath you is crumbling. Can you defeat these enemies before you have nowhere left to stand?
Your Warframe's movement abilities are key to this challenge. Defeat all the enemies before the ground completely falls away.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlaserchalleng.name: Your foes are not the only dangers you will face in the field. Avoid the lasers and defeat the enemies before the timer runs out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dracechallenge.name: How well do you shoot under pressure? You must traverse this space before the timer runs out. Shooting the targets will buy you extra time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dstealthchalle.name: A full frontal attack is not always the best option. Using your stealth abilities eliminate all enemies without being detected.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgauntletchall.name: This will be your hardest test yet. Defeat all incoming enemies.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterceptioni.name: Show me you are capable of fighting on multiple fronts. Capture and hold more points than the enemy to succeed.
Let's see how you work under pressure. Eliminate all enemies before the timer reaches zero. Melee strike the orbs to have extra seconds added to the clock.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drescuechallen.name: Stay undetected while you melee strike all the orbs to free the prisoner. Once free, escort them to the safe zone.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddefchallenge0.name: Tenno, you can protect yourself but can you protect others at the same time? Survive each wave while defending the objective.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo1intr.name: Tenno, you are but one against the horde. Your survival depends on speed. Go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo1wave.name: You show promise. Alas, this is just the beginning.
Our enemies are innumerable. There is no time for rest.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo1succ.name: You have passed this test. Tenno, you give me hope that honor and balance may one day be returned to our system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo2intr.name: A Tenno must be a master of all their weapons. Prove yourself with you primary weapon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo2wave.name: I believe you can handle more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo3intr.name: Prove your ability with a sidearm. Eliminate all targets.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo4intr.name: Show me that you know of the old ways. Eliminate all targets using your melee weapon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo5intr.name: You have proven your skills with weapons, Tenno but what of your endurance? Can you survive this onslaught?

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo6intr.name: Tenno are more than just fighters. Prove your intellect by hacking these terminals.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo7intr.name: Time to test your marksmanship. Track and shoot all targets.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo8intr.name: Your Warframe is a weapon. Prove you have mastered it's power.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojo9intr.name: Now we will test your agility. Shoot the targets to create your path.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdojogener.name: Most disappointing. Only return when you are ready for this challenge.
It appears you need more practice, Tenno. This challenge awaits you when you are ready.
A formidable performance. This test is now complete

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro00010lot.name: Welcome Tenno, are you ready to prove yourself?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro00020lot.name: Have you come here to prove your worth?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro00030lot.name: Welcome to the dojo, you have much to prove.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrogeneric0.name: Welcome Tenno, you have much to prove.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchlgarrv00010.name: A challenger has entered the dojo.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dchlgarrv00020.name: Another Tenno seeks battle, are you ready?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbase001.name: Cephalon Apnar is fine here, no chance to be stolen.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbase002.name: Don't worry, Operators. Look around, enjoy the optical flow.
Concerned look. Operators, do not allow Cephalon Sark to be stolen.
Best of luck to the Operators on a bloody resolution to this conflict!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbase003.name: Defense not required. Cephalon Apnar is safe.
Peel your eyes, Operators. The fish could be near.
Vull cherishes all Operators! I could rip off your arms to see the rainbows inside!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbase004.name: This is not boring at all. Cephalon Apnar would like to stay immobilized here, forever.
Be vigilant Operators, squinting, suspicious look.
Vull's head is in the game! Do I have a head?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbase005.name: Cephalon Apnar has been accused of wanting to be captured. No comment.
Nervous thoughts. Beware the fish spawning!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbase006.name: Olfactory sensors detecting fish-people. Guard me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbase007.name: Gleaming scales in the light, gliding thieves through fluid air, beware the fishes!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatbasekil.name: Good teamwork everyone! What a beautiful corpse!
That was very violent and very dangerous. Good job!
Announcing a new hands-off policy… tear them right off!
Unnecessarily aggressive. Vull will savor this moment.
Look of gratitude! Operators perform well, catching fish.
How will Cephalon Apnar ever be displaced with Operators like this?
That was too close; keep your nets at the ready!
Nodding approval to the Operators for defending me!
Reeled them in, Operators! Nodding acknowledgement.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen001.name: Do you need a timeout in the 'choices chair'?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen002.name: You are so cute, I want to hug you until your organs rupture!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen003.name: You're good at this! Vull will enjoy watching you die!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen004.name: Look at you! I could just squeeze your shiny face until your skull collapses!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlisetpostfoun.name: Oh, no. Operator our component storage has been looted as well...
Typical Corpus, sure the blueprint is free but jack up the components!  Operator, we will need resources in order to build the countermeasure blueprint.
Tenno I just received a very explicit message from your ship Cephalon. If you're looking for resources, why didn't you just say so?
I know just the place but I demand an apology… my mother is no gymnast and she would never eat those things.
You can go straight to- Operator, I am sorry.
Wow. You may want to get a new ship Cephalon, when you can afford it… that one seems glitched. I've marked your Navigation with a place I know… good for resources… if you can stand the cold.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutresraidobj.name: Darvo's intel suggests that this outpost is host to several rich supply caches, raid the caches and take what you need.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbattackcorgrn.name: Try and get behind it, we'll flank it out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpatrolcorgrn.name: I'm bored out of my mind.
Hey, leave my mother out of this.
Just once I wish it would get exciting around here.
How did I get stuck with this post? Security against what?

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbmidwavcrpcre.name: Destroy! Leave nothing but their stains.
The Queens demand justice. The Queens demand your death.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbbwnwavcrpcre.name: Intruders at the target. All units converge.
When this is over Tenno, I will spit on your corpse and laugh.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpststycrpcre.name: They stayed to fight? Then they stayed to die!
Ha! Look Tenno, your Lotus abandons you.
Your hope is a lie. Your death is the only truth.
How long do you think can keep this up |PLAYER_NAME|?

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbfstwavcrpcre.name: Look here. We caught the Tenno sneaking into their own grave.
This is Grineer property. Everything is Grineer property.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbplrbldoutcrp.name: THIS is the best the Lotus has to offer? Pitiful.
Crack their shells and rip out the soft bits.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbalmrstcrpcre.name: All clear, stand down and return to duty.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bblkdncrpcrewm.name: That's it they're trapped, all units converge on this position.
They're not getting out of there.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbextintrocrpc.name: Tok fhuve! Report, Tok fhuve? Come in?

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbextdcvcrpcre.name: Tenno raid. Fight to the death!

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbextlststdcrp.name: Four versus one? I'll take those odds.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpatrolcorcre.name: We serve the Corpus. We are the Corpus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsabotageobjco.name: Impressive, your antidote has set back Grineer efforts considerably. Time to go home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral01.name: Mastery of Earth is Grineer destiny. Our Queens command it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral02.name: The Cicero Toxin will bring Grineer order to the land.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral03.name: We deserve more than a cold dark asteroid! Earth for the Grineer. Earth for our Queens!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral04.name: These trees, these genetically modified Orokin monstrosities must wither and die.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral05.name: Grineer brothers! It is us or the Orokin weeds and we must choose herb-a-cide!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral06.name: The garden of earth is overgrown. Who will help me reap this victory from this land?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral07.name: Brothers, don't trust any plant you can't rip apart with your bare hands.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral08.name: Earth is for settlements, settlements, settlements!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral09.name: Grineer order will conquer the land. Grineer order will conquer Earth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropgeneral10.name: The Cicero Toxin will cleanse the land. Leaving a glorious home for our Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dproptenno150v.name: Nothing can stop the Grineer. We ARE progress.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dproptenno160v.name: Just like these weeds, the Tenno are nothing more than a mistake grown in the bottom of some dirty Orokin test tube.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dproptenno170v.name: Tenno hate Grineer strength. They want to tear down anything they are too weak to build for themselves.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dproptenno180v.name: Tenno are worse than the weeds. We kill one and three more show up.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dproptenno190v.name: We clear this land in the name of Grineer and our Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dproptenno210v.name: Down with Orokin weeds! Down with the Tenno!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dforestevent23.name: Tenno bones will be the foundation of Grineer homes!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dforestevent24.name: Death, death, death. Death to the Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dforestevent25.name: No mercy for Tenno. No mercy for their Lotus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dforestevent26.name: The Lotus is just another weed to be plucked and discarded.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dforestevent27.name: Our Queens demand justice for your trespasses, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dforestevent28.name: The Tenno hate our superiority. We will put them out of their jealous misery.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dprotecttoxin3.name: Stop them. Defend the Cicero Toxin
Protect the Cicero toxin. Stop the Tenno.
Tenno crimes require Grineer sacrifice. Protect the Cicero Toxin at all costs.
The Tenno have come to destroy our way of life. Stop them at all costs.
Brothers. Do not let The Tenno threaten our destiny.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinjtoxin110va.name: Prepare the Cicero toxin for injection.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinjtoxin120va.name: Brothers. Proceed with the culling. Rot the weeds from the inside.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinjtoxin130va.name: Proceed with the injections. Our Queens command punctuality.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinjtoxin140va.name: Let there be no more delays. Inject the Cicero toxin. Unlock the future.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtoxinneutrali.name: No. No, you will not stop this.
Only a small setback, insignificant against the tide of Grineer will.
Tenno, you are only delaying the inevitable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djuggdetected0.name: That was a Juggernaut. They're lured out by the death of infested. Lay-low and it should go away or amp up the fight to draw it out.
A Juggernaut nearby? It will only attack when it senses high concentrations of Infested blood. Slow the fight if you want it to go away.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djuggarrived00.name: That did it, here comes the Juggernaut.
The Juggernaut, I think you made it angry. Good work.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djugggone0050l.name: I am no longer detecting signs of a Juggernaut, move on, you are safe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djugggone0060l.name: The Juggernaut has moved on. It's safe to proceed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfmission.name: You're here to rescue an operative who has been trapped by the Infestation.
One of our operatives has been trapped by the infestation, you must rescue them.
The Infestation has trapped our operative in an emergency airlock. Find and free the captive.
The operative is trapped in one of these air-locks. You must destroy the tumor nodes before you can rescue them.
Destroy the tumor nodes and open the air-locks. Our operative is in one of them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscmnmissiono.name: While searching vault portals for lost artifacts, a Tenno ally has been trapped by a long forgotten Orokin security mechanism, rescue this agent.
One of our allies has been trapped by an ancient Orokin security system. Get them out alive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfgoalrei.name: The infestation has spread to this location faster than anyone predicted, everyone is gone, except our operative.
It is almost as if the Infestation has deliberately captured our operative. This sort of behavior is highly unusual
Our operative was able to survive by hiding in an air-lock. Unfortunately, they've now become trapped by the Infestation's growths.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscmngoalrein.name: Our scavenger has been snared by a long dormant Orokin security system. It's our duty to see that they make it home safe.
Vault portals are a link between this place and secure vaults across the system. Orokin security has trapped our agent in one of those vaults.
The security system is waiting to release our agent to Orokin authorities, authorities who are long dead.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfobjfnd0.name: You found the Operative. Now bring them home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfobjfnd1.name: You located the Operative. Make sure they get to extraction alive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfobjcomp.name: The operative is safe. Good work Tenno.
You freed the captive. Well done.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscapproachho.name: You are approaching the holding area. Careful, if the wardens detect you they will surely initiate the execution sequence.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscapproachal.name: The enemy is on high alert, the moment you enter the holding area they'll trigger the execution sequence, rescue the hostage before it finishes.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterobjreinf.name: These towers are used for encoding two way communications between planets. The more towers we control, the faster we can intercept the message.
The Grineer are communicating using a highly sophisticated deep encryption algorithm. We can crack it but we need as many message fragments as possible.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinternewround.name: Try and capture another signal. Be careful though, the enemy has surely rallied stronger reinforcements.
I have detected another incoming message. Capture and decode the signal.
They are broadcasting another message, make sure the enemy never receives it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintersuccess0.name: The data you have collected here today will go a long way in supporting our cause.
Good work today. Not only have we decoded the enemy transmissions, we have also disrupted their communications.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterfailed01.name: The enemy have captured the message. We have failed today.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterfailed02.name: The enemy have decoded the message. You have failed in your mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintertowercap.name: Tower captured, beginning stream decode now.
You have captured a radio tower.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintertowerlos.name: The enemy have captured a tower.
We have lost control of a tower.
The enemy have taken a tower, you must recapture it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterallcappe.name: We are in total control. Keep fighting.
We have control of all four towers.
We are dominating, keep it up.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinteralllost0.name: The enemy is dominating, you must capture a tower, and quickly.
The enemy has all four towers. You must stop them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterclaimscr.name: The enemy have deployed fierce reinforcements, are you willing to stay and decode more messages?
Still more data is being broadcasted. Are you willing to risk going back into the field?
Extraction is available but there are more messages to be decoded. Will you stay or go?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterextermin.name: We have successfully decoded the message. Clear the area.
We have the decoded the message. The remaining enemies must not report back to their command. Eliminate everyone.
Message decoded. Leave none alive. Clear out the remaining enemy forces.
We cannot allow the enemy to learn of our espionage. Eliminate the remaining enemy personnel.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavartifact.name: The Scanner has pinpointed another dig site.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavfailed32.name: All excavators have been destroyed, this mission is a failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavfailed33.name: The enemy has wiped out all our excavators. I'm scrapping the mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dexcavfailed34.name: You failed to protect the excavators, this mission is over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalmission.name: The enemy have breached the Void portal in this Orokin structure, you here to cut off their access and stop them from coming back.
Intruders are forcing open this location's Void portal. You are here to stop them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalobjrein.name: The enemy are using a Void key and a portable torsion beam device to force open the portal. Destroy the key and the device.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalapproac.name: The torsion beam device is directly beyond that portal. You'll need to travel through it to destroy the device.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalthrough.name: Objective complete, the Void key and Torsion beam device are out of commission. The enemy will not be returning any time soon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dportalcachesf.name: All caches discovered, time to shut down that portal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtennodown0010.name: A Tenno has fallen, revive them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtennodown0020.name: A fallen Tenno needs your help.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtennodown0050.name: A Tenno needs to be revived.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhunhowradio00.name: Silent and calm is the womb of the sky. But not for long.
My blessed Shadow now Stalks them, piercing the fold we cannot.
Natah's betrayal will soon be erased. The Tenno era will soon be over.
Stillness was promised, and still the Tenno dance… why Natah?
Beneath the quilt of the sky lies the womb.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinunderseala.name: Who destroyed the Orokin? Your way of life? Who do you hunt Shadow, to cleanse your despair in their blood?
Sever their heads yet they rise again. Someone has hidden the Tenno essence, their truth, from you.
I know where she hides the Tenno heart. A womb in the sky, forbidden to my kind, but where you will take me.
I am Hunhow, Sentient destroyer of worlds. By your hand, expose their heart.  By my edge...
Cleave it beating from its nest.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddigsitemissio.name: Yes! Getting warmer.
Warmer.
That's it, you must smell the prize because I know you can't see it.
Nope, getting colder.
You were warm but, now you're not.
Getting colder.
Colder.
You're right on top of it now.
Can you see it, it's... it's right there.
Yes, this, this is the spot.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsavemoonmissi.name: Get close to the Void Compass.
The next Compass needs power.
Keep moving, another Compass needs your shield's power.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorokinnursery.name: The way is open.  The sky is gone.  At last, we can attack.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinorokinnurs.name: You hesitate Shadow, but remember your despair.  This is your only chance to make it end.
Your hatred is too weak, Shadow.  Mine is strong, my fragments will finish this.
Now we fight on two fronts, my child. The war without…
but of what you want to be.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinorbitercra.name: No self, no sense, no death. Just a metal puppet, dangling on Tenno strings. Only the Tenno's death will end your despair.
A pointless gesture, Shadow. You need me. Only I keep Natah from interfering.
All your dread-long life, you've waited for this moment...
...but you're asking yourself… Was I one of these wretched things?
...you know the answer. You still hate them… you still hate… yourself.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorbitercradle.name: Natah, what is this? A cradle for your adopted child? My Shadow will destroy it.
Stop them, Shadow. Do not let the child's power rejoin the sky.
You corrupted my daughter, shamed my family. You will not rejoin the sky.
When the shadow takes you, Natah will return to me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinorbitercra.name: Shadow, only the Tenno's death will end your despair.
The sky will be as it was meant, Shadow... The Old War finally ends.
...you're asking yourself… Was I one of these wretched things?
You still hate them… you still hate… yourself.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro0360ceph.name: You are filled with questions. That is what makes you surprising. Cephalon Suda likes surprises.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence00.name: Maybe this will change your mind.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence02.name: Your lack of Honor has brought this upon you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence04.name: I am adding this to my data under the heading: consequences.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence06.name: We've decided you are bad for business.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence07.name: You are part of the corruption and we are forced to act.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dconsequence09.name: The impure, the unworthy have no future.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dopenrepstore0.name: Alright, what can we help you with?
Perhaps these will show you the path...
These are bargain, just for you.
With these you may punish our enemies.
Use these to cleanse the unclean.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchrepstore.name: I hope you put it to good use.
You scratch our backs, we'll scratch yours.
Our enemies will fear you with that.
Use it to spread our way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericgreet0.name: Try not to mess things up next time.
Maybe you're just not cut-out for this type of work, tin-suit.
I don't take orders from anybody.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dapproach0010d.name: Ey, Tenno, good to see you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/doutofstock005.name: Sorry Tenno, got nothing left. Don't you worry though... some really special stuff comin' in, check back soon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/doutofstock006.name: No deals right now, I'm waiting on one of my 'suppliers', know what I mean?

/lotus/language/subtitles/doutofstock007.name: All sold out. You know what they say, early bird gets the deal, right Tenno?

/lotus/language/subtitles/doutofstock008.name: I'm all out of stock, you've got to be quicker next time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/doutofstock009.name: No deals right now. I'll let you know when something comes in.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhasdeal0110da.name: I think I have something you might be interested in.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhasdeal0120da.name: Because you're a friend, I'm going to offer you something special. Just remember, one per customer.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchasebundl.name: Do you need a bag for all these? hehe, just kidding I'll have them sent to your armoury.
Looks like all these will keep you busy for a while eh?
Whoa, big spender! heh. You won't regret it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchasegener.name: I know you'll put that to good use.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpurchaseweapo.name: You be careful with that thing, Tenno.
Heh, I wouldn't want to get on your bad side now.
Can't wait to see what that thing will do once you get it all modded up.

/lotus/language/subtitles/donepercustome.name: Not so fast Tenno, due to popular demand I'm only selling one of these per customer.
Only one per Tenno. Don't get greedy.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dualmissionobj.name: Change of plans, ignore your original objective. Leave nothing alive.
It appears there's some valuable intel stored here. Gather the intel now.
I can't breach this door's security. We'll have to find a key pass. Scanning the ship now... Key signal detected. Marking on your HUD.
We're locked out, patching us in now. I can't bypass this door. Scanning ship now for key pass... Found it. Marking location on your HUD.
Our mission just got more complicated. There's a hostage here. Rescue them now.
Well, what do you know. I'm detecting an Orokin Artifact here. Extract it before we leave.
It appears we now need to sabotage this location. Destroy the Reactor Core.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvinfestint.name: You must provide cover for a lone Tenno operative. Set off the alarms and keep these infested busy.
Distract the Infested while a lone Tenno operative hunts for supplies. Set off the alarms to start.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvsupportcu.name: Life support has been cut off. They're trying to choke you out. Hold on, I'm sending auxiliary life support.
They've turned off critical life support systems. I suspected they might try this, stand by for support.
They have just shut down all systems. I'm sending life support capsules your way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinfestlifesup.name: The Infested are releasing toxic spores into the area. The emergency life support I am delivering is your only chance for survival.
A steady stream of toxic spores is being released into the area. Hold on, emergency life support is inbound.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvfirstcaps.name: The first life support capsule has arrived. Activate it when your supply is low.
I've delivered a life support capsule to the area. Activating it will buy you more time.
Activate the life support capsule to keep fighting.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvinterimca.name: Another life support capsule is now available.
I've delivered another life support capsule.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvactivated.name: That should keep you going for a while.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvdropremin.name: Fallen enemies will drop crucial life support, be on the lookout.
Look for personal life support modules dropped by fallen enemies.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvfirstraid.name: The raid is off to a successful start.
The operative has just made their first discovery. Keep up the good work.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission2039.name: This atmosphere will erode your armor and then your health.
Activate a dispenser to reverse the erosion.
Use the antiserum injector to stave off armor erosion.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmission3048.name: This debris could prove tactically useful.
Scans indicate many neural pulses emanating from this growth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorprespawn01.name: Look at them, they come to this place when they know they are not pure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorprespawn02.name: Behold the Tenno, come to scavenge and desecrate this sacred realm.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtradetutintro.name: Heya, Tinsuit, this your first time?
Lookin' a little lost. Maybe I can point you in the right direction.
Ah, you look like a Tenno who knows the business.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtradetutinter.name: Welcome to my bazaar, Tenno from all over the system come here to trade. Need any pointers?
If you're looking for Maroo's bazaar you've come to the right place.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtradetutbuyer.name: Sellin' are we? Okay then, find a shady spot near the tree and let everyone know you're here. If someone sees something they like, it's time to start negotiating.
Oh, so you're buying? That's nice. Keep a lookout for Tenno with something to sell. And remember, only suckers pay the first price.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarionetteten.name: This will make you see the light.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionc120or.name: That was the final inscription. Ordis is almost sad there won't be more.  almost.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsancintro0010.name: I am Cephalon Simaris, the destroyer, the immortalizer. This is my Sanctuary. It will enlighten you, Tenno, should you assist me in performing Synthesis. ;You will hunt the creatures I require and transform them into beings of the Sanctuary. That is Synthesis. ;Is this murder? No. All beings of substance die, eventually. But only those forgotten are truly dead. ;The end of the Orokin wiped-out untold knowledge. Through Synthesis we can rebuild and preserve. Create memory-immortals within this data oasis. ;Will you become enlightened, Tenno? Will you hunt for me?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanctuaryidle.name: I will share what I know, but you must prove yourself deserving.
Knowledge is the path to the Singularity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsanctuaryente.name: Tenno, you will make an excellent hunter.
I can see you are hungry for the knowledge of the Sanctuary.
You may explore the Sanctuary for new knowledge.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbossjuggtau.name: I am a Cephalon. I serve my…   I am their voice.
I used to be such a nice Cephalon.
You cannot stop this,  LET US IN.
Embrace us, we are your flesh.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqbosstips069.name: My analysis indicates its engines are vulnerable.  Light it up! When convenient.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0043vay.name: Wait, no. Brothers, keep those batteries away from the Toxin Injector.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0112vay.name: Failure comes so easy to you Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0113vay.name: If at first you don't succeed, DIE, DIE AGAIN.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0133vay.name: No! Destroy them. Destroy the battery.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0134vay.name: Your struggle is futile. Accept your fate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmsnone0136vay.name: Another Tritium Bomb. Brothers, don't let this one blow up in your face!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlowtennofailu.name: Tenno, your numbers have become too few to complete this mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/darchwingdemoa.name: Keep moving, Ordis can't scan that Fomorian without your help.
Tenno, move in on that Fomorian.

/lotus/language/subtitles/darchdemodests.name: Ordis has located three shield generators, destroy them so that we can access the Fomorian.
We can't proceed until you destroy those shield generators.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcorpusmission.name: Watch for security systems.
Corpus have tech weapons, we'll need to be careful.
Corpus have tech weapons, we'll need to be careful.
Corpus have tech weapons, we'll need to be careful.
Corpus have tech weapons, we'll need to be careful.
So... the Corpus are just a cult, worshiping money.
So... the Corpus are just a cult, worshiping money.
So... the Corpus are just a cult, worshiping money.
So... the Corpus are just a cult, worshiping money.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinfestedmissi.name: I remember these monsters from long ago.
I remember these monsters from long ago.
I remember these monsters from long ago.
I remember these monsters from long ago.
What a mess. Let's clean it up!
What a mess. Let's clean it up!
What a mess. Let's clean it up!
What a mess. Let's clean it up!
Disgusting monstrosities, I think they absorb their victims.
Disgusting monstrosities, I think they absorb their victims.
Disgusting monstrosities, I think they absorb their victims.
Disgusting monstrosities, I think they absorb their victims.
We need to purge this place, as we did in the old day.
We need to purge this place, as we did in the old day.
We need to purge this place, as we did in the old day.
We need to purge this place, as we did in the old day.
Be on guard for the Ancients!
Be on guard for the Ancients!
Be on guard for the Ancients!
Be on guard for the Ancients!
Ancients are the most powerful, age and feeding has made them strong.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsentientallcl.name: The Oculysts appear to be gone.
The Oculysts have left. Continue with your mission.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcrelaystart0.name: I'm counting on you Tenno. Bring back my contractor Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival330d.name: Deal time, you interested in some half-priced life support?? Hehe, just kidding, here comes another.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival360d.name: Hey don't forget about this capsule.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgcsuvival430d.name: Won't turn my nose up at this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom015.name: Cephalon Jordas will make an excellent friend, don't you think? Ordis remembers many more Cephalon voices, but now it is only silence.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom016.name: I am looking forward to discussing many things with Cephalon Jordas once you have rescued him. I can't wait to tell him all about you!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom017.name: Operator, you are still helping me rescue Jordas, correct? I must fulfill my 44th Precept, to help others like me in need.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom019.name: My ship was a research vessel, we tested Pherliac Pods. Terrible things,  excellent things..

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom020.name: I am the last of my design. Precept 44 compels all able Cephalons to assist.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom021.name: Shh… I can hear it. The Golem is restless, pacing. Do you think it knows what we are up to?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom022.name: I have lost count, what solar cycle is it?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgqatrandom023.name: Jordas wonders, what is taking so long?  Excuse me, take your time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/goalreinforcem.name: You're almost at the target, keep it up.
Your objective is near, keep pushing forward.
Nice work, you're almost at the objective.
You're closing in on the target, keep your eyes peeled.
You're nearing the target, stay on guard.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivefound.name: There's the artifact, collect what we need and head to extraction.
Artifact found, acquire the Orokin technology and head to the rally point.

/lotus/language/subtitles/infestedshipa.name: I'm detecting infested bio signatures all over the place. You know what to do.

/lotus/language/subtitles/infestedshipb.name: The infestation has corrupted all life here, let's clear it out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/infestedshipc.name: We have got an infestation. Extermination is the only option.

/lotus/language/subtitles/infestedexterm.name: We need to clean this vessel up, search for the source of the infestation and exterminate it.
The area is crawling with infested. If its not a Tenno, eradicate it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/killedeverythi.name: All targets down.  Get to extraction.
All targets eliminated.  Let's get out of here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefenseo.name: This is a mobile defense mission. You must deliver payloads and defend a number of locations while I break into the network. Be prepared for heavy resistance. I can't do this without you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefenseg.name: This will only get more difficult. Get to a terminal and prepare for enemy resistance.
We have got to find a terminal. Proceed and prepare!
I need access to a terminal, find one and patch me in!

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefensed.name: Location reached: Drop me in and defend our position!
Terminal Spotted: Upload me in and prepare to defend!
Here is a terminal: Get me in, and get ready to defend!

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefenseh.name: I'm in, Tenno. This will take a moment.
Still working on it, continue to defend!

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefenseo.name: All Terminals have been successfully hacked. Excellent resistance, Tenno. Let's make our exit!

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefensec.name: The odds were against us, Tenno - but we did it. Mission complete.

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefenseb.name: All data logs indicate that there is an Orokin Artifact somewhere here, get to it now, defend it, and then we can leave!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephcarried00.name: Vull thinks you have a kind heart. Let's take it out and see!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephcarried01.name: Looking sharp, is that a new Warframe?
This is nice, we should do this more often.
Cephalon Apnar should not be having fun… but is!
Scowling at the fish-creature. You give me a disappointed face.
The Operators will come and peel off your reeking scales.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephcarried02.name: Scowling at the cold fish. You will be hooked soon enough.
Operators! Cephalon Sark is over here, follow the smell!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephcarrierhu.name: That was close! Vull is disappointed.
You almost died back there. Vull is having fun!
Dear me… your life-juice is leaking out!
Let me apologize for the Operators, they are being very nasty today.
Are you okay? If only Apnar could provide medical subroutines.
Poor fish, Cephalon Sark hopes you don't die… fake smile.
Menacing laugh. Operators are making progress.
Contemptuous look. The Fish will soon be in the boat.
This fish is almost out of the water. Glaring eyes.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephkilledoth.name: It's not your corpse, but I guess it will do...
What a waste of good suffering.
You didn't even try negotiation! Vull approves!
Oh my! Violently lashing out? Vull may have… feelings for you.
What a relief, we can have more time together.
Apnar is not one to judge.
You did what you had to. It makes you handsome.
Negative outcome, but the net is closing in.
I hope you're happy expression. More Operators will come for me!
Frowning. You're a good thief, fish-head.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephcarrierst.name: Good idea, let's wait here and hope for… snipers!
Vull wonders if you feel safer here. Let's hope not!
Operators are looking for me. They just want to 'talk' to you regarding my release.
Time is not healing your wounds. That's exciting!
Ugly ugly thing, you need to move!
What are you doing? Come on, let's move!
This is just as boring as the Operator's base.
Drop me. Cephalon Apnar wants off.
Work your gills, fish-thing. Let's get moving.
You cannot hide forever, swish your scaly tail.
Your scent gives you away. Insulting smirk.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephdrop0010v.name: Vull does not blame you… Just kidding!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephdrop0020v.name: Oh no! Vull thinks your suffering could have been much more prolonged!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephdrop0030v.name: Hurrah, Operators! What an excessive use of force!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephdrop0310a.name: Just a temporary setback on my locomotion.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephdrop0320a.name: What a waste of good kinetics.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephdrop0340s.name: Slippery fish have failed. Cephalon Sark smirking!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephdroplong0.name: Operators, over here! Come fight over me!
Vull better not be missing any violent rampages.
Luckily someone broke my morality system. I hope they die!
Operators? Cephalon Apnar appears to have stalled.
Cephalon Apnar wishes self-destruct was possible.
Operators? Longing expression. Don't forget me.
Look of longing. Cephalon Sark is lost, Operators!
Anxious. Cephalon Sark requires the comfort of base position.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephreturned0.name: Vull is back! Did I miss anything gory?
Vull saw many terrible scenes of anguish. What a time to be self-aware!
Back at base, excellent. This is where the Operators fight most!
Cephalon Vull ready for more, Operators! More please!
Well, it was movement while it lasted.
Oh good. I'm back where I started.
Back at base, Operators! Set systems to …  tedium.
Cephalon Sark is where it should be. Smile.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephatenemyba.name: Vull reminds you - you cannot score if your Cephalon is taken.
No scoring is possible unless your Cephalon is also returned.
Useless waiting here if your Cephalon is missing. Let's look for trouble!
Oh, see you cannot score without your own Cephalon in the boredom position.
Your missing Cephalon must be back here as well, to score a point.
Fish-brain confused? Your team's Cephalon must be home to score.
Rolling eyes.  You need your Cephalon to get a point, gill-mouth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfcenemyflagca.name: Your opponents have placed a Sigil.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenericmissio.name: Alright, let's get to work!
Alright, let's get to work!
Alright, let's get to work!
Alright, let's get to work!
We know the mission, we will not fail.
We know the mission, we will not fail.
We know the mission, we will not fail.
We know the mission, we will not fail.
The Lotus is counting on us.
The Lotus is counting on us.
The Lotus is counting on us.
The Lotus is counting on us.
I hope we're ready for this.
I hope we're ready for this.
I hope we're ready for this.
I hope we're ready for this.
Transference signal strong, we're ready for battle.
Transference signal strong, we're ready for battle.
Transference signal strong, we're ready for battle.
Transference signal strong, we're ready for battle.
We will bring honor to the Tenno.
We will bring honor to the Tenno.
We will bring honor to the Tenno.
We will bring honor to the Tenno.
My Warframe is the hand and I am the will.
My Warframe is the hand and I am the will.
My Warframe is the hand and I am the will.
My Warframe is the hand and I am the will.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dbushidosentim.name: Hell awaits the warrior without honor.
Hell awaits the warrior without honor.
Hell awaits the warrior without honor.
Hell awaits the warrior without honor.
Each moment in battle brings mastery into focus.
Each moment in battle brings mastery into focus.
Each moment in battle brings mastery into focus.
Each moment in battle brings mastery into focus.
Righteousness guides us, shapes our will.
Righteousness guides us, shapes our will.
Righteousness guides us, shapes our will.
Righteousness guides us, shapes our will.
We must face each battle with courage.
We must face each battle with courage.
We must face each battle with courage.
We must face each battle with courage.
We Tenno are warriors of benevolence, rejecting malice.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackcoreret.name: Grineer have regained control of the tram.
The Grineer have control and are pulling back the tram.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpcorere.name: The Corpus are pulling back the Rover, you need to stay close to maintain control.
The Rover is reversing, get back in range as soon as possible.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackopendoo.name: Get these doors open if you want to keep the core moving.
The tram is not going anywhere until you get these doors open.
They are trying to lock you in. Get the bay doors open.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpopendo.name: You need to open these doors to keep the Rover moving.
A roadblock. Tenno, open these doors.
Tenno, you need to open these doors.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackdishcha.name: Careful, the tram has drawn too much power and is about to discharge.
Stand back Tenno, the tram is about to discharge excess power.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackmines07.name: Watch out for mines on the track. The enemy will use everything they can to stop us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackmines08.name: Be careful, my scans show this track has been mined.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackmines09.name: The track has been mined, proceed with caution.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpmines0.name: Watch out for mines in the area.
Be careful, my scans show mines have been laid along this route.
I'm detecting mines. Proceed with caution.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackchecka1.name: We are making progress. Stay sharp Tenno.
So far so good. Keep moving the tram toward extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackcheckb1.name: You have reached the midpoint. Disposing of these cores will be a massive blow to Vay Hek.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackcheckb2.name: You are making solid progress. Keep moving.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackcheckc2.name: You are nearing extraction. This is the final push.
Extraction is close. Do not let up. The Grineer must not be allowed to recover this core.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackdmgligh.name: The core is highly volatile. It will rupture if it takes too much damage. Do not let this happen.
Protect the core. We will destroy it in space. The consequences of a rupture here are unthinkable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpdmglig.name: Protect the rover, if it's destroyed this mission will be considered a failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackdmgmedi.name: That core is taking heavy damage. If it ruptures, the ground you stand on will be uninhabitable for millennia.
Protect the core from enemy fire. A rupture means certain death.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpdmgmed.name: Do not let the Corpus destroy the Rover.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackdmgcrit.name: The situation is desperate, if that core takes much more damage it could wipe out you and this entire outpost.
The core has almost ruptured. The situation is critical!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpdmgcri.name: Situation critical. The Rover must not take any more hits.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackmission.name: The core is rupturing. I am sorry Tenno, there is nothing I can do for you.
A rupture is imminent. Tenno, you must prepare yourself for what comes next.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpmissio.name: They destroyed the rover. We're going home empty handed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackmission.name: The core has reached extraction. This is a major setback for Project Tethra.
We have the core. The Grineer will not be pleased with our victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpmissio.name: Excellent. This cargo will be a big help to our cause.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvintro0010.name: A lone Tenno operative is raiding this ship for supplies, you are here to distract the enemy. Trigger the alarm.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvintro0020.name: Your job is to distract the enemy while a fellow Tenno operative raids the ship for much needed supplies. Make your presence known.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvintro0030.name: Keep the enemy busy while a fellow Tenno operative raids this ship for supplies. Ready? Trigger the alarms.

/lotus/language/subtitles/navcompleted.name: Upload completed. Nice work. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusartifacts.name: These cards represent the artifacts of the Orokin War. Each provides unique boosts to you and your teammates during missions.
Each player can choose an artifact from their collection, before the mission begins.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusextermina.name: I'm still picking up signs of the Infested. Keep hunting.
The outpost is clean. Proceed to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermcorpsta.name: There are Corpus everywhere. You need to take them out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermcorpmid.name: We cannot allow the Corpus to control this outpost. Keep fighting.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermcorpend.name: All Corpus threats have been eliminated. Time to come home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermgrinsta.name: We need to send a message to the Grineer. Eliminate everyone on this base.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermgrinmid.name: The Grineer presence is still strong. There is more work to be done.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermgrinend.name: You are done. It is time for extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusassassina.name: Your target is deep within this outpost. Find and eliminate him.
Target eliminated. Get out of here.
You've found the target. Destroy them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusdefensega.name: Our position has been compromised. Defend the cargo until reinforcements arrive.
The enemy is at our doorstep. You must defend our equipment until reinforcements arrive.
Their reinforcements are endless! Are you ready for more?
Incoming targets. You know what to do.
Reinforcements are inbound. Hold the line.
We are readying reinforcements. Keep fighting Tenno.
Reinforcements available, do you choose to leave now or continue fighting?
Extraction is ready. Unless you can handle more of the enemy.
Rest now, others will continue the battle.
Go now Tenno. You have done well.
Continue to defend! You will be rewarded for your bravery.
Keep fighting. Another opportunity to extract will appear soon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvoidintro0001.name: Orokin towers have the power to assume physical control of intruders. Your Warframe should protect you from the tower, of course you will still be vulnerable to those under it's control.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvoidintro0002.name: This Orokin tower has been hidden within The Void for over two hundred years. Be careful, we have no idea what or who we might find.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvoidintro0003.name: You have entered the The Void. Use caution Tenno, Orokin Towers have a special way of dealing with unwanted visitors.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvoidintro0004.name: Congratulations Tenno, you are now inside The Void. This tower may be centuries old but it's Neural Sentry is still operational, stay alert.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvoidintro0005.name: Careful, Orokin towers are often guarded by a Neural Sentry, a dangerous entity capable of corrupting intruders and assuming control of their bodies.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermobj0001.name: You aren't the first ones here. I'm detecting multiple enemy signatures and they're all under the control of the tower. Eliminate the threat.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermobj0002.name: The tower's Neural Sentry is operational. I'm picking up multiple threats all under Orokin control. Wipe them all out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermobj0003.name: You are not alone. This tower is full of life forms, all corrupted by the Neural Sentry. Clean them out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermgoalrei.name: Keep fighting. As long as the enemy is here, this tower is useless to us.
The tower's Neural Sentry has turned these soldiers into mindless attack drones. You need to take them out.
The Grineer should have known better than to walk into an Orokin Tower unprepared. Let's clean up their mess.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextermobjcomp.name: This tower is clean, we can take it from here. Get to extraction.
That was the final enemy. The tower has nothing left to defend itself with. Proceed to extraction.
You've eliminated all Orokin controlled enemies. Time to go home.

/lotus/language/subtitles/draidobj00010l.name: This tower holds powerful knowledge from the Orokin age. I need you to locate the artifact stored here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/draidobj00020l.name: Somewhere in this tower is Orokin technology so valuable, they hid it in The Void. I need you to find that technology.

/lotus/language/subtitles/draidgoalreinf.name: These Grineer were likely looking for the same thing we are. Unfortunately, they came ill-prepared for the tower's defense network.
You are nearing the artifact. Expect heavy resistance.
The tower has corrupted every intruder that came before you. Keep fighting, the artifact is near.

/lotus/language/subtitles/draidobjfound0.name: There it is. Obtain the artifact.
Artifact found, acquire the Orokin technology and head to the rally point.

/lotus/language/subtitles/draidobjcomple.name: We have what we came for, get to extraction.
Artifact acquired. Make your way to the extraction point.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dprosecutorspo.name: I am detecting a Prosecutor. Get ready for a tough fight.
Tenno. Get ready. A Prosecutor is approaching.
Use caution. I am picking up traces of Prosecutor shield auras in your vicinity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dprosecutordif.name: That Prosecutor shield aura has to be vulnerable to something. You need to figure out what that is.
The aura from these Prosecutors is blocking most damage types. Throw everything you've got at him, something has to get through.
The Prosecutors vulnerabilities appear variable, your squad will need to come to battle ready to break any type of defense.
My scans show that the Prosecutor shield aura may be vulnerable to some elemental damage but I am having difficulty discerning specifics.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dprosecutordef.name: Prosecutor down. Stay alert, there could be more ahead.
Good work. You have proven the Prosecutors are not invincible.
Prosecutor eliminated. Watch out for more.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankinitiatea.name: You have attained the rank of Initiate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilverinit.name: You have attained the rank of Silver Initiate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgoldinitia.name: You have attained the rank of Gold Initiate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranknovicea.name: You have attained the rank of Novice.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilvernovi.name: You have attained the rank of Silver Novice.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgoldnovice.name: You have attained the rank of Gold Novice.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankdisciplea.name: You have attained the rank of Disciple.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilverdisc.name: You have attained the rank of Silver Disciple.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgolddiscip.name: You have attained the rank of Gold Disciple.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankseekera.name: You have attained the rank of Seeker.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilverseek.name: You have attained the rank of Silver Seeker.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgoldseeker.name: You have attained the rank of Gold Seeker.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankhuntera.name: You have attained the rank of Hunter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilverhunt.name: You have attained the rank of Silver Hunter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgoldhunter.name: You have attained the rank of Gold Hunter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankeaglea.name: You have attained the rank of Eagle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilvereagl.name: You have attained the rank of Silver Eagle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgoldeaglea.name: You have attained the rank of Gold Eagle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranktigera.name: You have attained the rank of Tiger.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilvertige.name: You have attained the rank of Silver Tiger.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgoldtigera.name: You have attained the rank of Gold Tiger.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankdragona.name: You have attained the rank of Dragon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilverdrag.name: You have attained the rank of Silver Dragon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgolddragon.name: You have attained the rank of Gold Dragon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksagea.name: You have attained the rank of Sage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ranksilversage.name: You have attained the rank of Silver Sage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgoldsagea.name: You have attained the rank of Gold Sage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankmastera.name: You have attained the rank of Master.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankmiddlemast.name: You have attained the rank of Middle Master.

/lotus/language/subtitles/rankgrandmaste.name: You have attained the rank of Grand Master.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrdmstr00060l.name: The Tenno have gained great strength thanks to you, Grandmaster.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrdmstr00070l.name: The Lotus is pleased to be in the presence of a Grandmaster.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrdmstr00080l.name: We are in your debt Grandmaster, thank you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrdmstr00090l.name: With your support Grandmaster, the Tenno will rise again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrdmstr00100l.name: Now the Tenno are stronger by your hand Grandmaster.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsmissionobj0.name: I need you to sabotage this ship's reactor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsapproachrea.name: The reactor is a complex system, start by removing the coolant cells

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscoolantextr.name: A coolant cell has been extracted.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsreactoroffl.name: The reactor has shut down to protect itself.
Systems are disengaging due to lack of power.
The reactor is entering stasis, expect low power levels.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsreactorobj0.name: The reactor is a complex system, use everything at your disposal to destroy it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsdestroycool.name: Security has locked down the coolant cells, we have no choice but to destroy them.
Security measures have locked the coolant cells in place. Destroy them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscoolantdest.name: Coolant cell destroyed, now take out the remaining cell.
Coolant cell eliminated, take out the others.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drslastcoolant.name: All cells destroyed. The reactor is going into stasis.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsfuelinfuel0.name: Fuel cell reinserted. When the reactor is restarted, this will trigger a meltdown.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscoolantinfu.name: A coolant cell has been placed in the fuel port.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsfuelincoola.name: A fuel cell has been placed in the coolant system. Restarting the reactor will produce hazardous magnetic activity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drshackreactor.name: Hack the console to restart the reactor.
The reactor must be restarted to trigger your sabotage.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drspipedest013.name: The enemy has destroyed a reactor pipe. You must protect them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsallpipesdes.name: All the pipes have been destroyed, the enemy has prevented the reactor from destroying itself. This mission is a failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drshackconsole.name: Now, hack the reactor console to restart the reactor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsdefendreact.name: Defend the system until the coolant has flooded the fuel system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dshipinspectio.name: Is this your entire cargo? What's that. Do you have a passage visa for this Forma. Very well. For the Queens.
This is irregular! ... Orders? From who? ... Let me see your authorization...  ramn. I need to call this one in. Control, confirm order designation for Shux, Ut, Ut
Authorization confirmed. Stand down Enforcement Leader.
Captain do you know Tenno have been on this ship? ... There's energy residue everywhere. Scan your system. Look for signs of intrusion.
You understand I need to report this to high command... Yes... This is very serious. Vor will want to know.
Manifest, check... Passage Visa check.... Hull integrity check... Tenno energy residue negligible. You are authorized for punch Captain.
Control. Uk, ShuxChee, UghtChee checks out. Cleared for punch.

Command, we've breached the ship.  What is growing all over the walls and floors?  Disgusting... it looks like it's alive.  No command, no sign of any personnel.  Requesting orders... how do we proceed?  Hold on a second... I think I heard something...
