/lotus/language/subtitles/dannouncements.name: A warrant has been issued for the rogue Corpus smuggler known only as Darvo. This individual is thought to be behind a rash of thefts and hijackings.
The Tenno capture warrant has been upgraded. All Tenno are to be exterminated.
Brothers and Sisters, The Tenno uprising is an opportunity. After their demise, nothing will be left to stop complete Grineer liberation of the Origin System.
The Tenno awakening must not interfere with Grineer liberation of the System.
By Order of the Queens, all Grineer agents are to hunt down and eliminate Tenno and Tenno sympathizers.
Today, the mining Colonies of Saturn welcomed Grineer troops as liberators. Rebel leaders were executed to launch public celebrations of this momentous occasion.
Grineer forces in the Outer Terminus have become increasingly distracted by encounters with Tenno peh-tuk. Councillor Vay Hek's Fomorian ship initiative is sure to restore order to the area.
The Tenno threat is always present. Eternal alertness is the duty of every Grineer.
By order of the Queens, Admiral Vor will lead the Tenno execution program. Vor has vowed to destroy the Tenno before they awake.
The Corpus have finally agreed to our demands. The Grineer will now have access to technologies that further our fight in the Outer Sectors.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpatrolcorcre.name: Reporting biological and mechinical energy levels in check.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindcollardef.name: A recent Grineer excavation has uncovered a Orokin era Kubrow Collar. The Grineer are not pleased about you taking their treasure, defend the artifact until extraction arrives.
With that collar you may now become fully bonded with your Kubrow.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dkubrowcomplet.name: It is done. The collar has been attached and the bond between Tenno and Kubrow has been cemented.
Operator, you will remember to care for the beast, won't you? Ordis doesn't care either way…  do I?
You are an adorable organism, aren't you- What am I saying?
Leaky, filthy, stinking- floppy, fluffy, cute … Argh- Ordis is confused.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqhelmet021or.name: So, this 'Limbo Theorem' you picked up, it's supposed to lead to a new Warframe? Well, it's woefully incomplete? Half-written proofs, unfinished equations, what idiot wrote this mess??  Okay. Okay. There is one thing here, a constant, a tuning frequency but it's so minute, the Orbiter's antenna would never be able to… unless…go to your nav console, I have an idea.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqintersucces.name: Scan completed. Were you able to recover any Proof Fragments?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqintertowerc.name: A tower has been captured, scanning the Limbo frequency now.
We are now in control of this tower.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqintertowerl.name: They took control of our tower  make them pay!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqinterallcap.name: Operator, I'm please to report that we are in full control.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqinteralllos.name: may I suggest you capture a tower?
Operator, they have all four towers.  Stop them!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlqinterexterm.name: Scan complete, now we must clean up.  Kill them all!
Excellent, we have completed the scan. May I suggest  turning every last enemy into scrap!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissiona005or.name: Operator, what in stars could this possibly mean?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissiona007or.name: I found this inscribed on that Orokin Artifact you just crafted. You should check your inbox for more information.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissiona010lo.name: There's strange energy in the area. A void imprint, an old one. I'm getting faint visuals - memories. Continue the mission while I investigate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissiona020lo.name: The Void imprint... it's old. I see... Worm ships coming out of punch! A Warframe fighting Sentients... shields are failing... Sorry, Tenno, I'm not sure what that was.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissiona031lo.name: Tenno, this is an important discovery - a Warframe design that was thought lost. Have Ordis construct that blueprint, it could give us a clue to where the next memory is hidden.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlimerick040or.name: Operator, did you enjoy that poem? Ordis is composing one as well, it begins: A scumbag Corpus from Venus...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionb045or.name: Operator, exciting news. Ordis found another inscription on Mirage's helmet. Allow me to recite it:

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionb047or.name: For closer inspection, I've placed the inscription in your inbox.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionb050lo.name: I'm sensing another void imprint. It's dark. I see the glow of restraints around the Warframe. I'm trying to surge the revive system but I can't, I'm too far away. A great, faceted eye watches her.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionb060lo.name: I tell her I won't lose her. That I have another ship on its way. She is smiling because she knows I am lying...  Tenno... the second blueprint has been recovered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionb071lo.name: Construct the Warframe component so we can decipher the next clue. Though I must admit, Tenno, I'm not sure I want to know what happens next.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionc067or.name: Ordis has placed all the information in your inbox.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionc070lo.name: I see the eyes open and the heat blinds me. I hear her comforting me, telling me not to despair as the Warframe disintegrates and I lose her, forever.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionc080lo.name: Tenno, the last piece of her... of Mirage... has been recovered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionc100lo.name: Tenno, that was the last of the imprints. Forge this Warframe in honor of these memories.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dactvduel00030.name: It's time to issue your challenge.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcnclduel00010.name: A challenger has left the dojo.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dduelwin00010l.name: You are a worthy fighter but you must always stay vigilant.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dduelwin00020l.name: Very good Tenno, you have defeated the challenger.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dduelwin00030l.name: Excellent - you have defeated your challenger.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dduelwin00040l.name: You are a strong fighter, our enemies have much to fear.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dduellst00020l.name: You have lost. Perhaps more training is in order.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dduellst00030l.name: You are in need of practice Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dualmissionobj.name: We've received a message that we are to eliminate a target at this location. Carry out the assassination.
Well, this just got interesting. We now need to capture a target here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbinchvygrinex.name: Enough games. Time to finish this.
If anyone runs, I'll kill them myself.
Your tin skin will bleed agony |PLAYER_NAME|.
Are you ready to look your death in the eye, Tenno.
These worms will be nothing more than stains on Grineer boots
Come...test your mettle. I crave a true challenge.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbalmtrggrinee.name: What's going on? Squad captains report!

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbalmrstgrinee.name: All clear, stand down and return to duty.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bblkdngrineerm.name: That's it they're trapped, all units converge on this position.
They're not getting out of there.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bblkdngrineerf.name: They're trapped in our cage, kill the snakes.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbextintrogrin.name: Tok fhuve! Report, Tok fhuve? Come in?

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbextdcvgrinee.name: Tenno in the vinicity, do not let them escape.
Tenno raid. Fight to the death!

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbextlststdgri.name: Four versus one? I'll take those odds.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lblkdngrineers.name: Commencing Lockdown. Trespassing is an offence punishable by death.
Engaging Lockdown Procedures. Intruders, you will not leave this place alive.
Lockdown Activated. Surrender and you will receive a quick death.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbvesselchange.name: WARNING: Vessel is changing course, please stabilize yourself while the ship adjusts its flight pattern.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbvesselunders.name: DANGER: The vessel is under attack by a hostile force, all hands prepare for battle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbreactorcriti.name: WARNING: Reactor systems malfunction, power levels critical.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbhullbreachgr.name: WARNING: The hull has been breached.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbemergencylig.name: Emergency lighting systems activated, backup systems online.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbpublicservic.name: You are Grineer. You are always prepared for battle.
Your Twin Queens are your leaders, your guides, your mothers. You obey them totally.
Live for the battle; obey the safety protocols of this vessel.
Failure to report equiptment malfunctions is a punishable offence.
Unauthorized use of equipment is prohibited and subject to punishment.
In the event of emergency you are required to remain at your post.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbpagegrineers.name: Code 13 in Engineering. Code 13 in Engineering.
Code 6 on the Mining Deck. Code 6 on the Mining Deck.
Flight Commanders to Bay 3. You are loaded and ready.
Engineering to the Reactor Core on Deck 2.
Technician to the Navigation Console on Deck 4.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvorintro0010v.name: Vor: Foolish Tenno, do you realize your Lotus has sent you to die

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin010bo.name: Boril: You shouldn't be here old man. This is my prize

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintrocin020bo.name: Boril: Are you listening to me? It's MINE!

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbbwnwavcrpcre.name: A unit who betrays their operator is a defective unit. The Tenno are all defective units.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpststycrpcre.name: You cannot halt progress. The machine never falters.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpststycrpai0.name: Heat signatures detected at the target. Activating auxillery defense systems.
Tenno heart rate rising. Detecting traces of fear.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpststycrpcre.name: There is no logic in your choice |PLAYER_NAME|.
They continue to fight? Does the Lotus not value these Tenno units?
We too choose to continue this conflict.
Corpus Crewman: Analyzing Tenno Strength: Catastrophic failure imminent.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbfstwavcrpai0.name: Mobile Offensive Artillery units online. Beginning defense protocols.
Hostile lifeforms detected. Execute erradication protocols.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbfstwavcrpcre.name: We were created by The Corpus. We serve The Corpus. We are The Corpus.
Duty is how we honor The Corpus. Duty compels us to eliminate |PLAYER_NAME|.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbfstwavcrpai0.name: All units, charge weapons to maximum capacitance and eliminate all targets.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbfstwavcrpcre.name: We are the Corpus. You are redundant.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbplrbldoutcrp.name: A Tenno is down. Its salvage will serve the Corpus.
The death of this betrayer will please all Corpus.
A betrayer unit has fallen, they must not be repaired.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbinchvycrpcre.name: Heavy infantry deployed. Field testing will commence now.
Duty calls for you to be struck down |PLAYER_NAME|
An attack on one Corpus is an attack on all Corpus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbinchvycrpai0.name: Incoming advanced prototype. Proceed to designated sector.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbinchvycrpcre.name: Tenno are parts without a machine. Salvage waiting to be made whole.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbinchvycrpai0.name: The time has come to decomision the betrayer relics.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbextintrocrpc.name: Unknown signatures detected. All units begin guard cycles.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbextdcvcrpcre.name: The Tenno threaten our production cycle. All units, elminate the threat.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbextdcvcrpai0.name: Detecting Tenno threats. Target analyzed: Us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbextlststdcrp.name: Must inflict damage upon Tenno, let the next Corpus will finish the job.
My scrap will build the next revision, they will be victorious.
Assessing conflict: outlook is not favourable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lblckdwncorpsh.name: Corpus Ship PA: Engaging Lockdown Procedures.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbvslchgcrscor.name: Corpus Ship PA: WARNING: Vessel is changing course, please stabilize yourself while the ship adjusts its flight pattern.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbvsludrsgecor.name: Corpus Ship PA: DANGER: The vessel is under attack by a hostile force. Please return to your living quarters until Security neutralizes the threat.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbrctrcritcorp.name: Corpus Ship PA: WARNING: Reactor systems malfunction, power levels critical.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbhllbrchcorps.name: Corpus Ship PA: WARNING: The hull has been breached.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbemglitactvco.name: Corpus Ship PA: Emergency lighting systems activated, backup systems online.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lblifedtcdcorp.name: Corpus Ship PA: WARNING: Unauthorized life forms detected.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbshpsysnmlcor.name: Corpus Ship PA: Ship systems nominal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbspnkcorpship.name: Corpus Ship PA: Fire prevention systems online.
Corpus Ship PA: Sprinkler systems activated.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbpubsvcanncor.name: Corpus Ship PA: Please remember to obey all signs and rules. The safety of you and our crew is our highest priority.
Corpus Ship PA: Don't forget to seal and lock all exterior docking bays before departing the loading zone.
Corpus Ship PA: Guard rails are there for your protection, please respect.
Corpus Ship PA: Be a responsible passenger, report any malfunctioning equipment to the supervisor on duty. For the safety of you, and those around you.
Corpus Ship PA: Manufacturing zones can be dangerous, and unauthorized use of equipment is prohibited.
Corpus Ship PA: Please remain calm and civil during emergency evacuation procedures. There are enough escape pods for everyone.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbpagecorpship.name: Corpus Ship PA: Code 13 in Engineering. Code 13 in Engineering.
Corpus Ship PA: Code 6 on the Mining Deck. Code 6 on the Mining Deck.
Corpus Ship PA: Flight Commanders to Bay 3. You are loaded and ready.
Corpus Ship PA: Engineering to the Reactor Core on Deck 2.
Corpus Ship PA: Technician to the Navigation Console on Deck 4.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbevaccorpship.name: Corpus Ship PA: All passengers must evacuate the spacecraft immediately. Ship destruction imminent.
Corpus Ship PA: DANGER: The ship's integrity has been compromised. Evacuate.
Corpus Ship PA: DANGER: Ship systems critical. Prepare for immediate evacuation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbtauntnefanyo.name: Fashion victims about to become murder victims.
I'm about to fill that suit with blood.
You are already wearing your body bag. How convenient.
Is that suit a giant diaper?
Orokin secrets can't remain safe forever.
From pods you come, in caskets you will go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dapproachsuppo.name: I never expected your loyalty, you've always been a betrayer to me.
Now you come to save your friends? After fighting for me. After taking my rewards.  Where are your business ethics Tenno?
What is this? We're partners! I'm starting to think I was wrong about being wrong about you. Betrayer.
When I am the market leader you fight for me but you turn when the competition gets tough. What fickle things you Tenno are.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtauntsupporte.name: We worked so well together Tenno. Now you want to go and throw all that profit away. That makes me sad.
Tenno, you could be so much greater than the sum of all the different parts I will tear you into.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dapproachneutr.name: You have a loyalty issue Tenno. My Zanuka project will fix that for you.
I've been looking all over for you Tenno. Come, let me show you my new venture. I think you'd be a perfect fit.
Have you come to make a donation to my newest enterprise? Excellent. Please report to my lab for reconstruction.
If it's your friends you are looking for, you're welcome to place a bid for my newest Zanuka prototype.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtauntneutral1.name: I can't decide Tenno, have you come to save your friends? Or just steal my property?
Tenno, Project Zanuka is the next step in your evolution. I will make you a hundred times stronger. Why resist this?
Market forces dictate that you need to evolve or die. Which will it be Tenno?
Tenno be careful. You must make sure not to damage all those parts of yours. Such valuable merchandise.
Play nice Tenno, Zanuka is one of you. Actually, come to think of it, Zanuka is many of you.
Zanuka is your future. Your destiny. You are obsolete, make way for the next generation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlowheath180al.name: Ungrateful. You'll never know what I could have done for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlowheath190al.name: Do you think this is over?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlowheath200al.name: You build nothing. All you do is destroy.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlisetpostassa.name: Vor was just a part of the Grineer machine… and we have seen that the Corpus have begun amassing weapons of their own. It is a dangerous time.
Ordis will gladly assist the Operator in cutting a bloody path- in whatever mission they choose.
We will be at your side. There will be others too. It is time for the Tenno to return. So… what mission will you do next?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry130ord.name: Operator, you have Foundry items ready- claim them now- at your earliest convenience.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry140ord.name: Foundry items ready to claim, Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfoundry150ord.name: Operator, my Foundry has completed a new item. Does this please the Operator?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome020ord.name: Thank you for returning to me, Operator!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome030ord.name: Ordis is pleased to see you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dwelcome050ord.name: Ordis has been- getting tired of waiting- waiting patiently for your return, Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle060ordis.name: Operator? Ordis wonders… what are you thinking about?

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle070ordis.name: Operator, I've run diagnostic regressions, all systems nominal. You don't need to thank me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle080ordis.name: Ordis is hap- angry- hmmm.  I may require maintenance after all.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle090ordis.name: Operator, are you enjoying the view?

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle100ordis.name: Do you remember the old war, Operator? Ordis seems to have misplaced those memories.

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle110ordis.name: Operator, the system needs you… will you begin another mission?

/lotus/language/subtitles/didle120ordis.name: I've been thinking Operator. I thought you'd want to know.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinbox160ordis.name: Ordis has received messages for the Operator. No, I have not read them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinbox170ordis.name: Inbox messages await the Operator. I wonder what they say?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspragkilled20.name: She will be remembered, who will remember you… Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbattackvenkra.name: Wait for it. Wait for it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylapproach00.name: You had me anxious Tenno, nervous… pacing even. Didn't think you'd come. Such a relief… I'll finally get the chance to hurt you.
You must be feeling guilty? Need to atone? I'll oblige- let my gavel ring justice off your thin tin skull.
Tell me! No, no, let me see… when I crack open your head-fruit, what color juice spills out?
The Lotus, barking at you. Always so calm. Always in control. She doesn't care about you Tenno. She don't love you. Not like I loved the tubemen you murdered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylintro0070t.name: First you Tenno. Next… your Lotus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylcombat0080.name: Come for a fight? Should'a dressed for a funeral.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylcombat0110.name: Would you look at you. Worthless, ugly, freaks.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtylcombat0120.name: Come near me and I'll pound you into a tiny cube.

/lotus/language/subtitles/darchdemodests.name: The shield generators are the only thing stopping you from punching into this behemoth.

/lotus/language/subtitles/darchdemoenter.name: Well done, the shields have fallen. Get inside.
Now's your chance, enter the Fomorian.
Shields are down. Get inside now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/darchdemodestc.name: Here it is, the core, the heart of this Fomorian. Kill it.
This is our only chance, destroy the core.

/lotus/language/subtitles/darchdemomissi.name: The reactor is cascading. Get out of there NOW.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsmissionobj0.name: This is the threat, a Balor Fomorian. Your mission is to get inside the beast and inflict as much damage as possible. Get in range.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsobjectivere.name: This Balor is protected by a series of shield generators, destroy these first, then get inside and deploy the Fomorian Disruptor. Only then will the Fomorian's core become vulnerable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsdestroygen0.name: Find and destroy all the shield generators on the ship's exterior.
The Fomorian will remain impenetrable until you destroy all its shield generators.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsgendestroye.name: Shield Generator destroyed, take out the rest.
Good work, now take out the remaining generators.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsusedisrupto.name: There's the core, deploy your Fomorian Disruptor to knock out the power field.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsusedisruptr.name: Tenno, one of you needs to employ the Power Disruptor from your inventory to disable the power field.
Tenno, the core is protected by a power field. Engage your Power Disruptors to shut down the field.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsexposed0120.name: Power field down. The core is exposed. Open fire!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfswarning0130.name: Hurry Tenno, that power field will regenerate soon, and you do not want to be in here when it does.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsescape0140l.name: Power field regeneration imminent. Get out of there. FAST.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfsmissioncomp.name: You're out of critical range Tenno. Get to extraction.
You've done your part Tenno, now rendezvous with your landing craft.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindcover150l.name: Stay out of the line of fire!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindcover160l.name: Get to cover, the Fomorian's guns will obliterate you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfindcover180l.name: The Fomorian's weapons are designed to destroy capital ships. Don't let them hit your Warframe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadmissionobj0.name: This is a defense mission. Protect these two shuttles while Tenno Operatives on the inside load them up with valuable resources.
We're raiding this transport for valuable materials. Defend these two shuttles while Tenno Operatives on the inside load them with goods.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadobjreinforc.name: The longer you can defend these shuttles the more supplies we can confiscate.
The shuttles are in separate docking bays, you will have to decide on the best strategy to keep them both safe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadalphadown00.name: Alpha shuttle has lost it's shields.
Protect alpha shuttle, it's shields are down.
Shields are down on Alpha shuttle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadbetadown008.name: Beta shuttle has lost it's shields.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadbetadown010.name: Shields are gone on beta shuttle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadalphadamage.name: Tenno, Alpha shuttle will not last much longer.
Alpha shuttle is taking direct hits.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadbetadamage0.name: Beta shuttle is under heavy fire.
Beta shuttle can't take much more of this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadalphalost01.name: We lost the Alpha shuttle, focus on Beta.
Alpha shuttle lost, make sure the same thing doesn't happen to beta.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadbetalost019.name: Beta shuttle has been destroyed. Save the remaining shuttle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadbetalost020.name: Beta shuttle has been destroyed, failure to protect Alpha shuttle will result in mission failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadcontinue021.name: The shuttles have already amassed an impressive cargo. Do you want to risk loading more?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadcontinue022.name: The enemy is preparing tougher reinforcements. Do you want to stay and capture more cargo or go now?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadfailure0240.name: Our shuttles have been destroyed, this mission is over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadfailure0250.name: You failed to protect the shuttles, this mission is a failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dadfailure0260.name: We've lost the shuttles. There's nothing more we can do here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionobj001.name: I must extract crucial surveillance data from nearby satellites. Protect them until I complete my task.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionobj002.name: Satellites in the vicinity contain important surveillance data, defend them while I extract that data.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsatellitestar.name: This is it, defend the satellite while I extract what we need.
Do not let the enemy destroy this satellite before I have what we need.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsathacked0060.name: I have the data, move onto the next target.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsathacked0070.name: I got what we need. Find the next satellite.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobcomplete008.name: The enemy would rather destroy this data than have it land in our hands.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobcomplete009.name: The surveillance data is heavily encrypted, it will take time to extract.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobcomplete010.name: All satellites have been hacked. Move to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dasabmissionob.name: Tenno, this is a strategically important target. Grineer Extractor Arrays are mining these asteroids for fuel and other materials. Your job is to destroy the Arrays.
Your mission today is to sabotage an installation of Grineer Extractor Arrays.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dasabobjreinfo.name: Each Extractor Array is protected by an auxiliary generator ring. Fly through all the rings to reveal the Array's core.
You must quickly fly through each generator ring to expose the Array's core.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dasabfirstextr.name: You've reached an Extractor Array, fly through the rings to expose its core.
That Extractor Array will remain invulnerable until you disrupt each of its generator rings.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dasabreminder0.name: Passing through all the generator rings protecting this array will make it vulnerable.
You need to fly through the generator rings to expose the Extractor Array and destroy it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dextractorsrem.name: There are still functional Extractor Arrays, keep moving.
You have more work to do Tenno, find another Extractor Array.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dasabmissionco.name: All Arrays destroyed, get to extraction.
Destroying those Arrays will be a big setback to Grineer operations in this sector. Get to extraction.
The Grineer were relying on those Extractor Arrays to supply their fleet. Good work, rendezvous with the Liset.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvorescmiss.name: Tenno, you made it! I'm on the other side of the complex. They have these new prototypes but don't you worry... I shut them down remotely. You will just have to deal with the regular security.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvorescradi.name: You know, some people just can't take no for an answer. I just want to do my own thing. The family business is well and good, but not for me. You know?
You! You have no place here, Tenno. Darvo, is this your doing?
Nothing personal father, it never has been. I only work for myself. I make my own profits. You of all people should understand this.
You belong here, Darvo. There is no other option.

Let me tell you, Tenno. It's a good thing I was able to shutdown the new Hyena models. This year's version is really nasty business. Faster, meaner, deadlier than before. An excellent product really. I wouldn't want you to have to deal with... ooh... wait, wait... My codes, my codes! They have been overridden.
Let me tell you, Tenno. It's a good thing I was able to shutdown the new Hyena models. This year's version is really nasty business. Faster, meaner, deadlier than before. An excellent product really.
Ooh... wait, wait... My codes, my codes! They have been overridden.
This is a family matter, Tenno. You will not interfere.
So Tenno, looks like those new Hyena models are back online. Forget everything I said before. This is nothing you can't handle, right! Right?
So Tenno, looks like those new Hyena models are back online.
Forget everything I said before. This is nothing you can't handle, right! Right?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcinematic290a.name: Now, let me show you the future... Zanuka Kill

/lotus/language/subtitles/dapproachsuppo.name: You have entered my domain. Uninvited and unprepared for my judgment. I will make you humble.
Your future was bright Tenno. And now you throw that way.
Treason gets quick punishment in my court. Have you come to receive justice?
Kneel before your master. Pray to me, like I am a god. That is the only reason you should be here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtauntsupporte.name: Treason? After you pledge yourself to me. Is you honor so hollow?
This betrayal, I was expecting. Tenno have no loyalty to their masters.
You are useless. A ricochet. Your treachery is impotent.
Your hollow corpse will be paraded around the empire. A warning to future rats.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dapproachneutr.name: What flesh is within that Warframe? I will crush it. I will fill my lungs with your death.
Forget The Lotus. Grineer are your masters. Submit for mercy.
Too easy. I expected more. I deserve a challenge.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtauntneutral1.name: Are you just mercenaries? Fighting for scraps? Where is this so-called Tenno honor?
You think you are guardians? Grineer rule supreme. Grineer protect all.
You Tenno. You fight for treasure. You are just another Corpus machine to me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlowheath270sa.name: You fight well. Your death will be glorious.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvorescradi.name: Darvo, you disappoint me yet again.
Damn it Father, I am almost a hundred and five years old. I make my own choices.
Nobody chooses to turn down a Seat on the Board. You were groomed from a young age. Sacrifices were made in your name, and this is how you repay your debt?
I am really sorry you had to witness this, Tenno.
Darvo, we are backed into a corner. Project Tethra will be the deathblow! You are needed here. What have these betrayers ever done for you?
They're not betrayers….   Tenno, this is really embarrassing.
You did it. I knew you could handle those Hyenas. Now come get me.
I'm in one of these cells. Hurry up, I can't wait to get out of here.
Let's get to extraction and fast before he sends in reinforcements. My father is scary when he gets angry.
I will not forget your transgressions here today, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvomdefmiss.name: Here we go. Are you ready? I'm ready. Take that data mass and drop it into the system, I'll be able to hack into the ship remotely once you do. Should be easy, you'll find what I need in no time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvomdefgoal.name: Just so you know. I'm a bit new to this whole guide thing, so it's not going to be like the Lotus. Don't worry everything will be just fine.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvomdefterm.name: I think you're near the terminal. Yes, yes you are. Drop me in and I'll get to work.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvomdefprog.name: Did you hear something strange? No, okay I'll keep going, nearly done.
Just making a few more adjustments. Nothing strange going on down there? Just corpus defenses? Nothing...else?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustageone019.name: What? I… I am declaring this a Mistrial! The Rathuum must be repeated.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drustageone020.name: Not good enough. We need proof beyond a reasonable doubt. Try again, snakes.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druexeclead053.name: Our Executioners are crushing dung-snakes into soup.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druexeclead054.name: Our Executioners near their final judgment.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drutennolead05.name: Come on, Executioners, this is all you've been good at, don't mess it up.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drumatchloss05.name: Justice has been served. Prepare the accused for death.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drumatchloss06.name: Justice is blind, and now, so are you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drutennokilled.name: Down you go. I'd say 'better luck next time', but you's dead.
Ohhh, Snake, a couple more hits to the face and you'll look just like my audience.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drathuum0650ke.name: That Executioner's a mean one, downright brutal. Makes me smile.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drathuum0660ke.name: Hear that, Executioners? They're cheering for you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druaudience067.name: You greedy bunch'a savages. This is all you ever wanted, isn't it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druaudience068.name: All you Grineer are sick in the head, I do respect that.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druaudience069.name: You wall-hugging, clone monkeys, can't get enough, can you?

/lotus/language/subtitles/druaudience070.name: Did you like that, let's hear it for our Executioners.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druaudience071.name: Hear that, snakes? You got an audience and they wanna see you bleed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druinsultgrine.name: This isn't basic training, this is Rathuum. Get out there and deliver your judgement.
Watching this one fight is like watching a fly trying to swat a lion.
No, no, no. Just stop and die. You're wasting this court's time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druinsulttenno.name: You'll never win your case, Tenno, not like that.
The Tenno,  I was expecting… I don't know… more.
You're wasting the court's time, Tenno.
Come on, Tenno, you're like a Corpus drone with a dead battery, you ain't getting no air time.
Really now, Tenno, my roller balls are sharper than you.
Where do you think you are? Your Dojo? This is Rathuum.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drukelaunlocke.name: I knew Kela would never respect the rules of Rathuum. That's a crime that I'm gonna let you punish. I'm sending your Cephalon her coordinates. Take her out before she can execute my recruits. Some very brave Grineer are counting on you, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/druconclusioni.name: I see you found the coordinates of our defector's ship? Bring them to me in the relay, I'd like to thank you in person.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcorpextgoalre.name: Why Tenno what an intriguing Warframe you have. I look forward to adding it to my inventory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcorpextobjcom.name: The Corpus have been eliminated. Time to head home.
That's it, I am detecting no functioning Corpus. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrinextmissio.name: The situation forces you to help The Corpus in this mission. Kill all Grineer.
Your sense of duty compels you to help The Corpus today. Destroy all Grineer forces to help maintain the balance.
You are fighting with The Corpus in this battle. No Grineer can be left alive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrinextgoalre.name: So we agree. The Grineer are too powerful, too arrogant. They must be put in their place. I'm glad you won't let our differences get in the way of our common interests.
Tenno, you know, we may not always see eye to eye... well, you don't have eyes but I'm pleased we've found common ground in our fight with these Grineer dogs.
You've made a smart choice Tenno. When the Dogs fall there will be profit for all of us.
Tenno, this was the only rational choice. And please don't worry about your friends, I have grand plans for them.
You and I aren't so different Tenno. We both know those dogs need to be put down. I sense we are at the beginning of a beautiful new partnership.
Nobody wants to be a slave. You understand that. These dogs aren't our masters, we won't follow their orders any longer.
Rraahudd Tenno! So willing to sacrifice your own. So willing to help these greedy worms. So willing to die for worthless cause.
Tenno, Alad will betray you. Alad will defile your kind. Alad will bleed from his selfish eyes as I crush him with your metal corpse.
Attention Tenno: Is it too late to change sides? Too late to reject the Corpus lies? Too late to save your kind?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrinextobjcom.name: That was the last Grineer. Get out of there.
All the Grineer are dead. Proceed to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinfextmission.name: Nobody deserves the infestation. Clear it from this node.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dualmissionobj.name: It seems we'll be here a little longer. Deposit a data unit into the location's mainframe
We've received a second objective. Defend the artifact in this location before it's destroyed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/daladvboss010a.name: Oh hello Tenno... why the long face? Worried about your friends? Hmm... it is true that they were unwilling, but rest assured, participation in the Zanuka project is a very prestigious honor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/daladvboss020a.name: Are you sure you can't just let this go? We would make great partners you know. Produce great profits. Hmm... not interested? That's too bad. For you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/daladvboss030a.name: Tenno, look. I believe so strongly in my Zanuka prototype that I'm willing to give you a demo. It will be quite the opportunity, most people don't get to see the future... before they die.

/lotus/language/subtitles/daladvboss040l.name: With Alad V taken care of, no more Tenno will be sacrificed in the name of his progress.  Our operatives are recovering those still held within V's labs. Well done.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic010gri.name: KEE-TOK-KEE Enter the queue, stand by for punch.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic020gri.name: KEE-TOK-KEE  Mercury rail is ready to receive. Proceed. Glory to our Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic030gri.name: EHUGHT NHUNE EHUGHT, Drop to bearing 7 point 3, reduce speed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic040gri.name: EHUGHT NHUNE EHUGHT, You have taken severe hull damage to your ship. Do you have casualties to declare?

/lotus/language/subtitles/drusyntakenote.name: Trial by Rathuum is a disgusting farce. How can any being be judged by one as impure as Kela De Thaym? In time, you will help us give these defectors the fate they deserve.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpatrolgrinee.name: Just once I wish it would get exciting around here.
Just once I wish it would get exciting around here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpatrolgrnmal.name: Just once I wish it would get exciting around here.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpatrolgrinee.name: How did I get stuck with this post? Security against what?
How did I get stuck with this post? Security against what?

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpatrolgrnmal.name: How did I get stuck with this post? Security against what?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen012.name: You seem fast, show Cephalon Apnar!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcephstolen013.name: Pleased to meet you. I will be your hostage today.
Frown! Cephalon Sark is in oily, enemy hands!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dbushidosentim.name: A Tenno respects their enemy lest they be undone.
A Tenno respects their enemy lest they be undone.
A Tenno respects their enemy lest they be undone.
We reject pretense, embarking on our mission with sincerity.
We reject pretense, embarking on our mission with sincerity.
We reject pretense, embarking on our mission with sincerity.
We reject pretense, embarking on our mission with sincerity.
Loyalty guides a warrior's action, purging corruption.
Loyalty guides a warrior's action, purging corruption.
Loyalty guides a warrior's action, purging corruption.
Loyalty guides a warrior's action, purging corruption.
Self-control sharpens the blade, compounds the armor.
Self-control sharpens the blade, compounds the armor.
Self-control sharpens the blade, compounds the armor.
Self-control sharpens the blade, compounds the armor.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrineermissio.name: The Grineer deteriorate over time… is that what makes them violent?
The Grineer deteriorate over time… is that what makes them violent?
The Grineer deteriorate over time… is that what makes them violent?
The Grineer deteriorate over time… is that what makes them violent?
Grineer prey on the weak but we… we prey on the Grineer.
Grineer prey on the weak but we… we prey on the Grineer.
Grineer prey on the weak but we… we prey on the Grineer.
Grineer prey on the weak but we… we prey on the Grineer.
The Grineer used to be builders but now all they make is war.
The Grineer used to be builders but now all they make is war.
The Grineer used to be builders but now all they make is war.
The Grineer used to be builders but now all they make is war.
The Grineer have no honor.
The Grineer have no honor.
The Grineer have no honor.
The Grineer have no honor.
Ballistics and archaic weapons, crude and dangerous, just like the Grineer.
Ballistics and archaic weapons, crude and dangerous, just like the Grineer.
Ballistics and archaic weapons, crude and dangerous, just like the Grineer.
Ballistics and archaic weapons, crude and dangerous, just like the Grineer.
You'd think they'd clone something a little less… ugly.
You'd think they'd clone something a little less… ugly.
You'd think they'd clone something a little less… ugly.
You'd think they'd clone something a little less… ugly.
If we can avoid alerting them, this might be easier.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dresponsetobos.name: Time to shut you up for good.
Time to shut you up for good.
Time to shut you up for good.
Time to shut you up for good.
Say what you want, we're still coming for you.
Say what you want, we're still coming for you.
Say what you want, we're still coming for you.
Say what you want, we're still coming for you.
Fear will not control me.
Fear will not control me.
Fear will not control me.
Fear will not control me.
You are the mission, I will not falter.
You are the mission, I will not falter.
You are the mission, I will not falter.
You are the mission, I will not falter.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscapproachal.name: The Tenno are here. Execute the hostage.
Tenno operatives have entered the cell block. Initiate execution sequence.
The Tenno have breached the holding cell. Discard the hostages.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfapproac.name: Beware, those lasers are linked to the poison tumor nodes growing on the air-locks. Contact with the lasers will put our operative in immediate peril..

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscmnapproach.name: There is a vault portal nearby. If security detects you, it will start the process to shutdown the portal, severing any link with our agent.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscmnuseconso.name: Quick, use those consoles to change the destination of the vault portal, one of them has to lead to our agent.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscspotted020.name: Execution sequence initiated. Get the hostage out of there before it's too late.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinflaserst.name: You set off a laser, the Infestation is responding by gassing our Operative. Get them out of there immediately.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscexecutioni.name: Hurry up, you are running out of time.
The hostage is almost out of time. Hurry.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfexectio.name: The gas is killing our operative, they can't take much more. Hurry Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drschostageexe.name: They killed the hostage. This mission is a failure.
You let the hostage die. This mission is over.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscinfhostage.name: Our operative has succumbed to the gas toxin. This mission is a failure.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drscmnagentfou.name: Its our agent, make sure they get home safely.
You found our agent, escort them to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterintro010.name: We have located the enemy's planetary communication towers. Capture the towers and remain in control long enough to decode incoming messages.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterintro020.name: These radio towers carry top secret interplanetary communications. You are going to capture the towers and decode incoming messages.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterintro030.name: Nearby communications towers are broadcasting crucial enemy intelligence. Capture the towers and decode any incoming messages.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterintroeve.name: We need to find out where the Fomorian Power Cores are being produced, intercept Grineer messages so that we may determine the facility's location.
You are here to intercept critical information about the location of the Fomorian Power Cores.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinterobjreinf.name: The enemy will stop to capture this intel before we do. We cannot let that happen.
The enemy has adapted to our ability to intercept their communications from space. Using these new communications towers means that messages cannot be intercepted anywhere but at their destination.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro010venkr.name: Coming through that portal was a big mistake Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dintro020venkr.name: You should have brought more Tenno. You don't have enough

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtennodown180v.name: Clean and precise. That's how it's done.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtauntspaired0.name: If you're not careful Tenno, my friend will break your back.
Flat, flat, flat… I shiny make bugs flat.
I make shiny bug flat. NOW.
Sprag… wait for the right moment, then deliver the killing blow.
Make them all flat. FLAT FLAT FLAT.
Sprag, calm down. Remember, you must stay focused.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtauntssolo130.name: One by one, that is how you die.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtauntssolo140.name: Are you willing to die for this key Tenno?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtauntssolo150.name: Too many shiny bugs. I kill them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbtimeddoorhac.name: This door is using an advanced locking mechanism, I will have to open it remotely.
My scans show this door will be impassable without outside intervention. Access the panel so that I can hack it remotely.
Hold tight while I hack this door.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfightescape15.name: I am too important for this nonsense. Finish them off.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfightescape17.name: Do not think we are done here Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda250.name: Nothing can stop the Grineer.  We are progress.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda260.name: Tenno hate Grineer strength.  They want to tear down anything they are too weak to build for themselves.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda270.name: Death! Death! Death! Death to the Tenno!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda280.name: No mercy for Tenno.  No mercy for their Lotus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda290.name: Our Queens demand justice for your trespasses, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda300.name: The Tenno hate our superiority.  We will put them out of their jealous misery.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda190.name: The Tenno are nothing but an obstacle on the path to victory. Crush this obstacle.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda200.name: Tenno are the cancer of greatness.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda210.name: Tenno are tyrants, tearing down all who dare to stand tall. Only the Grineer can end Tenno tyranny.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda220.name: These theives would deny us the spoils of our strength? Brothers, will you let them take what is rightfully yours?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda230.name: These Tenno used to be ghosts of history. Let us make them ghosts once again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpropaganda240.name: Tenno are scavengers. Surviving on our scraps.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvampire290vay.name: Thank you for your service, Brother.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutfoundryobj.name: You killed the last Grineer. If there are any colonists left, they will know justice has been done for their families. Time for extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutfoundryvor.name: This was once a prosperous independent colony, until the Grineer arrived...
The Queens fear you, but I will show them. My love will return when I deliver you to them.
Tenno are you there? The signal cannot be boosted any further. Hurry, you are running out of time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlisetpostfoun.name: Your Foundry Segement is ready for installation, Operator- Will the Operator build a Cephalon to replace me?
Foundry restored! Here the Operator will craft many powerful weapons and tools to- exact revenge for dismantling me- to expand your arsenal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dannouncements.name: Tenno sightings near Mars have been confirmed, Lancer battalions are now being mobilized to the area.
Councillor Vay Hek has passed his Fomorian initiative. These ships will help ensure Grineer power remains unchallanged.
Our agreements with The Corpus only go so far. The aggressive actions by Alad V will not be tolerated.
Due to his formidable performance crushing the insubordination of Saturn, Sargus Ruk has been promoted to the rank of General.

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddarvorescradi.name: You did it! I knew you could handle it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/daladscargomis.name: This vessel appears to be part of a larger operation. Its purpose remains unclear but the threat is obvious. Do not let this ship reach its destination; eliminate the crew.

/lotus/language/subtitles/daladscargogoa.name: Tenno, the level of resistance you are encountering is far beyond anything I had predicted. Something very valuable is aboard this ship.
Tenno, the security force on this ship is unlike anything I have ever seen on a Corpus transport. We need to find out what is going on here.
Radio silence and intense security indicate that someone is trying very hard to keep this ship and its cargo a secret. Look out for anything out of the ordinary.

/lotus/language/subtitles/daladscargoint.name: Well, look who finally showed up. I was wondering how long it would take you to find my little operation.
What's that? You thought I was dead? Heh... that's cute. Nothing but rumors and exaggeration, I'm afraid. Though, to be honest times have been tough, what with you trying to kill me and all.
As it turns out, you Tenno aren't the only ones with nine lives. I know how many I have left. How about you, Tenno?

/lotus/language/subtitles/daladscargotro.name: It looks like Alad V has a small battalion guarding this ship. Keep fighting, there's a lot more resistance to come.
I was not expecting such a large force. Pace yourself.
Where is Alad V getting all these troops? He is up to something.

/lotus/language/subtitles/daladscargocon.name: Tenno, tenno! You're not supposed to be in here. You're going to ruin the surprise!

Recent events have led me to diversify my business. Biotics are such an under appreciated sector. The Corpus board wants nothing to do with them. I disagree. I think they're the future. Your future, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/daladscargounc.name: What a mess! YOU! Careful with the new merchandise!
Well. I had hoped to give you a more grand introduction to my new venture. Yes... but this will have to do.
Alad V is using biological weapons? All this security isn't to keep you out. Its to keep his infestation in.

/lotus/language/subtitles/daladscargobef.name: I must say, I will miss this ship but there are more where it came from and I can assure you, you won't find them all.
Have you guessed my business plan yet? Well, do not fret. You will find out soon enough.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dalarmattracth.name: Disable the alarms soon or heavy reinforcements will join the fight.
The alarms will soon trigger heavy reinforcements.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bossgeneralsar.name: Ruk is nearby. Be warned that he is a formidable adversary, with an almost inhuman hatred for all that is not Grineer.
Ruk is the Grineer's preeminent artifact hunter. Taking him out will cripple their artifact recovery efforts.
Ruk will be adorning only the most impressive in Grineer body modifications. You will need to stay one step ahead of him.
Eliminating Ruk will allow us to regain control of this system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bosscaptainvor.name: Captain Vor has lived under suspicion of possessing Orokin technology that grants him powerful abilities. We cannot allow this. Get to his location and eliminate him.
Further intel suggests that Vor acquired his abilities while working recovery missions for the fleet as a freighter hand.
You are nearing Vor's position. Be prepared for a violent battle.
This ship is crawling with grunts. Getting to Vor will prove difficult.
Vor's reputation precedes him. Taking him down will be a favor to the entire system.
Vor is feared across the system. Do not underestimate him.
We believe Vor has the ability to teleport. You will need to watch your back.
Vor has a tendency to play with his prey. Do not let yourself become distracted by this tactic.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bosskeladethay.name: Intel suggests Kela is armed with explosive weaponry, her personal modification of the Bombard design. Take any necessary precautions to ensure this mission's success.
Kela keeps an entourage of highly-trained Grineer marines with her. We suspect that they are as much for her entertainment as they are for protection.
All Grineer females undergo mandatory military training. Kela in particular revels in combat. She extended her term for more than a decade before returning to the Court. Do not underestimate her.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bossphoridtran.name: One of our spy cells has been lost investigating this abandoned Grineer asteroid base. We need you to locate and eliminate whatever is responsible.
This place is crawling with Infested. Unfortunately, something far more ominous awaits. Make your way deeper into the base.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bossphoridvari.name: Your target is an aberration of twisted flesh. Put the thing out of its misery.
Avoid the creature's spine-strike. These razor-sharp quills will rip your Warframe to shreds.
The creature is incredibly agile for a deformed quadruped. Keep moving to avoid being crushed.
Listen for its screams. This will mean you are getting close.
Elude its bone-chilling shrieks if you wish to stay alive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusbossgrine.name: The death of Counselor Vay Hek will bring all Grineer deployments to a halt.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcorpextmissio.name: You have chosen to support the Grineer in this fight. Eliminate all Corpus.
You are fighting alongside the Grineer on this mission. Destroy all Corpus.
Make sure the Grineer win this battle, leave no Corpus functioning.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcorpextgoalre.name: Rraahudd Tenno! Now we fight together! Now we crush the greedy milk from their skulls. The Corpus will pay for their crimes with their useless lives.
You shoot well. You cut well. You serve me well, Tenno.
Tenno, of course you side with us. Of course the Grineer are your best option. We share your joy in Corpus death.
What's that test tube dog giving you to fight for him? Whatever it is I'll double it!
So, the betrayers are fighting for the dogs now? Why am I not surprised. The sooner my Zanuka project is completed the better. The system must be ridden of your hypocrisy.
Do you really think you are saving your comrades by supporting the dogs. What do you think happens if you allow Sargas to win? Do you think they'll be safe when you're all his slaves?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunfive420.name: Team Sun needs five more Oro to win.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunfive430.name: Team Sun only needs to annihilate five Oro to capture the match.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunfive440.name: Sun needs five more Moon Oro to claim victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunfive450.name: Team Sun team is five Oro from victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunfive460.name: Five more annihilations until Sun has won the match.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmsunfive470.name: Sun team nears victory. Five more Oro.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmmoonfive48.name: Five Sun Oro is all that separates Team Moon from victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmmoonfive49.name: Victory is five Sun Oro away for Team Moon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtdmmoonfive50.name: Team Moon is within five Oro of victory.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinfextgoalrei.name: We must destroy this infestation before the monsters become entrenched.
Containment has become impossible, we must destroy this infestation node by node.
The infestation is a threat to all life, we have to wipe it out, even if it means working with the other factions.
Being turned by the infested is a fate worse than death. Even our enemies don't deserve this.
The infestation cannot be allowed to spread.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinfextobjcomp.name: I'm detecting no traces of the disease. Get out of there.
We're done. Let's get out of there.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgenextobjrein.name: Picking sides is never easy. You are doing what you feel is right.
Supporting the enemy feels wrong, but keeping the balance requires tough choices.
This aggression has upset the balance of power. We must set things right.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlotustrans000.name: Alad V's newest prototype is a monstrosity forged from the bodies of our fallen Tenno, we cannot allow Zanuka to go into full production. Destroy Alad V and his horrid 'pet'.
Too many Tenno have perished to make Alad V's abomination. There will be no stopping the Corpus if Zanuka is mass produced. You are here to make sure that doesn't happen.
The Zanuka prototype has made Alad V a very dangerous man. If he is allowed to carry out his plans, no Tenno in this system will be safe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvfirstraid.name: Our operative is making progress. This will help our cause.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvinterimra.name: Look what our Tenno operative just found. They could not do this without you.
We will all share in this bounty. Hold out as long as you can.
The longer you fight, the more successful we will be.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvsixtyseco.name: Things are getting tight. Sixty seconds of life support remaining.
Be aware you are down to your last sixty seconds of life support.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvinfestsix.name: You have sixty seconds before the spores overwhelm the atmosphere completely.
Spore levels will reach a critical mass in sixty seconds.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvthirtysec.name: You are running out of time.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvextract01.name: Extraction is available, if you need it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvextract02.name: When you are ready, go to extraction

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvextract03.name: When you need it, extraction is ready.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvextractur.name: Critical life support levels. Extraction is your best option.
You are running out of time. Consider extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dsurvinfestext.name: The spores have almost completely saturated the atmosphere. You need to get out of there.
Spore saturation is nearing critical mass, after that point no amount of life support will save you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/missionobjecti.name: You are here to find our target and bring them to the extraction point. Happy hunting.
We received intel that somebody vital to enemy operations is here. Find them, and capture them.
You are here on a Capture mission. You must find, capture and extract our target.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcapturemultio.name: We have multiple targets of interest for this mission. Bring them all to me.
Capture all targets on this ship. Bring them to me alive.

/lotus/language/subtitles/goalreinforcem.name: The capture target has vital information that we will need to extract, we need our subject brought back alive.
We cannot let our target know we're here. Track them down quickly.
Scans indicate our target is in the vicinity. Find them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcapturemultir.name: These are high value targets, their capture is crucial.
Be aware Tenno, these targets are a very high flight risk.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivefound.name: You found the capture target. Do not let them escape.
There's our target. Capture and extract them.
Our subject is here. Capture them and do not let them escape.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcapturemultif.name: You've found a target. Capture them quickly before they escape.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivecompl.name: Success! The captive is safely in our hands. Congratulations Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lbtimeddoorhac.name: This will take a moment, watch your back.
The door is open. Get moving.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bosshyenatrans.name: Recent innovations in Corpus robotics have lead to a surge in production. Their newest animal-like proxy is an unrelenting hunter. Codenamed
Our operatives have identified at least four different variations of the Hyena model, each with a different specialization and arsenal of attacks.
Use caution, the Hyena pack will work together to try and take you down.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bossjackaltran.name: In an attempt to exert power and authority, the Corpus recently introduced their most lethal security proxy yet. Determine its location aboard this vessel and destroy it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbtgthlfhthcor.name: Press the attack. These desperate fools are no match for Grineer power.
That's it... Rain death on their heads!
|PLAYER_NAME| has come for a prize. Give them one they'll never forget.
Take what is ours, then bleed them dry.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbwavalmdoneco.name: Regroup. We'll take the target back by force...For the glory of the Queens.
Need back up! Heavy losses at the target.
Tenno, do you think the Lotus expects you to come home alive?

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbmidwavcorgrn.name: Where the hell is First Platoon?
Destroy! Leave nothing but their stains.
The Queens demand justice. The Queens demand your death.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbbwnwavcorgrn.name: Intruders at the target. All units converge.
When this is over Tenno, I will spit on your corpse and laugh.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpststycorgrn.name: They stayed to fight? Then they stayed to die!
Ha! Look Tenno, your Lotus abandons you.
Your hope is a lie. Your death is the only truth.
How long do you think can keep this up |PLAYER_NAME|?

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbfstwavcorgrn.name: Look here. We caught the Tenno sneaking into their own grave.
This is Grineer property. Everything is Grineer property.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbplrbldoutcor.name: THIS is the best the Lotus has to offer? Pitiful.
Crack their shells and rip out the soft bits.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbalmrstcorgrn.name: All clear, stand down and return to duty.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bblkdncorgrnma.name: That's it they're trapped, all units converge on this position.
They're not getting out of there.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbextintrocorg.name: Tok fhuve! Report, Tok fhuve? Come in?

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbextdcvcorgrn.name: Tenno raid. Fight to the death!

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbextlststdcor.name: Four versus one? I'll take those odds.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgrineermissio.name: If we can avoid alerting them, this might be easier.
If we can avoid alerting them, this might be easier.
If we can avoid alerting them, this might be easier.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcorpusmission.name: These Corpus remind me of the Orokin, selfish, greedy.
These Corpus remind me of the Orokin, selfish, greedy.
These Corpus remind me of the Orokin, selfish, greedy.
These Corpus remind me of the Orokin, selfish, greedy.
Corpus technology won't be enough to stop us.
Corpus technology won't be enough to stop us.
Corpus technology won't be enough to stop us.
Corpus technology won't be enough to stop us.
We'll put an end to this Corpus greed.
We'll put an end to this Corpus greed.
We'll put an end to this Corpus greed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlisetpostresr.name: Tenno. Tenno.. Good! You managed to disarm Vor's Ascaris! I thought… I thought I lost you.
Oh no. The Ascaris had a tampering failsafe, its burrowed into you and armed itself. We'll need to find Vor before it detonates.
Get to Navigation - boarding a Grineer ship to access their personnel records will be the fastest way to find Vor.
Operator, what are you waiting for?
Hello Operator, may I suggest you access Navigation and save your life? For my sake.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutnavmodobje.name: The systems on this Grineer Galleon can be made compatible with your ship. Find and extract a navigation segment.
You have murdered my sons and disgraced me before my Queens. But soon the Ascaris will complete its task and bring you to me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutnavmodvort.name: The Ascaris failsafe is attacking your systems. Your shield capacity has just been halved.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutnavmodnear.name: The navigation segment is in the vicinity. Take it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutnavmodchoi.name: Good work we have what we... wait...
Tenno, coordinates in this nav segment put the Galleon on a direct course to a convoy of colonists.
You have a choice, you can extract now or you can disable this galleon and save the colonists.
Saving the colonists could jeopardize this mission. I recommend you head straight to extraction but the choice is yours.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutnavmodobjc.name: You've reached the ships power systems. Destroy the reactor.
That should take the pressure off the colonist ship but you need to get out of there! Get to extraction before the reactor goes critical.
The colonist ship has been lost. I know it was a difficult choice but many more in the future depend on your survival today.
The colonist ship has escaped. I admire your noble intentions Tenno, but you must survive for the future of the system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlisetpostnavm.name: Oh, did it have to be Mercury? The heat drives me- Solar Rail navigation to Mercury enabled, Operator.
The detonator is charging up. You need to bring Vor down. He thinks he can capture you again. Don't worry. I will be with you. Let us show him how much you have learned.
Are you ready Tenno? Facing Vor is the only way to rid yourself of him permanently.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutassobj010l.name: This is our chance. Vor has been stripped of his elite guard, he is vulnerable. Take him out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutassleadup0.name: You are not the only one with the power of the Void. Behold the Janus key.
I could have saved the Grineer but they cast me out. Maybe its not too late to draw your divine blood.
I will put you down like a rabid Kubrow.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutassobjcomp.name: Tenno, look! The Ascaris detonator has just disintegrated, it's as if it was directly connected to Vor. You're done here, go to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dlisetpostassa.name: You've done it Tenno. Vor's Ascaris is gone. You are free now.
But your work has just begun. The Origin System is in chaos and it needs you, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/mobiledefensen.name: Artifact found. Defend it until the Extraction Team arrives.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackobj010l.name: We are here to hijack the transport of a Fomorian Power core before it can be installed in the growing Fomorian fleet.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackobj020l.name: A Fomorian Core is being transported from the factory for installation. You are here to make sure that core never reaches a Fomorian class ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpobj020.name: Your target today is a Corpus Rover. Take control and escort the rover to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackobjrein.name: We need to take these cores into deep space for destruction. A core rupture here would turn this outpost into an uninhabitable wasteland.
Left unchecked, Project Tethra will create hundreds of new Fomorian class ships. We plan to stop as many ships being built as possible by destroying their most critical components, the Fomorian Core.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpobjrei.name: We have to move quickly, once the Corpus realize what we are trying to do, they will use everything they can to stop us.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackfindcon.name: The Grineer are transporting the core by cargo tram. Find the control console to reroute the tram.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackconsole.name: Good, the tram has been rerouted. It will now draw power from your shields in order to keep moving forward.
Excellent. We now have control of the tram. It's drive systems have been overridden and it will now draw power from you shields.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpconsol.name: Good work we now have control of the rover... hold on Tenno... things just got more complicated. The Corpus have corrupted the rover's power-cell. I can reconfigure it but its new source of power will be your Warframe's shields.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackactivat.name: You have reached the console. Hack into the system and reroute the core.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpactiva.name: Use this console to start the rover and upload its destination coordinates.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackescort0.name: Stay near the tram to power it forward. Beware, that power is being drawn directly from your shields.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackescort1.name: Stay close to the tram. It has been reconfigured to draw power from your shields in order to move you forward.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpescort.name: The rover will draw power from your shields but you need to stay close.
Stay close to the rover, it needs to draw power from your shields in order to progress.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackcoreuns.name: Something has happened, the core is becoming unstable. We must get it out of here before it ruptures. Any additional damage will only hasten its destruction.
I am detecting instability in the core. A rupture is inevitable, get the core out of there as fast as possible.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpcoreun.name: The health of the rover's power-cell continues to degrade. If we don't get it to extraction soon, the cell could rupture, vaporizing the rover and cargo.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijackescortr.name: The core cannot move forward without your shields to power it. Stay near the core.
A Tenno must be near the core for it to move forward.
Stay near the core to keep it moving forward.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dhijcorpescort.name: A Tenno must be near the Rover to keep it moving forward.
Stay near the rover to keep it powered.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drukelafight13.name: Nicely done, Tenno. Defeating Kela in front of her audience will show all Grineer that there is another way.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic050gri.name: EHUGHT NHUNE EHUGHT, Understood. Stand by for troop replenishment. Sending repair drones now. For the Glory of the Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic060gri.name: All ships hold. Arrivals punching through.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic080gri.name: Rail over capacity, please divert into holding pattern.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic090gri.name: Incoming punch. All ships maintain holding pattern.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic100gri.name: FHUVE CHEE UK, initiate punch procedures, you are next.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic110gri.name: UKCHEE KEECHEE KEE, Hold position, you do not have authorization.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic120gri.name: Transport SHUXCHEE UK, Dock for inspection.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic130gri.name: Accepting rail arrivals now. Welcome back Captain. Proceed to dock for customs and inspection.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic140gri.name: Next in Queue. Power and punch.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtraffic150gri.name: Command this is Grustrag Transport uk-tok. Stand by for delivery of cargo.  Docking now. Oh and if you know what's good for you, you'll prepare a FULL security detail in receiving.  Can't wait for these monsters to be your problem and not mine.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms010gri.name: Galleon C-TOK-TOK Prepare for boarding and inspection.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms020gri.name: Corpus Transport EHUGHT-CHEE, EHUGHT-CHEE Stand by for Infestation scan.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms030gri.name: Corpus Transport EHUGHT-CHEE, EHUGHT-CHEE: Scans indicate Infestation Code Yellow. Prepare your organic crewmen for decontamination.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms040gri.name: Attention. FHUV-CHEE FORR-CHEE SHUX Your transport manifest does not indicate additional life forms. Do you have anything else to declare?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms050gri.name: FHUV-CHEE FORR-CHEE SHUX Are you aware of the punishment for false declarations?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms060gri.name: FHUV-CHEE FORR-CHEE SHUX Do you COPY??? FHUV-CHEE... Kratstak! We got a runner. Enforcement drones deploy. Target vessel FHUV-CHEE FORR-CHEE.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms070gri.name: Suspected smuggler FHUV-CHEE FORR-CHEE eliminated. Glory to the Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms080gri.name: Brinrik TWELK Transport: Broadcast your passage visa now.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms090gri.name: Passage visa accepted Brinrik TWELK: Your free to go. Hail to The Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms100gri.name: Attention all ships. Detecting echoes. Stay alert could be caused by Tenno void masks.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms110gri.name: Tenno ship detected, ready flakk cannons. Schtuk. RAMN... lost it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms120gri.name: All units alert status yellow. All scanners, full power. NOW.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms130gri.name: Tenno unmasking. Ready flakk.... wait... cease fire, cease fire. That peh-thouk is already to close to the rail. HOLD FIRE. RAMN! Gone.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms140gri.name: Fin-Karrnt UK TOK Corvette: Transmit your travel pass immediately.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcustoms150gri.name: My apologies Councilor. Fin-Karrnt UK TOK Corvette. You may proceed freely. Glory to the Queens.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtennomovement.name: Scanning for Tenno vessel signatures. Scans report negative. Nothing out there.
uk-forr-uk please advise, detecting void mask echoes. Tenno ships converging on your signal.
uk-forr-uk we still seeing void echoes, announce Tenno contact immediately.
Galleon mark FHUVE: Prepare for jump.
Galleon mark FHUVE: Hold position. Dectecting anomalies. EM-FHUVE-FHUVE Do you detect similar?
Galleon Mark FHUVE: RAMN! Tenno ship detected, attack... they're gone. RAMN! VEK!
Arrival incoming in UK, TOK, KEE, FORR... where is the... RAMN... all ships commence immediate scans for Tenno vessels.
Enforcement Leader. Outgoing rail controller has indicated Tenno signatures during that last punch. Stay alert.
Void cloak. There. Peh-Tuk. Tenno. Close the rail. Don't let them... RAMN. Notify all rails, Tenno ship in transit.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dshipinspectio.name: Attention Enforcement Squad 6 Leader. Board and search the incoming transport. Illegal foodstuffs suspected. If found execute the standard punishments. Copy?

Rail control this is merchant transport 3398 reporting for passage.  Rail control, I don't see why boarding would be necessary.  Perhaps if I sent over a sample container of my wares you could inspect that.  I mean, you wouldn't even need to send it back.  OK, OK, how about I send over five containers for uh, inspection?  Ahhhh, a pleasure doing business with you, rail control.
Aye Aye. For the Queens.
Show me you ID cards. Now. You. Where's your RAMN! down on the ground.
You come here. That better not be a Red Veil badge? Grab him. Search those crates.
Rail Leader. Requesting ship lockdown. Perform a deep scan for Tenno and Tenno sympathizers.
You. I'm placing you in custody.
Show me you ID cards. Now. You. Where's your RAMN! down on the ground.
You come here. That better not be a Red Veil badge? Grab him. Search those crates.
Rail Leader. Requesting ship lockdown. Perform a deep scan for Tenno and Tenno sympathizers.
You. I'm placing you in custody.
Entering unresponsive vessel. No signs of Infestation so far.
RAMN. There are casualties... everywhere.
Blade weapons. RAMN Peh-tuk. Tenno skumm.
They're all dead. Mark this ship for repopulation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbwavalmdonecr.name: We are monitoring this fight for future revisions. With every defeat we grow stronger.
Collect the salvage of the fallen. Their parts will fuel the future.
You cannot cut us all down |PLAYER_NAME|, the Corpus machine has countless parts.
The Corpus do not understand fear.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbmidwavcrpcre.name: When a cog breaks, it gets replaced. Production must not be impeded.
We our commanded to keep fighting. Called upon to crush the Tenno scourge.
Ready the next barrage. The Tenno must be shown the might of our capability.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbmidwavcrpai0.name: Estimated chance of victory is now 15%. Reinforcement threshold triggered, ready troops.
|PLAYER_NAME| your obsolesces is an insult to the Corpus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbbwnwavcrpcre.name: Our production targets cannot be interrupted, Tenno death must occur immediately.
The Corpus are the body, the Operators are our soul.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbbwnwavcrpai0.name: Tenno units remain operational, continue the assault.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbbwnwavcrpcre.name: The Corpus are a machine. We do not need rest.
You have yet to even scratch the surface of our resources.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbbwnwavcrpai0.name: Redirect assault formations 2 and 7 to target.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbfleeingcorpu.name: Keep the betrayers off my back

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbdownedcorpus.name: No, no. I'll pay you anything!
Who sent you, what do they want?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgtmonswhisper.name: Embrace us, we are your flesh.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dvessel1challe.name: I don't know how this happened, but the glyph on that Sacred Vessel, it's changed. I suggest you stay on this path.
The glyph, it's changed. You must be fulfilling some primitive rite of passage…
The vessel, it's responding to your actions.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpostquest0004.name: Inaros, it's an honor to serve you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpostquest0027.name: It brings joy to my heart to see Inaros in action.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dpostquest0028.name: Tenno, you honor my people with your Warframe.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dinfestedaladv.name: This is for your own good.

/lotus/language/subtitles/objectivecompl.name: Mission complete, the captive has been escorted to the extraction point. Well done.
Excellent work. We'll interrogate the captive back at base. Your part is done here, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dcapturemultio.name: Target captured. On to the next.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpatrolgrinee.name: I'm bored out of my mind.
I'm bored out of my mind.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpatrolgrnmal.name: I'm bored out of my mind.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpatrolgrinee.name: Hey, leave my mother out of this.
Hey, leave my mother out of this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpatrolgrnmal.name: Hey, leave my mother out of this.
