/lotus/language/subtitles/bbtacticalvor0.name: This one has your name on it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbthreatenedvo.name: I offered you glory and you choose this?

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbtauntvor0020.name: Your corpse will serve us well.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbtauntvor0030.name: You will join us one way or another.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbtgthlfhthgri.name: Press the attack. These desperate fools are no match for Grineer power.
Concentrate your fire on the target. Better destroyed than in the hands of Tenno.
That's it... Rain death on their heads!
|PLAYER_NAME| has come for a prize. Give them one they'll never forget.
Assault the target. Slaughter any who get in your way!
Take what is ours, then bleed them dry.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbwavalmdonegr.name: Regroup. We'll take the target back by force...For the glory of the Queens.
Need back up! Heavy losses at the target.
Grind them into scrap. Stomp their pieces into the ground
Tenno, do you think the Lotus expects you to come home alive?
Strike us down. Three more will take our place.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbmidwavgrinee.name: Where the hell is First Platoon?
Look how the Tenno hide! Scatter them like vermin.
Destroy! Leave nothing but their stains.
The Queens demand justice. The Queens demand your death.
In death, we multiply. You are doomed.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbbwnwavgrinee.name: Intruders at the target. All units converge.
|PLAYER_NAME| your corpse will be a vessel for my excrement!
When this is over Tenno, I will spit on your corpse and laugh.
We come for you |PLAYER_NAME|. This is your end.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpststygrinee.name: They stayed to fight? Then they stayed to die!
Ha! Look Tenno, your Lotus abandons you.
Your hope is a lie. Your death is the only truth.
How long do you think can keep this up |PLAYER_NAME|?

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbfstwavgrinee.name: You made a fatal mistake coming here.
Look here. We caught the Tenno sneaking into their own grave.
What Grineer will claim Tenno death as their glory today?
This is Grineer property. Everything is Grineer property.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbpatrolcrewme.name: We serve the Corpus. We are the Corpus.
Reporting biological and mechinical energy levels in check.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbtgthlfhthcrp.name: Target is damaged. Analyzing salvageable components.
Anything that can be destroyed can be rebuilt.
Focus on the target. Precision is key.
Target's integrity compromised. Redirecting all available firepower.
You will fall to the collective power of the Corpus machine.
We take this prize for the Corpus.

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbwavalmdonecr.name: The Corpus machine will cut you down, this is inevitable.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dspragkilled19.name: What have you done to her?

/lotus/language/subtitles/bbattackmodula.name: Your powers are no good here!
Your powers are no good here!

/lotus/language/subtitles/ddowntimecurio.name: I think there are more up ahead.
I think there are more up ahead.
I think there are more up ahead.
I think there are more up ahead.
Need to keep a look out for supplies…
Need to keep a look out for supplies…
Need to keep a look out for supplies…
Need to keep a look out for supplies…

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusartifacts.name: These artifacts give a small Tenno squad an edge against their vast enemies.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusfoundrya.name: This is the Foundry. Here you will build powerful new items to expand your arsenal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusfoundryb.name: To build an item requires a blueprint and its components. While there are blueprints in the market, most are hidden throughout the system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusfoundryc.name: Search ships and defeat enemies to obtain components. The components found are influenced by the region of space you are in.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusfoundryd.name: The Foundry is key to owning the most powerful weapons and artifacts that exist.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusmatchmaki.name: You control how I connect you with other Tenno agents. You may freely join other agents, restrict it to your contacts or go it alone.

/lotus/language/subtitles/lotusstarchart.name: Welcome Tenno. This is the Origin System, and you are its ward.
Our enemies control the ancient Solar Rail Network and with it, travel throughout the regions. Complete missions to regain control of the network.
Completing a region activates its real-time alerts. This is key to attacking high-value targets.
You begin at Mercury's Terminus, your only way into the system. It is time for the Tenno to return.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dharvesttaunt1.name: Tenno? Can you hear me? You've been a naughty little betrayer, haven't you? Did you really think your support for the Grineer would go unnoticed?
That is just the sort of behavior I just can't let go uncorrected. Otherwise, you'll never learn.
This is really for your own good, Tenno. Help me, help you... help me.
Good job Zanuka. This Tenno's bones will make you a fine sibling.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dharvesttaunt2.name: Zanuka? No! What have you monsters done to my beautiful creature? I won't forget this.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailawake010l.name: Tenno. Tenno can you hear me? You've been captured by Alad V's harvester. This is your chance, escape.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailawake020l.name: Tenno. Ready yourself. You have been captured by the Corpus. It is time to escape.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailawake050a.name: Leaving so soon? We were just getting started.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailawake060a.name: Oh, Tenno. I understand you're nervous. But if you come back to us I can assure you; you won't feel a thing.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailawake070a.name: Tenno, don't listen to that... that Lotus. She just wants to hold you back. Stay with me explore your...potential.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailawake080a.name: Tenno, Tenno! There's an entire Grineer battalion here to rescue you. Your friends must really appreciate your support. Wait, no. I'm mistaken. You're alone, with no weapons and no friends. Silly me.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailawake090a.name: The Grineer are a threat to us all. You need to understand the error of you ways. Consider my efforts a favor... yes.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailobj030lot.name: I have extraction ready but you have to find your weapons first. Can you handle that?

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailobj040lot.name: You're not going to last long without your weapons, they are scattered around this facility. Find them.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing200l.name: It may take a while to regain full control of your Warframe, Tenno. Try moving around, take it slowly.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing210l.name: This will be a lot easier if you go undetected.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing220l.name: The alarms have been triggered, they know you are here.  Oh, and turn around.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing240l.name: They're dangerous.  You won't be able to get close to Alad V as long as Zanuka is protecting him.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing120o.name: Well put Operator, I am sure you will find an offer that suits your needs.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing130o.name: Perhaps you should... not deal with... lower your expectations, Operator?

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing140o.name: What abhorrent language!  You should.... shove your sword down her... not stand for such behaviour.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing170o.name: Perhaps some flying lessons are in order, Operator.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmarketing180o.name: We must not be overcome by... The Flood... the Infested.  Yes, definitely the Infested.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailfoundprim.name: You found your primary weapon. Lock and load.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailobjcomp14.name: You found all your weapons. Get out of there.

/lotus/language/subtitles/djailobjcomp15.name: You're done. Extraction is waiting. Go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionobj010.name: It is doubtful that we can trust any Corpus but helping Frohd Bek is the only way we can get to Alad V. Remove the infestation from this ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionobj020.name: This infestation stands between us and Alad V. Clear this ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmissionobj030.name: I don't trust Frohd Bek but I trust his hatred for Alad V. We'll help him now, if it means we can stop the Zanuka project.

/lotus/language/subtitles/draptorintro01.name: The Raptor is the most recent Corpus heavy weapon. You must destroy it before they can begin full scale production.

/lotus/language/subtitles/draptoroutro02.name: It's done. Thanks to you the Raptor won't be entering full production any time soon. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0001.name: You've opened an Orokin Vault. It appears unaffected by the Infestation.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0003.name: You've unlocked an Orokin Vault. Its... clean.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0004.name: You have the Vault artifact, let's go.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dorovltkey0005.name: You've got it. Something is different about this artifact...

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsdefendconso.name: Guard the console and prevent lockdowns while the fuel erodes the coolant system.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsclearlockdo.name: A security lockdown has stalled your progress. Clear it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsopenblastdo.name: A blast door has blocked your evacuation route, find a way to open it.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsreactorcrit.name: The reactor has gone critical, get to extraction immediately.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drsobjcomplete.name: Your sabotage is complete. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drselementice0.name: Watch your step, Tenno. There are severe coolant leaks throughout the ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/drselementmag0.name: Beware Tenno, the ship is experiencing reduced gravity and magnetic anomalies.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfmrn00010lotu.name: Destroying a single reactor will not be enough to take down a Fomorian. We will need to poison the well... coordinated teams will corrupt it's fuel supply. This will require gear harvested from Infestation tissues. I will route you to an injector point...

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfmrn00020lotu.name: These Fomorians are massive, keep searching. You will need to locate a fuel cell and inject the corrupting agent. I hope you have a corruptor with you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfmrn00030lotu.name: Remember, if you are coordinating with other Tenno the Alpha/Beta mixtures are more potent, but a single Tenno cannot equip them at once.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfmrn00040lotu.name: There it is! You should be able to inject the corruptor you brought using the attached console.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfmrn00050lotu.name: Excellent, the corruption process has begun. You must defend this position to ensure the Grineer do not destroy this fuel cell before it spreads through the ship.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dfmrn00060lotu.name: Corruption process is complete. Good work Tenno. Get to extraction where I will record your contribution to the operation!

/lotus/language/subtitles/sabotagemining.name: The mining equipment is nearby. It must be destroyed to prevent the Grineer from developing energy weapons.
This research could have unimaginable repercussions. Be on your guard.
Mission success hinges on the destruction of the mining equipment. Expect heavy resistance.
A heavily armed security force stands between you and the mining equipment. Stay alert.
Crippling their equipment will effectively cripple their research.
We need you back alive. Stay alert.
You are gaining the upper hand. Push forward.
They are aware of your presence. Make haste.
Destroy the mining equipment before the Grineer can intercept the comet.
It is time to bring the Grineer fleet to a standstill. Strike them where it hurts.
Halting fuel production will give us a much needed advantage. Determine the position of the equipment.
Hostiles inbound. Strike hard and fast.
Rubedo must be protected at any cost. Sabotage the nearby mining equipment.
It is imperative we do not let the Grineer get their hands on the Rubedo.
You are approaching a piece of equipment. Watch your back.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial01a.name: I am the Lotus. I will guide you but we must hurry, Vor is coming for you. I see that the cryo-sleep has taken your memory. It does not matter. You are Tenno, I will prepare you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial04.name: A Warframe shows your vital statistics. This shows your health.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial05a.name: The cryo pod has left you in a weakened state.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial06.name: Your health does not recharge. Touch this healing sphere before we continue.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial07.name: Now, I have engaged your shields. Shields absorb damage before health is affected.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial08.name: Notice how the shields will recharge.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial09.name: I will show you the Tenno fighting system. It has three forms. The first is your blade. A Tenno's melee weapon is always with them, always at the ready.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial11.name: This display shows the clip size and the total ammo you have.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial12.name: Find ammo on dead enemies and in the environment.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial14.name: Excellent, the second form is your primary weapon.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial16.name: Well done. Do you see the indicator below your weapon and Warframe? This is affinity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial17.name: You increase affinity during combat, and in missions to come. Increase your affinity to unlock the power of your arsenal.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial20.name: A Tenno must use these forms in combination to destroy their enemies.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial21.name: Attack these targets using blade and gun.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial22.name: Excellent. As you level, you receive points to customize your weapons and unlock Warframe powers. I will unlock a power now to demonstrate its use.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial23.name: Power consumes energy. Absorb this energy sphere.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial25.name: We can't afford to waste anymore time. You must get to extraction before Vor finds you. Hurry, Tenno.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial25a.name: He dropped a mod. Quickly pick it up, it will come in handy later.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial27.name: I've engaged your map system. Locate your objective.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial28.name: Prove you are worthy to join us. Destroy the targets before time runs out.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial29.name: Excellent, you have attained the rank of Initiate.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial30.name: You have failed my test. Return here tomorrow, if you wish to try again.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial31.name: I await your return when you have learned more. Farewell.

/lotus/language/subtitles/tutorial01-03c.name: I am the Lotus, friend and guide. I see that the cryo-sleep has taken your memory. It does not matter. You are Tenno, I will prepare you.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial0330l.name: The bridge is in ruins. Tenno, you are a master of movement, traverse this gap.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial0341l.name: There is no more time. Work on traversal when you have fully recovered. For now, just run.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dtutorial0350l.name: Vor, is close. Get out of there now!

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmodinstall010.name: This is the upgrade interface. Here you will equip upgrades called 'MODS' on items in your Arsenal

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmodinstall020.name: MODS can be found by killing enemies and completing missions. These are crucial to maximizing your power and expanding your tactics. There are hundreds of MOD types.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmodinstall030.name: Installing MODs is limited by your item's MOD capacity. Increase an item's MOD capacity by ranking it up. Super-charging it with Orokin technology will double this capacity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmodinstall040.name: Each MOD has a set of attributes. The description indicates its benefits. This shows which type of item it is compatible with. This shows the capacity cost to install this MOD.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmodinstall050.name: This symbol indicates the MODS polarity. An item will have some slots polarized. Matching polarity will make a MOD cheaper to install. A clashing polarity will increase the cost.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmodinstall060.name: Remember - if you see this indicator flashing - if means your MOD capacity is not high enough to install. Check your polarities, rank up your gear and super-charge to increase your capacity.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dmodinstall070.name: That is all for now. Finding and installing MODs is crucial to realizing your Arsenals potential.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjcomplete12.name: One more Infested ship cleared. Get out of there.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dobjcomplete13.name: I'm not detecting any more Infested. We're making progress. Get to extraction.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dgoalreinforce.name: Oh Alad, all your lying and sneaking and cheating, and what do you have to show for it? You're in dept to the board and I've come to collect.
Look at you Alad, hiding in a corner, playing with your toys. How embarrassing. The Corpus deserves better and I'm the one to deliver the goods.
What happened to you Alad? I looked up to you. Your profits. Your products. A little madness and you throw it all to the Void.
You can't hide, ride or bribe your way out of this Alad. You've been downsized and your fat head is about to suffer cutbacks. Literal cutbacks.
Who got you fired? Who got Zanuka's funding pulled? Oh I know this! I know this! It was me.
I'm feeling a promotion coming my way! About to climb another rung on this ladder! About to send my old pal Alad V into early retirement.
Hey Alad. Zanuka is done! You are done! When you're dead the Board will be signing over everything you own to me!
The Tenno are too dangerous, too profitable, to provoke! Zanuka was a bad paradigm. A costly miscalculation but don't worry Alad, I'll keep your credits warm when you're gone.
It's time for your to pay your debts! I've got the Betrayers doing the repro work - if you ask me they've got a different idea of blood money.

/lotus/language/subtitles/dbattlebegins0.name: Attack us and we will counter!
Attack us and we will counter!
Attack us and we will counter!
Attack us and we will counter!
Move and strike, we have to win this!
Move and strike, we have to win this!
Move and strike, we have to win this!
Move and strike, we have to win this!

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityash.name: Ash enhances the duration and damage from Bleed effects.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityashp.name: Ash Prime enhances the duration and damage from Bleed effects.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityatla.name: While traversing along the ground, Atlas becomes immune to Knockdown effects.
While traversing along the ground, Atlas Prime becomes immune to Knockdown effects.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitybans.name: Banshee dampens the sound of weapons she uses, rendering them silent.
Banshee Prime dampens the sound of weapons she uses, rendering them silent.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitychro.name: Chroma can attune his abilities to different elements, based on the Energy color he uses.
Chroma Prime can attune his abilities to different elements, based on the Energy color he uses.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityembe.name: When Ember ignites an enemy, she gains increased Damage on her abilities and regenerates her Energy.
When Ember Prime ignites an enemy, she gains increased Damage on her abilities and regenerates her Energy.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityequi.name: Equinox recovers a small amount of Energy from Health Orbs, and a small amount of Health from Energy Orbs.
Equinox Prime recovers a small amount of Energy from Health Orbs, and a small amount of Health from Energy Orbs.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityexca.name: Excalibur deals increased damage and attacks faster when wielding swords.
Excalibur Prime deals increased damage and attacks faster when wielding swords.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityfros.name: Melee attacks made against Frost have a chance to freeze the attacker.
Melee attacks made against Frost Prime have a chance to freeze the attacker.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityhydr.name: Regenerates health when standing in a water source.
Regenerates health when standing in a water source.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityinar.name: Inaros withdraws into a Sarcophagus to protect him upon taking fatal damage. He can revive himself by draining the life force from nearby enemies and allies before bleeding out.
Inaros Prime withdraws into a Sarcophagus to protect him upon taking fatal damage. He can revive himself by draining the life force from nearby enemies and allies before bleeding out.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityivar.name: Ivara Prime can sense nearby enemies.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitymag.name: Mag is unaffected by gravity while bullet jumping.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitymagp.name: Mag Prime is unaffected by gravity while bullet jumping.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitymesa.name: Mesa has enhanced proficiency while using secondary weapons, and can gain additional health when not equipping a melee weapon.
Mesa Prime has enhanced proficiency while using secondary weapons, and can gain additional health when not equipping a melee weapon.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitymira.name: Mirage has enhanced proficiency with aerial and acrobatic maneuvres.
Mirage Prime has enhanced proficiency with aerial and acrobatic maneuvres.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitynekr.name: When an enemy dies near Nekros, he draws in their life force regaining a small amount of health.
When an enemy dies near Nekros Prime, he draws in their life force regaining a small amount of health.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitynezh.name: Nezha is capable of sliding great distances.
Nezha Prime is capable of sliding great distances.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitynova.name: Nova releases a burst of anti-matter, knocking down nearby enemies when she herself is knocked down.
Nova Prime releases a burst of anti-matter, knocking down nearby enemies when she herself is knocked down.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitynyx.name: Enemies affected by Nyx's abilities have a chance to discard their weapon.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitynyxp.name: Enemies affected by Nyx Prime's abilities have a chance to discard their weapon.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityrhin.name: Rhino emits a shockwave upon landing after falling from a great height.
Rhino Prime emits a shockwave upon landing after falling from a great height.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitysary.name: Saryn increases the duration of any Status Effects she applies.
Saryn Prime increases the duration of any Status Effects she applies.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitytrin.name: Trinity is able to revive fallen allies faster and from a greater distance.
Trinity Prime is able to revive fallen allies faster and from a greater distance.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityvalk.name: Valkyr recovers from Knockdown effects much faster than other Warframes.
Valkyr Prime recovers from Knockdown effects much faster than other Warframes.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityvaub.name: Vauban's Armor increases with each ally nearby.
Vauban Prime's Armor increases with each ally nearby.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityvolt.name: While traversing along the ground, Volt generates an electrical charge that is discharged on his next melee attack.
While traversing along the ground, Volt Prime generates an electrical charge that is discharged on his next melee attack.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilitywuko.name: Wukong can maintain a combo from consecutive melee attacks for an extended duration.
Wukong Prime can maintain a combo from consecutive melee attacks for an extended duration.

/lotus/language/suits/passiveabilityzeph.name: Zephyr has a higher degree of mobility while in the air, and falls at a slower rate.
Zephyr Prime has a higher degree of mobility while in the air, and falls at a slower rate.

/lotus/language/syndicates/conclavename.name: Conclave
/lotus/language/syndicates/conclavename.desc: Access to Uncommon Conclave Mods. Additional Conclave loadout slot.

/lotus/language/syndicates/conclaverewar.name: Access to Uncommon Conclave Mods. Additional Conclave loadout slot.
Access to Rare Conclave Mods. Additional Conclave loadout slot.
Access to Augment Conclave Mods. Additional Conclave loadout slot.
Access to Rare Conclave Mods. Additional Conclave loadout slot.
Access to Conclave Weapon Skins and other items.

/lotus/language/syndicates/librarydesc.name: Through Synthesis we can rebuild and preserve. Create memory-immortals within this data oasis. Will you become enlightened, Tenno? Will you hunt for me?

/lotus/language/syndicates/syndicate_wor.name: Mastery Rank 3 and Syndicate affiliation required.

/lotus/language/syndicates/arbitersrewar.name: Hunted by Eximus Corrupted Lancer Platoon
Hunted by Eximus Corrupted Lancer Squad
Access to Large Team Energy Restore blueprint
Access to Syndicate Void Key Pack

/lotus/language/syndicates/cephalonrewar.name: Hunted by Eximus Scavenger Drone Platoon
Hunted by Eximus Scavenger Drone Squad
Access to Large Team Shield Restore blueprint
Access to Syndicate Void Key Pack

/lotus/language/syndicates/newlokareward.name: Hunted by Eximus Ancient Healer Platoon
Hunted by Eximus Ancient Healer Squad
Access to Large Team Health Restore blueprint
Access to Syndicate Void Key Pack

/lotus/language/syndicates/perrinreward3.name: Access to Large Team Energy Restore blueprint

/lotus/language/syndicates/perrinreward2.name: Access to Syndicate Void Key Pack

/lotus/language/syndicates/redveilreward.name: Access to Large Team Ammo Restore blueprint
Access to Syndicate Void Key Pack

/lotus/language/syndicates/steelmeridian.name: Access to Large Team Health Restore blueprint
Access to Syndicate Void Key Pack

/lotus/language/syndicates/favors_insuff.name: Insufficient Standing; |REP| more Standing is required to purchase this.

/lotus/language/syndicates/favors_mustre.name: You must choose a reward before exiting.

/lotus/language/syndicates/conclavedesc.name: A warrior only grows if they face the ultimate enemy. Themselves.

/lotus/language/syndicates/redveilname.name: Red Veil
/lotus/language/syndicates/redveilname.desc: The Veil see corruption all around them. They are honor-bound to heal the system through a great and violent purge. No cost too great, no blood too precious.

/lotus/language/syndicates/redveildesc.name: The Veil see corruption all around them. They are honor-bound to heal the system through a great and violent purge. No cost too great, no blood too precious.

/lotus/language/syndicates/cephalonsudan.name: Cephalon Suda
/lotus/language/syndicates/cephalonsudan.desc: A vast consciousness watching with a curious eye. Seemingly devoid of emotion, Suda's thirst for knowledge and abhorrence of destruction can only be described as passionate.

/lotus/language/syndicates/cephalonsudad.name: A vast consciousness watching with a curious eye. Seemingly devoid of emotion, Suda's thirst for knowledge and abhorrence of destruction can only be described as passionate.

/lotus/language/syndicates/perrinsequenc.name: The Perrin Sequence
/lotus/language/syndicates/perrinsequenc.desc: A collective of brilliant and powerful merchants, splintered from the Corpus. Their goal is to restore order by bringing prosperity and direction to the violent world they study.

/lotus/language/syndicates/perrinsequenc.name: A collective of brilliant and powerful merchants, splintered from the Corpus. Their goal is to restore order by bringing prosperity and direction to the violent world they study.

/lotus/language/syndicates/newlokaname.name: New Loka
/lotus/language/syndicates/newlokaname.desc: Only through the restoration of a pure humanity and the repopulation of Earth can the conflict end. The New Loka are worshipers of the human form and Earth, before its corruption.

/lotus/language/syndicates/newlokadesc.name: Only through the restoration of a pure humanity and the repopulation of Earth can the conflict end. The New Loka are worshipers of the human form and Earth, before its corruption.

/lotus/language/syndicates/steelmeridian.name: Steel Meridian
/lotus/language/syndicates/steelmeridian.desc: Led by a battle-hardened Grineer deserter, the Steel Meridian fight a guerrilla war against a vast enemy. They are sworn protectors of what little remains of the colonies.

/lotus/language/syndicates/steelmeridian.name: Led by a battle-hardened Grineer deserter, the Steel Meridian fight a guerrilla war against a vast enemy. They are sworn protectors of what little remains of the colonies.

/lotus/language/syndicates/arbitersname.name: Arbiters of Hexis
/lotus/language/syndicates/arbitersname.desc: The dogmatic Arbiters seek a truth through discipline and practice. They reject the Tenno as Warrior mythology... A lie constructed to limit their potential.

/lotus/language/syndicates/arbitersdesc.name: The dogmatic Arbiters seek a truth through discipline and practice. They reject the Tenno as Warrior mythology... A lie constructed to limit their potential.

/lotus/language/tutorial/tutorialmeleech.name: Hold <MELEE_CHANNEL> to channel energy into melee weapon

/lotus/language/tutorial/tutorialrescuee.name: Survey the area and proceed with caution!

/lotus/language/tutorial/synthesistutori.name: <MINI_INVENTORY_HOLD> Equip the synthesis scanner from the inventory wheel
Use the synthesis scanner to track the trail of energy signatures left by the target
Scan all points on the target to synthesize it
Deploying a kinetic siphon trap slows down the target for a short time

/lotus/language/tutorial/tutorialspyforc.name: Grineer forcefields trip the vault's alarm and drain energy if touched.

/lotus/language/tutorial/tutorialspypatr.name: Avoid alerting any enemies patrolling the vault.

/lotus/language/tutorial/tutorialspypani.name: Alerted enemies may use panic buttons to trigger the alarm.

/lotus/language/tutorial/parkourdoubleju.name: Double Jump - Tap <JUMP> while in the air

/lotus/language/tutorial/parkourglidesho.name: Attacking Aim Glide - <JUMP> then hold <AIM_WEAPON> and shoot <PRE_ATTACK> when target appears

/lotus/language/tutorial/parkourwalljump.name: Wall Dash (Up) - Jump onto wall, <MOVE_Z> holding <JUMP>
Wall Dash (Across) - Jump onto wall and hold <JUMP>

/lotus/language/tutorial/parkourgrabshoo.name: Wall Latch (Timed) - Hold <AIM_WEAPON> near the wall

/lotus/language/tutorial/parkourhighjump.name: Bullet Jump (Aim Direction) - Aim up then <HOLD_CROUCH> and tap <JUMP>
Bullet Jump (Aim Direction) - Aim up then <PRE_CROUCH> and tap <JUMP>
Bullet Jump (Aim Direction) - Aim up then <PRE_CROUCH> and tap <JUMP>

/lotus/language/tutorial/parkourjumpdire.name: Wall Dash - Control direction with <MOVE_X> <MOVE_X:INVERT=1> while holding <JUMP>
Wall Dash - Control direction with <MOVE_X> while holding <JUMP>
Wall Dash - Control direction with <MOVE_X> while holding <JUMP>

/lotus/language/tutorial/parkourziplineh.name: Zipline - Tap <USE> near zipline to mount

/lotus/language/tutorial/tutorialwallrun.name: You can wall run on flat surfaces
Run at a wall and hold <JUMP> to wall run

/lotus/language/upgrades/missionspecific.name: Increase Shield Resistant to Ice Levels by |val|%

/lotus/language/upgrades/powertohealthon.name: Drains Energy to stop lethal damage with |val|% efficiency.

/lotus/language/upgrades/shieldrevengeda.name: |val|% Chance to do electrical damage when shield struck by melee enemies

/lotus/language/upgrades/weaponpowerdama.name: Convert |val|% of Energy used to Bonus Damage on next Melee Attack.

/lotus/language/upgrades/weaponhealthonk.name: |val|% Chance to Restore Health on Kill

/lotus/language/upgrades/weaponshieldonk.name: |val|% Chance to Restore Shield on Kill

/lotus/language/upgrades/weaponholstered.name: |val|% Clip Reloaded per Second when Holstered

/lotus/language/upgrades/marktarget.name: Marks a target for |val| seconds, revealing their position on the mini-map.

/lotus/language/upgrades/marktargetaddda.name: Marks a target for |val| seconds increasing the damage taken from enemies.

|CONDITION|: |CHANCE|% chance to become invisible for |DURATION| seconds.
|CONDITION|: |CHANCE|% chance to replenish energy to nearby allies.
|CONDITION|: |CHANCE|% chance for 100% crit on next hit.
|CONDITION|: |CHANCE|% chance for 100% bonus damage on next hit.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_helpshapefutu.name: HELP SHAPE THE FUTURE OF WARFRAME

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_noaccount.name: Don't have an account? Sign Up!

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_warframesdesc.name: Warframe exo-armor uses unique combative technology to create the ultimate weaponry. The Warframes hold many mysterious powers and mastering one requires dedicated use.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_trinitydesc.name: Trinity is great for players who prefer a supportive role. Warframes with healing technologies are rare making Trinity a great equalizer when the odds are stacked against the Tenno.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_voltdesc.name: Volt can create and harness electrical elements. This is a high-damage Warframe perfect for players who want a potent alternative to gun-play.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_ashdesc.name: Ash is great for players looking for a stealthier approach to combat. Lethal abilities are complemented by powers of distraction.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_nyxdesc.name: Mind control and psychic attacks make Nyx a very dangerous foe. Her ability to reach into enemy consciousness and manipulate their behavior can turn the tide of any battle.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_emberdesc.name: Ember is a nightmare for light-armored targets. Ember can super-heat the air, which opens up surprising crowd-control possibilities.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_frostdesc.name: By channeling moisture and vapor in the surrounding environment, Frost creates formidable defenses and lethal attacks from sub-zero conditions.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_excaliburdesc.name: The perfect training Warframe: the Excalibur suit allows players to explore the power of Warframes with a balanced set of capabilities.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_magdesc.name: With full command of surrounding magnetic energy, Mag is an expert at enemy manipulation. She is a perfect choice for players that want to deal heavy damage in unconventional ways.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_rhinodesc.name: Rhino is the heaviest of all the Warframes. His strength enables him to combine a mix of devastating offensive attacks with formidable defensive powers.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_lokidesc.name: Desired by advanced players, Loki offers a variety of reconfiguring abilities. The abnormality of Loki's powers allows players to manipulate the battlefield.

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_founderspackd.name: Being a Founder has its privileges. Snag exclusive itmes that will never be available again, PLUS instant access to the Closed Beta!

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_founderspacka.name: ALL FOUNDERS PACKAGES INCLUDE IMMEDIATE CLOSED BETA ACCESS

/lotus/language/webpage/wp_upgradedesc.name: Upgrade your Founders Package and only pay the difference from your original purchase.

/lotus/language/champions/grineercharger.name: The sole survivor of a frontier battalion that was eradicated by a lone Tenno, when Garesh eventually returned to civilization, he was tried as deserter and sentenced to death by Rathuum. To everyone’s surprise he killed all his Executioners and was granted a pardon on the condition that he himself become and Executioner. Garesh yearns for the day when he can punish a Tenno.

/lotus/language/champions/nightwatchlead.name: Gorth was a distinguished commander of the Nightwatch Corps but when he unwittingly killed a close ally of Lech Krill for stealing supplies, he faced political fallout that destroyed his career.  Exiled from military service, Gorth now seeks to redeem his honor as an Executioner of Rathuum.
EXECUTIONER GORTH
/lotus/language/champions/nightwatchlead.desc: A frontline warrior who protects his allies.

/lotus/language/champions/nightwatchlead.name: A frontline warrior who protects his allies.

/lotus/language/champions/grineersoldier.name: EXECUTIONER NOK
/lotus/language/champions/grineersoldier.desc: An experienced veteran, trained and disciplined.

/lotus/language/champions/grineersoldier.name: An experienced veteran, trained and disciplined.

Nok led a decorated career in service to Captain Vor, tasked with routing out any weak or anarchic influences within the ranks of the Grineer Army. After many years of loyal service, the degenerative effects that plague all Grineer began taking their toll on Nok. With Vor's blessing, Nok was granted leave to spend his remaining days punishing Grineer in the court of Rathuum.

/lotus/language/champions/grineersnipern.name: EXECUTIONER HARKONAR
/lotus/language/champions/grineersnipern.desc: Olka Harkonar hails from the Harkonar Production Zone. She is one of the few nobles not satisfied by simply watching her weapons wreak havoc, she needed to join the fray. So Olka Harkonar became an Executioner of Rathuum, vowing to prove the might of Harkonar weapons and armor with every judgement she made.

/lotus/language/champions/grineersniperl.name: Olka Harkonar hails from the Harkonar Production Zone. She is one of the few nobles not satisfied by simply watching her weapons wreak havoc, she needed to join the fray. So Olka Harkonar became an Executioner of Rathuum, vowing to prove the might of Harkonar weapons and armor with every judgement she made.

/lotus/language/champions/grineerbeastma.name: Not much is known about the mysterious Zura. She appeared in the fighting pits with her Hyekka and carved a bloody path through her opposition. The crowd always roars with pleasure when Zura steps into the fighting pits.

/lotus/language/champions/grineerenginee.name: EXECUTIONER RETH
/lotus/language/champions/grineerenginee.desc: A cunning combatant that uses machinery to assist him.

/lotus/language/champions/grineerenginee.name: A cunning combatant that uses machinery to assist him.

Reth was once a simple labourer working in the shipyards on Ceres. He often wondered how lethal the equipment he worked with could be if he only made minor tweaks to its design. After a series of escalated killings his handiwork was discovered by his superiors. Rather than risk being captured, Reth fled to Kela, where he now field tests his latest machinations in the service of Rathuum.

/lotus/language/champions/grineermedicna.name: EXECUTIONER DOK THUL
/lotus/language/champions/grineermedicna.desc: Heals his team with advanced medical technology.

/lotus/language/champions/grineermedicde.name: Heals his team with advanced medical technology.

/lotus/language/champions/grineermediclo.name: Once a medical officer under Sargas Ruk, Thul failed to save the life of one of his favoured officers. Thul was “reassigned” to service under Kela as an Executioner of Rathuum. He has managed to survive under the protection of his allies, who value his medical skills.

/lotus/language/champions/grineerhellion.name: EXECUTIONER VAY MOLTA
/lotus/language/champions/grineerhellion.desc: Highly maneuverable combatant with devastating attacks.

/lotus/language/champions/grineerhellion.name: Highly maneuverable combatant with devastating attacks.
In return for a substantial donation to his campaign, Vay Hek consigned one of his most vicious clones to Kela’s service. Vay Molta has become a crowd favourite with her modified Jat Kittag.

/lotus/language/champions/gruntdronename.name: DETH CARABUS
/lotus/language/champions/gruntdronename.desc: Delivers the final judgement of Executioner Nok.

/lotus/language/champions/gruntdronedesc.name: Delivers the final judgement of Executioner Nok.

/lotus/language/champions/grineerbeastma.name: EXECUTIONER ZURA
/lotus/language/champions/grineerbeastma.desc: Summons Hyekka to aid her in battle.

/lotus/language/champions/grineerbeastma.name: Summons Hyekka to aid her in battle.
